Club.name: 短棒
Club.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+2 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

Training.name: 技艺受训
Training.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 具有某项技能熟练（由DM选择），且在进行使用该技能的属性检定时具有优势。

Club.name: 短棒
Club.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。

Will-o'-Wisp.name: 鬼火
Will-o'-Wisp.description: 指示物插图由Forgotten Adventures提供。

Ephemeral.name: 转瞬即逝
Ephemeral.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can't wear or carry anything.

Illumination.name: 照明
Illumination.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 散发出半径 20 尺的明亮光照以及额外 20 尺的微光光照。

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以如同穿过 &Reference[Difficult Terrain]一样穿过其他生物和物件。如果它在自己的回合结束时仍处在物件内部则受到[[/damage 1d10 average type=force]] 伤害。

Vanish.name: 消失
Vanish.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 及其光照获得 &Reference[Invisible apply=false] 状态，直至其 &Reference[Concentration] 终止。&Reference[Invisible apply=false] 状态在 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动攻击或使用[[/Item .YPy3wAfsPZ7cNJoJ]]后立即结束。

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 你及你的光照获得 &Reference[Invisible apply=false] 状态直至专注终止，该效应会在发动攻击或使用附赠动作后立即结束。

Consume Life.name: 摄食生命
Consume Life.description:
体质豁免检定： DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=1Hy8CdhpwQlLxDPq]]，单一 [[lookup @range.value activity=1Hy8CdhpwQlLxDPq]] 尺内 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可见的生命值为 0 的生物。

失败：目标死亡， [[lookup @name lowercase]] 恢复[[/healing average activity=1waYTjY3NAIGZgrI]]{10（3d6）生命值}。

Failure: Dead.name: 失败：死亡
Failure: Dead.description: 若生命值为 0 的生物体质豁免失败，则目标死亡

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]]在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 其对抗那次攻击时的AC +[[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]（可能令那次攻击失手）。

Use.name: 使用
Use.condition: 在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .mmVineStaff00000]] 或 [[/item .mmVerdantWisp000]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下一道法术，使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免 DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]{德鲁伊伎俩}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpeakwithA]{动物交谈}

每项 2/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplEntangle00]{纠缠术}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThunderwav]{雷鸣波}

每项 1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplAnimalMess]{动物信使}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLongstride]{大步奔行}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplMoonbeam00]{月华之光}

Druidcraft.name: 德鲁伊伎俩
Druidcraft.description:
你向自然精魂低语，在施法距离内创造出下述效应之一。

感知天气。 你创造一个微型而无害的感官效应，并以之预报你所在地接下来 4 小时的天气状况。该效应可表现为一个代表晴空的金球，一朵代表雨天的云彩，代表雪日而飘飞的雪花等等。该效应将持续 1 轮。

盛放。 你可以立即让一朵鲜花绽放，一颗种子破壳，一片叶蕾发芽。

感官效应。 你创造一个无害的感官效应，例如落叶，幽灵般舞动的小仙灵们，微风，动物的声音或者臭鼬的微弱臭气。该效应只能在 5 尺的立方空间内起效。

玩火。 你点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

Speak with Animals.name: 动物交谈
Speak with Animals.description:
For the duration, you can comprehend and verbally communicate with Beasts, and you can use any of the Influence action's skill options with them.

Most Beasts have little to say about topics that don't pertain to survival or companionship, but at minimum, a Beast can give you information about nearby locations and monsters, including whatever it has perceived within the past day.

Thunderwave.name: 雷鸣波
Thunderwave.description:
你施放出一道雷鸣能量。在以你为源点 15 尺立方区域内的每名生物必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败者将受到 2d8 点雷鸣伤害，并被推离 10 尺。豁免成功则只受一半伤害。

此外，所有完全位于该区域内且未被固定住的物件都将被推离 10 尺。该法术还会发出距你 300 尺内都能听见的雷霆巨响。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，伤害就提高 1d8。

Entangle.name: 纠缠术
Entangle.description:
Grasping plants sprout from the ground in a 20-foot square within range. For the duration, these plants turn the ground in the area into &Reference[difficultterrain]. They disappear when the spell ends.

Each creature (other than you) in the area when you cast the spell must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have the &Reference[restrained apply=false] condition until the spell ends. A Restrained creature can take an action to make a [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spell.dc]] check against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself from the grasping plants and is no longer Restrained by them.

Restrained.name: 束缚
Restrained.description: 陷入束缚的生物可以用其动作进行一次 [[/check ability=str skill=ath dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定对抗该法术的豁免DC。检定成功则成功摆脱缠绕在其身上的藤蔓并不再被其束缚。

Animal Messenger.name: 动物信使
Animal Messenger.description:
指定一只在施法距离内你能看见的微型野兽。该生物必须成功通过一次魅力豁免，否则它会为你传递一则消息（如果该生物的挑战等级不是 0，则豁免自动成功）。你选择一个你曾造访过的地点，然后描述收信人的基本信息，如“一个穿着城镇守卫制服的男人或女人”或“一个戴着尖顶帽子的红发矮人”。你还需要说出一段不超过二十五个单次的信息。目标野兽 将会在法术持续时间内前往你选定的地点。会飞的信使 24 小时内可移动 50 里，不会飞的信使只能移动 25 里。

野兽抵达目的地后，会模仿你的声音把信息传递给你描述的人。信使只会把信息传递给符合你描述的人。如果法术持续时间内信使未能抵达目的地则信息将遗失，而曾作为信使的野兽将自行寻路返回你施法的地点。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比 2 环高一环，此法术持续时间就增加 48 小时。

Carrying Message.name: 传递信息
Carrying Message.description:
目标野兽将会在法术持续时间内前往你选定的地点。会飞的信使 24 小时内可移动 50 里，不会飞的信使只能移动 25 里。

野兽抵达目的地后，会模仿你的声音把信息传递给你描述的人。信使只会把信息传递给符合你描述的人。如果法术持续时间内信使未能抵达目的地则信息将遗失，而曾作为信使的野兽将自行寻路返回你施法的地点。

Longstrider.name: 大步奔行
Longstrider.description:
你触碰一个生物，该目标的速度增加 10 尺直至法术结束。

升环施法：使用高于一环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，你就可以额外指定一个目标。

Longstrider.name: 大步奔行
Longstrider.description: 你的速度增加 10 尺直至法术结束。

Moonbeam.name: 月华之光
Moonbeam.description:
指定施法距离内一点，一束淡淡的银光照耀在以该点为中心半径 5 尺、高 40 尺的柱状区域内。直至法术终止前，柱状区域内处于微光光照。在施展该法术的后续回合内，你能够以一个魔法动作将柱状区域移动至多 60 尺。柱状区域出现时，每个区域内的生物进行一次体质豁免检定，豁免失败则受到 2d10 的光耀伤害，且若该生物已变形（例如受法术@UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplPolymorph0]{变形术} 影响），其变回真实形态，且无法在离开柱状区域前变形。豁免成功则仅承受前述伤害的一半。在法术区域进入生物空间、生物进入法术区域或在其内结束回合时，目标生物也需要进行该体质豁免检定。一名生物每回合仅需进行一次该豁免检定。

升环施法：使用的法术位每比二环高一环，此法术的伤害就增加 1d10。

Shuck.name: Shuck
Shuck.description:
指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Keen Hearing and Smell.name: 敏锐嗅听觉
Keen Hearing and Smell.description: 该狼在依靠听觉或嗅觉进行的感知（察觉）检定上具有优势。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 如果狼的至少一个盟友在5尺内且该盟友未处于失能状态，则狼对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+4 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) piercing damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

The Barrow King.name: The Barrow King
The Barrow King.description:
The Barrow King

Undying Monarch of the Damned

Habitat: Any

The Barrow King is known only by the armies of Undead he commands, which all slumber in tombs and burial mounds. Wights and their zombie conscripts arise when trespassers violate the resting place of the king’s army, and tales speak of a tide of death that will sweep across the world if the king himself should awaken. Records of the king’s living exploits and identity are near nonexistent, but rumors abound, and the storm of stories and myths may conceal grains of truth.

Secret. The Barrow King’s only true weakness is his name, written in the runic form of his lost native language. A weapon inscribed with his runic name becomes his bane.

Barrow King’s Lair

The Barrow King’s lair is his burial mound and the surrounding region of resting places for his vast army. If encountered in his lair, the Barrow King has a challenge rating of 23 (50,000 XP).

The region containing the Barrow King’s lair is changed by his presence, creating the following effects:

Empire of Desecration. A Hallow spell cast within 1 mile of the lair fails, but any resources used to cast it aren’t wasted.

Necrotic Shroud. When a living creature within 1 mile of the lair regains hit points as part of finishing a long rest, it can only regain up to half its hit point maximum.

If the Barrow King dies or moves his lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The king makes three [[/item Soul Blade]] attacks. He can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Life Drain]].

Soul Blade.name: 灵魂刀锋
Soul Blade.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 40/80 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. Hit or Miss: The blade magically returns to the king’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

Life Drain.name: 吸取生命
Life Drain.description: The king touches a creature. The target must succeed on a DC 22 Constitution saving throw or take 16 ([[/r 2d8 + 7]]) necrotic damage, and the target’s hit point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken until it finishes a long rest. A Humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a Wight under the king’s control, unless the Humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed.

Blade Storm.name: Blade Storm
Blade Storm.description: The king’s blade flies in a deadly arc around him. Each creature of the king’s choice within 20 feet of him must make a DC 22 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 35 ([[/r 10d6]]) force damage and is knocked &Reference[Prone apply=false]. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage only.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The king can take 3 legendary actions (4 in Lair), choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The king regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

Death Grasp.name: Death Grasp
Death Grasp.description: One creature the king can see within 100 feet of him must succeed on a DC 22 Strength saving throw or a ghostly, skeletal arm pulls the target up to 40 feet closer to the king, and the target’s speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

Grim Charge.name: Grim Charge
Grim Charge.description: The king moves up to his speed (or commands his mount to move up to its speed) and makes one [[/item Soul Blade]] attack.

Lord’s Call.name: Lord’s Call
Lord’s Call.description: The king magically summons two Wights into unoccupied spaces he can see within 30 feet of himself. The wights obey the king and take their turn immediately after him on the same initiative count. A wight vanishes after 1 hour, when it or the king dies, or when the king uses this action again. A creature that starts its turn within 5 feet of a wight must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or take 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) Psychic damage and be &Reference[Frightened apply=false] until the start of its next turn. A creature makes this save only once per turn.

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description:
The Barrow King’s lair is his burial mound and the surrounding region of resting places for his vast army. If encountered in his lair, the Barrow King has a challenge rating of 23 (50,000 XP). The region containing the Barrow King’s lair is changed by his presence, creating the following effects:

If the Barrow King dies or moves his lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Empire of Desecration.name: Empire of Desecration
Empire of Desecration.description: A Hallow spell cast within 1 mile of the lair fails, but any resources used to cast it aren’t wasted.

Necrotic Shroud.name: Necrotic Shroud
Necrotic Shroud.description: When a living creature within 1 mile of the lair regains hit points as part of finishing a long rest, it can only regain up to half its hit point maximum.

Undying Mount.name: Undying Mount
Undying Mount.description: The king casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.wpx42mtoZ5BmXRs1], requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability. The conjured steed takes no damage from areas of effect. The spell ends early if the king casts it again.

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description: When the king is hit by an attack roll while holding a weapon or shield, he adds 7 to his AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Plate Armor.name: 板甲
Plate Armor.description: 板甲由覆盖全身，且相互连接的模铸金属板组成。一套板甲包括护手、重皮靴、一顶附面甲的头盔以及在护甲底层的厚重的布甲。其锁扣和皮带结构可以将护甲重量分配到身体各处。

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.description: 盾牌通常由木材或金属制成，可以单手进行持用。持用一面盾牌可以令你的护甲等级 +2。不过同一时间里你只能从一面盾牌中受益。

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the king fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The king has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Marshall Undead.name: Marshall Undead
Marshall Undead.description: Undead creatures of the king’s choice (excluding himself) within 60 feet of him have advantage on attack rolls and saving throws. He can’t use this trait if he is &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false].

Name Of Rest.name: Name Of Rest
Name Of Rest.description: The king has AC 10 against attack rolls made with a weapon inscribed with the runic form of his original name, and the king has disadvantage on attack rolls made against a creature holding such a weapon.

Phantom Steed.name: 魅影驹
Phantom Steed.description:
一只大型、类真实、马状的生物出现在射程内你选择的未占据空间的地面上。你决定该生物的外观，但它配备有鞍具、衔铁和缰绳。任何由该法术创造的装备若被携带至距离坐骑超过10尺远的地方，就会在一阵烟雾中消失。

在持续时间内，你或你选择的一个生物可以骑乘坐骑。该生物使用骑乘马的资料卡，但其速度为100尺，且每小时能行进10英里，或以快步行进13英里。当法术结束时，坐骑逐渐消失，给予骑手1分钟的时间下马。若你用一个动作解散它，或坐骑受到任何伤害，则法术结束。

The White Worm.name: The White Worm
The White Worm.description:
The White Worm

Eldritch Devourer of Memories

Habitat: Coastal, Underground, Underwater

Born of a forgotten realm beyond the stars, the White Worm is an eldritch horror resembling a humungous, pallid grub that ravenously hungers for memory. Greedily consuming the memories of any beings capable of remembering, its mere existence sends out shockwaves of alien psychic energy. It also serves as the queen of a hivemind colony of infinite wormlike spawn that seek mortal hosts to feast upon and control.

Secret. A specific series of constellations and star paths through the heavens is a deadly poison to the White Worm if it consumes that memory.

The White Worm’s Lair

The White Worm’s lair is a secluded lake and the shores surrounding it. If encountered in its lair, the White Worm has a challenge rating of 20 (25,000 XP).

The region containing the White Worm’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Alien Growth. Strange life grows rampant within 1 mile of the lair. In that region, Gricks, Purple Worms, and Wormhost Surgeons* are common.

Psychic Phantoms. Within 1 mile of the lair, creatures are plagued by horrid nightmares. When a creature sleeps or enters a trance and finishes a long rest in that area, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or gain no benefit from finishing the rest.

If the White Worm dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The worm makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and uses Psychic Caress twice.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 10 ft.; one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 19).

Psychic Caress.name: Psychic Caress
Psychic Caress.description: A creature the worm can see within 60 feet of it must make a DC 19 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 17 ([[/r 5d6]]) psychic damage, and it is &Reference[Frightened apply=false] until the start of the worm’s next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Devour Mind.name: Devour Mind
Devour Mind.description:
The worm vanishes and magically enters the mind of a creature it can see within 60 feet of it. The worm can’t target a creature under the effect of the Mind Blank or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.xmDBqZhRVrtLP8h2]{Protection from Evil and Good} spells. While in the target’s mind, the worm can’t take actions, and the target experiences the worm appearing in its memories as it devours each one. At the end of each of the target’s turns, it takes 88 ([[/r 16d10]]) psychic damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but loses all its memories permanently. Only a Wish spell can restore the lost memories.

Devour Mind ends if the target is reduced to 0 hit points, and the worm appears in an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the target. Devour Mind can also be ended in the following ways:

  • As an action, the target mentally duels the worm and makes a DC 20 ability check using Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma (its choice). On a success, the worm must succeed on a Charisma saving throw with a DC equal to the check’s total or Devour Mind ends.

  • Devour Mind ends if the target receives an effect that ends possession, including the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.TkJ8Wtg1L7TZtspm]{Dispel Evil and Good} spell.

  • If the target takes damage, the worm takes psychic damage equal to half that amount. It must succeed on a Charisma saving throw with a DC equal to the psychic damage taken, or Devour Mind ends.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The worm can take 3 legendary actions (4 in Lair), choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The worm regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Memory Fragments.name: 记忆碎片
Memory Fragments.description: The worm expels shards of memories it has devoured. Each creature within 10 feet of the worm must make a DC 18 Intelligence saving throw, taking 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Slither.name: 蠕行
Slither.description: The worm moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

Spawn Parasites.name: Spawn Parasites
Spawn Parasites.description: The worm disgorges a slimy spray of pale, parasitic worms in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or be infested with parasitic worms and be &Reference[Poisoned apply=false]. At the start of the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] target’s turn, it takes 7 ([[/r 2d6]]) necrotic damage plus 7 (2d6) psychic damage as the worms burrow toward its brain. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies and then rises 24 hours later as a Wormhost Surgeon. The infesting worms are killed by any effect that ends the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition on the target, or if 10 poison damage or more is dealt to the target.

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description: The White Worm’s lair is a secluded lake and the shores surrounding it. If encountered in its lair, the White Worm has a challenge rating of 20 (25,000 XP). The region containing the White Worm’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects: If the White Worm dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Alien Growth.name: Alien Growth
Alien Growth.description: Strange life grows rampant within 1 mile of the lair. In that region, Gricks, Purple Worms, and Wormhost Surgeons are common.

Psychic Phantoms.name: Psychic Phantoms
Psychic Phantoms.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, creatures are plagued by horrid nightmares. When a creature sleeps or enters a trance and finishes a long rest in that area, it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or gain no benefit from finishing the rest.

Inscrutable Mind.name: Inscrutable Mind
Inscrutable Mind.description: If a creature tries to read the worm’s mind, that creature must succeed on a DC 19 Intelligence saving throw or be &Reference[Stunned apply=false] for 1 minute. The creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the worm fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Poisoned Knowledge.name: Poisoned Knowledge
Poisoned Knowledge.description: If the worm uses Devour Mind on a creature that knows a special sequence of constellations and their path through the sky, at the start of the target’s next turn, the worm takes 50 psychic damage and Devour Mind ends.

Tunneler.name: 掘道者
Tunneler.description: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its burrowing speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

Ghost Crawler.name: Ghost Crawler
Ghost Crawler.description:
Ghost Crawler

Spirit Spider (Silk threads soaked in wine)

Habitat: Forest, Swamp, Underground

Silent and nearly invisible, ghost crawlers skitter between the darkest corners, hiding and watching. Their diminutive, ghostly, spider-like bodies are ill-defined and as translucent as a wisp of smoke, while their legs are long, uneven, and jarringly solid. The webs they spin are ephemeral and ghastly, allowing the crawlers to sense through them regardless of the distance.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The crawler makes two [[/item Bite]] attacks.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] until the start of the crawler’s next turn.

Ether Webs.name: Ether Webs
Ether Webs.description: The crawler fills a 5-foot cube with &Reference[Invisible apply=false], ephemeral webs for 8 hours. If the web isn’t anchored between two solid masses (such as walls or trees) or layered across a floor, wall, or ceiling, the web collapses on itself and vanishes. When a creature touches the webbing, the crawler knows the location of the creature as long as they are on the same plane of existence.

Ephemeral Body.name: Ephemeral Body
Ephemeral Body.description: The crawler can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch without squeezing.

Seer’s Strand.name: Seer’s Strand
Seer’s Strand.description: The crawler can see and hear through the space of its Ether Webs as if it were in that space.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The crawler can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Web Sense.name: 蛛网感知
Web Sense.description: While in contact with a web, the crawler knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

Web Walker.name: 蛛网行者
Web Walker.description: The crawler ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

6syYfa3idD1RDhwX.name: Crimson Clergy
6syYfa3idD1RDhwX.description:
Crimson Clergy

Vampiric Zealot

Habitat: Any

Crimson clergy are Undead cultists, often created, led, and taught by a more powerful vampire. Crimson clergy view the consumption of blood—and in its use during their rituals and when casting spells—not only as necessary but sacred. Their hunger reaches beyond the limits of their fangs and claws, calling to the blood of their victims and drawing it out in scarlet ribbons.

Secret. Crimson clergy struggle to accept how monstrous they have become. They can’t stand the sight of themselves and see their true visage in their reflection.

Disguise Self.name: 易容术
Disguise Self.description:
你使自己——包括你的服饰、护甲、武器以及随身携带的其他物品——看起来与众不同，直到法术终止或你用一个动作将其解除。你可以看起来变矮或变高一尺，可以显得更瘦、更胖或介于两者之间。你无法改变你的体型，因此你必须采用具有相同基本肢体排列的形态。除此之外，幻象的程度由你决定。

该法术带来的变化经不起物理检查。例如，如果你使用该法术为你的装束添加一顶帽子，物体会穿过帽子，而任何触摸它的人会感觉空无一物或只感觉到你的头和头发。如果你使用该法术让自己看起来比实际更瘦，伸手触摸你的人的手会在看似仍在半空中时撞到你。

要识破你的伪装，一个生物可以用它的动作来检查你的外观，并且必须进行一次智力（调查）检定对抗你的法术豁免DC并成功。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内创造出下列魔法效应之一：

  • 你的声音在 1 分钟内变得比常人响两倍。
  • 你在 1 分钟内使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色。
  • 你使地面震动 1 分钟（完全无害）。
  • 你使某种声音自施法距离内一点瞬间发出，例如雷鸣声，鸦叫声或不祥的低语声。
  • 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗瞬间打开或关上。
  • 你在 1 分钟内改变自己眼睛的颜色。

多次施展该法术时，你可以同时维持最多三个持续 1 分钟的效应。你也可以用一个动作驱散其中一种效应。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The clergy casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.A3q2gTNqG6fvNGrv], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.MUO1uYN7JR1hm4dR]

Consume.name: 耗用
Consume.description: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. The target’s hit point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the damage taken until it finishes a long rest, and the clergy regains hit points equal to that amount.

Crimson Blessing.name: Crimson Blessing
Crimson Blessing.description: The clergy casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.8dzaICjGy6mTUaUr] using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The clergy can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Bless.name: 祝福术
Bless.description:
你用言语祝福施法距离内至多三个生物。在法术终止前，每当受术目标进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，可以额外掷一次 d4 并加在其结果上。

升环施法：使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就可以多指定一个目标。

Vampire Weaknesses.name: 吸血鬼弱点
Vampire Weaknesses.description:
The clergy has the following weaknesses:

Self-loathing. The clergy has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws if it can see its reflection.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity. The clergy takes 20 radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

6wLkEwls4AUZ5dPW.name: Shuck
6wLkEwls4AUZ5dPW.description:
指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 未失能的盟友，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]，若目标生物体型不超过中型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Prone.name: 倒地
Prone.description: 若你的生物体型不超过中型，则你陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Centipede Hag.name: Centipede Hag
Centipede Hag.description:
Centipede Hag

Hag of Pestilence and Flesh-Shaping

Habitat: Hill, Planar (Fey), Urban, Underground

Centipede hags are grotesque witches that revel in disease and filth, filling their presence with the scuttling vermin they adore. Their magic thrives in the corruption and warping of bodies, and they often engage in horrifying experimentation in grafting, swapping, and combining body parts to create nightmarish new creatures.

Secret. Centipede hags draw more than strength from the filth that covers them; it is the essence of their being. Scrubbing it away dissolves the hag.

Contagion.name: 疫病术contagion
Contagion.description:
你的触碰带着疾病。你对触及范围内一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则该目标中毒。

该中毒目标的每一回合结束时，必须进行一次体质豁免。若该目标累计三次该豁免成功，则其不再中毒且该法术终止。若该目标累计三次该豁免失败，其亦不再中毒，但必须从以下描述的疾病中选择其一。随后该目标将受选定的疾病影响直至该法术持续时间结束。

由于法术对目标引发的是自然疾病，因此任何移除疾病或改善疾病状况的效应都可以对受术生物产生影响。

失明症 Blinding Sickness。 痛苦缠绕着患病者的意志，并使其眼睛变成奶白色。患病生物进行感知检定和感知豁免时具有劣势，并且承受目盲状态。

腐热症 Filth Fever。 患者身体发起严重的高烧。患病生物进行力量检定和力量豁免时，以及发动基于力量的攻击检定时具有劣势。

烂肉症 Flesh Rot。 患者的肌肤逐渐腐朽。患病生物进行魅力检定时具有劣势，并且具有所有伤害类型的伤害易伤。

脑热症 Mindfire。患者头脑发热。患病生物进行智力检定和智力豁免时具有劣势，并且其在战斗中视为受到困惑术 confusion 效应影响。

癫痫症 Seizure。患者全身颤抖不止。患病生物进行敏捷检定和敏捷豁免时，以及发动基于敏捷的攻击检定时具劣势。

恶心症 Slimy Doom。 患者开始不受控地流血。患病生物进行体质检定和体质豁免时具有劣势。另外每当该生物受到伤害时都会陷入震慑状态，直至其下一回合结束。

Disguise Self (24-hour duration).name: 易容术（持续24小时）
Disguise Self (24-hour duration).description:
你改变自身以及随身的衣物、护甲、武器等在你身上的所有物。该效应在法术终止时结束。肉眼看来你的身高可以有 1 尺的增减，体态可胖可瘦。你必须选择一个和你肢体基础排列方式一致的形态。此外，幻术的影响范围由你决定。

此法术产生的变化无法应对物理检查。比如，你用此法术添了一顶帽子，那么现实物件会从帽子穿过去，且任何触碰帽子的人将摸不到任何东西。

如果一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
选择射程内一个你能看见的类人生物。目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则在该法术的持续时间内被&Reference[麻痹]。在每个自己的回合结束时，目标可以再进行一次感知豁免。豁免成功则法术对该目标终止。

升阶效应。施展该法术时，若你使用的法术位为3环或更高，则法术每比2环高一环，你就能多指定一个类人生物作为目标。指定目标时，这些类人生物彼此之间的距离不得超过30尺。

Hold Person.name: 人类定身术
Hold Person.description: 你在法术期间麻痹。你在施法者的每一回合结束时可以再进行一次感知豁免，豁免成功则终止自身上该法术的效应。

Invisibility (self only).name: 隐形术（仅自身）
Invisibility (self only).description:
A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

materials.value: An eyelash encased in gum arabic

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: 你或一个你触碰的生物变为隐形，直至法术终止。任何保持在目标身上的着装物和携带物也可以维持隐形状态。 如果目标发动攻击或施展法术，则该法术终止。

Insect Plague (as 8th-level spell).name: Insect Plague (as 8th-level spell)
Insect Plague (as 8th-level spell).description:
Swarming, biting locusts fill a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point you choose within range. The sphere spreads around corners. The sphere remains for the Duration, and its area is lightly obscured. The sphere's area is difficult terrain.

When the area appears, each creature in it must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes 4d10 piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature must also make this saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by 1d10 for each slot level above 5th.

materials.value: A few grains of sugar, some kernels of grain, and a smear of fat

Polymorph.name: 变形术
Polymorph.description:
该法术将一个施法距离内你能看见的生物变化为一个新的形态。一个非自愿的生物必须进行一次感知豁免来避免此效应。该法术无法对变形生物或生命值为 0 的生物生效。

法术产生的变化在法术持续时间内得以维持，或直至目标的生命值降为 0 或死亡。新形态可以是任何挑战等级小于等于目标本身的野兽（如果目标没有挑战等级，则以其等级为基准）。目标的游戏资料以及心智相关的属性值都将被所选定野兽的属性数据取代。而其阵营和个性则仍然保留。

目标使用其新形态的生命值。当它变回正常形态时，则立即恢复变化前的生命值。如果目标因为生命值降至 0 而变回正常形态，则其正常形态需要承受所有的溢出伤害。只要溢出的伤害没有将该生物正常形态的生命值降为 0，它就不会因打击而陷入昏迷。

该生物可作出的动作因其新形态而有所限制。它不能说话，不能施法，也不能作出其他需要用手和需要说话的动作。

目标的装备融入新形态中，但其不能启动，使用，挥舞或以其他方式从其装备上获得增益。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CjIq8Ed7bu3vVwT1], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.A3q2gTNqG6fvNGrv], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3Lo9boi7P2ro6QV4], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B]

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.OVikYmSdHliAG2YD], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.04nMsTWkIFvkbXlY]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The hag makes two [[/item Bite]] attacks or uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast Contagion. It can also use Warping Caress.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] until the start of the hag’s next turn.

Warping Caress.name: Warping Caress
Warping Caress.description: The hag touches a creature and warps its flesh. The target must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 19 ([[/r 4d6 + 5]]) necrotic damage and gains 1 level of &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]. Until the target’s &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false] level is reduced to 0, its body is warped and twisted, and it has disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws that use Strength or Dexterity. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage only. If a Humanoid dies from this action, the hag can spend 2 days of work to shape its corpse into a Deepdreck, or it can combine it with the corpse of a horse to create a Fleshdobbin.

Coven Magic.name: 集会魔法
Coven Magic.description:
While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the hag can cast one of the following spells, requiring no material components, using the spell’s normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability:

@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.4v2H3hHb3Ph9XLNd]{Augury}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.JGT5bNqu9REL7Fuz]{Find Familiar}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3OZnNhunvRtPOQmH]{Identify}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.SleYkHovQ8NagmeV]{Locate Object}, @UUID[Compendium.the-crooked-moon-2014.tcm2014-player-options.Item.MVzM1hRdci2imGdJ]{Lucky Charm}* (lasts until the hag casts it again, or chooses to end it with no action required), or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ccduLIvutyNqvkgv]{Unseen Servant}. The hag must finish a long rest before using this trait to cast that spell again.

Scoured Filth.name: Scoured Filth
Scoured Filth.description: The hag is burned by soapy water. Treat a bucket or flask of it splashed on the hag as a vial of acid. If the hag is fully immersed in soapy water at the start of its turn, it takes 20 acid damage.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The hag can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Quasit.name: 小恶魔
Quasit.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Invisibility.name: 隐形术
Invisibility.description: 该夸赛魔魔法地变为隐形，直到它发动攻击或使用{威吓 Scare}，或直到其{专注}结束（如同专注于法术）。夸赛魔着装和携带的任何{装备}也会随之隐形。

Claw (Bite in Beast Form).name: 爪击（野兽形态下为啃咬）
Claw (Bite in Beast Form).description:
Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft ., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

The target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or take 5 (2d4) poison damage and become poisoned for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Shapechanger.name: 变形生物
Shapechanger.description:
该夸赛魔可以使用其动作变形术polymorph为形似蝙蝠（速度10尺，飞行术fly40尺）、蜈蚣（40尺，攀爬40尺）或蟾蜍（40尺，游泳40尺）的野兽形态，或恢复其真实形态。除注明的速度变化外，其资料卡在各种形态下均保持不变。

其穿着或携带的任何装备不会被转化。若死亡则恢复真实形态。

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: 该夸赛魔为抵抗法术或其他魔法效应而作的豁免具有优势。

Scare.name: 惊吓
Scare.description:
夸赛魔选择的20尺内单一生物必须进行一次DC 10 感知豁免，豁免失败则陷入恐慌状态1分钟。

目标可以在每个自己的回合结束时重复该豁免，若夸赛魔处于其视线范围内则具有劣势，豁免成功则终止其身上的该效应。

Noble.name: 贵族
Noble.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Breastplate.name: 胸甲
Breastplate.description: 该护甲主要由皮条固定的金属护胸组成。尽管它并没有为四肢提供额外的防护，但其在保证着装者活动自由度的同时，为其生命器官提供了十分有效的保护效果。

Rapier.name: 刺剑
Rapier.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+3 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) piercing damage.

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description: 贵族在被一次近战攻击命中时，其AC加上 2。此时该贵族必须能看见攻击者，且有在持用一把近战武器。

Giant Crocodile.name: 巨鳄鱼
Giant Crocodile.description: 指示物插图由Forgotten Adventures提供。

Hold Breath.name: 屏息
Hold Breath.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以屏息一小时。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动一次 [[/item .mmBite0000000000]] 攻击和一次 [[/item .mmTail0000000000]] 攻击，

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].If the target is a [[lookup @target.affects.special activity=xWlMeXFjELfSUWX9]] creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). While Grappled, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and can't be targeted by the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s Tail.

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description: 若你的生物体型不超过大型，则你陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 15，[[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）。受擒期间，你还会陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态。

Tail.name: 尾击
Tail.description: [[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone apply=false] 状态。

Moonshine.name: Moonshine
Moonshine.description:
Moonshine

Lingering Soul Guide (Broken glass and powdered onyx)

Habitat: Any

Treasure: None

When a person dies with unfinished business, their soul can remain shackled to the living world as an Undead spirit. Usually such spirits rest and move on when their business is concluded, but some remain as companions, guides, and helpers for the living. Moonshines are spirits who resolved their emotional tethers but have chosen to linger on. They often take a liking to a living person and choose to help them through their life’s journey.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The moonshine makes two [[/item Gloomy Touch]] attacks.

Gloomy Touch.name: Gloomy Touch
Gloomy Touch.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Siphon Life.name: 生命虹吸
Siphon Life.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11, one creature that isn’t a Construct or Undead the moonshine can see within 5 feet.

Failure: The target has the &reference[stunned apply=false] condition until the end of the moonshine’s next turn, and the moonshine or a creature of its choice within 30 feet regains 3 ([[/r 1d6]]) Hit Points.

Detect Life.name: 侦测生命
Detect Life.description: The moonshine magically senses the direction of creatures up to 60 feet away that aren’t Constructs or Undead.

Ephemeral.name: 转瞬即逝
Ephemeral.description: The moonshine can’t wear or carry anything.

Illumination.name: 照明
Illumination.description: The moonshine sheds Bright Light in a 15-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 15 feet.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: The moonshine can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Ravencraft.name: Ravencraft
Ravencraft.description:
Ravencraft

Undead Avian Amalgamation (Silver wire)

Habitat: Any

Ravencrafts are a grotesque fusion of feathers, sinew, and bone. Their tiny form is a contorted and twisted nightmare carelessly sewn together into the mockery of a bird. The mere presence of a ravencraft is an affront to natural death and can keep further death at bay, or they can chill the hearts of their foes with cries of torment from beyond the grave.

Beak.name: 喙啄
Beak.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Harbinger Of Doom.name: Harbinger Of Doom
Harbinger Of Doom.description: The ravencraft lets out a wail of anguish commingling with the croaking of ravens. One creature within 60 feet of it must make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) psychic damage, and it is &Reference[Frightened apply=false] until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage only.

Death Veil.name: Death Veil
Death Veil.description: When a creature within 30 feet of the ravencraft makes a death saving throw, the creature has advantage on the save.

Undead Fortitude.name: 不死坚韧
Undead Fortitude.description: If damage reduces the ravencraft to 0 hit points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a successful save, the ravencraft drops to 1 hit point instead.

7rdR1klh875p8ABz.name: The Jinxed Leviathan
7rdR1klh875p8ABz.description:
The Jinxed Leviathan

Curse-Wrought Swamp Monster

Habitat: Coastal, Swamp

Once a normal alligator that dwelled in a cursed swamp, the Jinxed Leviathan was warped by the strange hexes and twisted spells of nefarious magicians who sought to defeat the deathly spirit known as Snake Eye Jack. Growing to colossal proportions and infusing with the essence of misfortune itself, the Monstrosity could not be controlled and devoured its makers. Now, it lurks in the still, black water of hexed bayous, always seeking its next meal, upon which it unleashes its jinxcraft before feasting.

Secret. An idol of the fabled deal maker Snake Eye Jack that has been blessed by one of Jack’s followers can turn the Jinxed Leviathan’s own cursed power against it.

The Jinxed Leviathan’s Lair

The Jinxed Leviathan’s lair is a cursed swamp steeped in confounding magic. If encountered in its lair, the Jinxed Leviathan has a challenge rating of 24 (62,000 XP).

The region containing the Jinxed Leviathan’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Hanging Hex. Within 1 mile of the lair, when a creature other than the Jinxed Leviathan rolls a 1 or a 20 on an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, the next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw the creature makes has disadvantage, and it can’t have advantage.

Murky Waters. Within 1 mile of the lair, swamp water is cloudy and shows fleeting faces in the murk. Creatures in the water have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

If the Jinxed Leviathan dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The leviathan makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and one [[/item Tail]] attack.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 15 ft. Hit:[[/damage average]] damage. The target has the &reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 20), and until the grapple ends, the target has the &reference[Restrained apply=false] condition.

Tail.name: 尾击
Tail.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 20 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &reference[Prone apply=false] condition and is pushed up to 20 feet straight away from the leviathan.

Accursed Breath.name: Accursed Breath
Accursed Breath.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 22, each creature in a 120-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is cursed. The cursed target has Disadvantage on D20 Tests and can’t regain Hit Points. The target can end the curse early if it voluntarily fails a saving throw forced by one of its enemies.

Success: Half damage only.

Swallow.name: 吞咽
Swallow.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 25, one Large or smaller creature &reference[Grappled apply=false] by the leviathan (it can have up to four creatures swallowed at a time).

Failure: The target is swallowed and no longer Grappled. A swallowed creature has the &reference[Blinded apply=false] and &reference[Restrained apply=false] conditions, has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the leviathan, and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of its turns.

If the leviathan takes 50 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the leviathan must succeed on a DC 25 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within 10 feet of the leviathan and has the &reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

If the leviathan dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The leviathan can take 3 legendary actions (4 in Lair), choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The leviathan regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Swamp Surge.name: Swamp Surge
Swamp Surge.description:
The leviathan causes a swell of muddy water and grasping roots.

Strength Saving Throw: DC 20, each creature in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the leviathan.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target’s Speed is 0 until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Failure or Success: The leviathan can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Tail Sweep.name: 扫尾
Tail Sweep.description: The leviathan moves up to half its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and makes one [[/item Tail]] attack.

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description: The Jinxed Leviathan’s lair is a cursed swamp steeped in confounding magic. If encountered in its lair, the Jinxed Leviathan has a challenge rating of 24 (62,000 XP). The region containing the Jinxed Leviathan’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects: If the Jinxed Leviathan dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Hanging Hex.name: Hanging Hex
Hanging Hex.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, when a creature other than the Jinxed Leviathan rolls a 1 or a 20 on an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, the next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw the creature makes has disadvantage, and it can’t have advantage.

Murky Waters.name: Murky Waters
Murky Waters.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, swamp water is cloudy and shows fleeting faces in the murk. Creatures in the water have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks.

Jinxed Hide.name: Jinxed Hide
Jinxed Hide.description:
Trigger: A creature within 60 feet of the leviathan hits it with an attack roll or targets it with a spell.

Response: The triggering creature must succeed on a DC 20 Wisdom saving throw or become cursed until the end of its next turn. The cursed creature has Disadvantage on D20 Tests and can’t regain Hit Points.

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: The leviathan can breathe air and water.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the leviathan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Returned Curse.name: Returned Curse
Returned Curse.description: If the leviathan curses a creature holding an idol of Snake Eye Jack blessed by one of his devoted followers, the creature is unaffected by the curse. The leviathan then takes 20 Radiant damage and has Disadvantage on D20 Tests until the end of its next turn.

Fleshdobbin.name: Fleshdobbin
Fleshdobbin.description:
Fleshdobbin

Flesh-Crafted Amalgam of Knight and Horse

Habitat: Grassland, Hill, Underground, Urban

Fleshdobbins are abominations created when a horse and its rider are horrifically melded through fleshcrafting magic. Their limbs stretch and deform, though afterward, their bodies resist further transformation.

Fitted with saddles and bearing savage weaponry, these monsters may look like riderless horses from a distance, but each leg culminates in oddly human-looking gnarled hands with fingers ending in wicked claws. Their voices are the comingled shrieks of human and horse.

Secret. Affixing a bridle to a fleshdobbin causes the instincts of the horse within the amalgam to take over, becoming a loyal steed once more.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The fleshdobbin makes one [[/item Claw]] attack and one [[/item Wailing Halberd]] attack.

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is knocked &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Wailing Halberd.name: 戟
Wailing Halberd.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Shriek.name: 尖叫
Shriek.description: The fleshdobbin shrieks in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 28 ([[/r 8d6]]) psychic damage and is &Reference[Frightened apply=false] for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only. A &Reference[Frightened apply=false] creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description: When a creature the fleshdobbin can see hits it with a melee attack roll while the fleshdobbin is wielding a Melee weapon, the fleshdobbin adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Chain Mail.name: 链甲
Chain Mail.description: 该护甲由互相锁接的金属环编成。链甲还包括在甲胄下面穿戴的一层织物衬里，用以阻止擦伤并减缓挥击的冲击。此护甲同时还附有护手。

Bridle Binding.name: Bridle Binding
Bridle Binding.description: If a creature puts a bridle on the fleshdobbin (treat as securing manacles), the fleshdobbin is &Reference[Charmed apply=false] while it wears the bridle, and it can’t take the bridle off on its own.

Immutable Form.name: 不变形态
Immutable Form.description: The fleshdobbin is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

Ominous Rend.name: Ominous Rend
Ominous Rend.description:
Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 5 ft.

Hit: 1d6 + 3 plus your Wisdom modifier Necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, it has the &reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the start of your next turn.

Baleful Howl.name: Baleful Howl
Baleful Howl.description:
Trigger: A creature moves out of the grim’s reach.

Response—Wisdom Saving Throw: Your spell save DC, the triggering creature.

Failure: The target’s Speed is 0 until the end of the turn.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: The grim can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The grim takes [[/r 1d10]] force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

Shared Fate.name: 共享特性
Shared Fate.description: Add your proficiency bonus to any ability check or saving throw the grim makes.

8W2SXEs4el1xZXvt.name: Morgan
8W2SXEs4el1xZXvt.description:
指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The druid is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks).

It has the following druid spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): druidcraft, produce flame, shillelagh

1st level (4 slots): entangle, longstrider, speak with animals, thunderwave

2nd level (3 slots): animal messenger, barkskin

Quarterstaff.name: 长棍
Quarterstaff.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +2 to hit (+4 to hit with shillelagh), reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage, or 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage with shillelagh or if wielded with two hands.

Druidcraft.name: 德鲁伊伎俩
Druidcraft.description:
你向自然之魂低语，并创造以下效应之一：

  • 你创造一个微小而无害的感官效应，并以之预报你所在地接下来 24 小时的天气状况。该效应可表现为一个代表晴空的金球，一朵代表雨天的云彩，代表雪日而飘飞的雪花等等。该效应将持续 1 轮。
  • 你可以立即让一朵鲜花绽放，一颗种子破壳，一片叶蕾发芽。
  • 你创造一个微小而无害的即时感官效应，如落叶，微风，小动物的动静或者臭鼬的微弱气味。该效应只能在 5 尺的立方空间内起效。
  • 你可以立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一把火把或一处小篝火。

Produce Flame.name: 燃火术
Produce Flame.description:
一朵摇曳的火焰出现在你手中。火焰在法术持续时间存在，并且不会伤害你和你的装备。火焰为其周边半径 10 尺范围内提供明亮光照，以及该范围外 10 尺的微光光照。法术将在再次施展该法术，或者以一个动作解除法术时终止。

此外，你还可以使用火焰发动攻击，并以此终止该法术。施展该法术时，你可以将火焰投向距你 30 尺内的一个生物，并对其发动一次远程法术攻击，命中时目标将受到 1d8 点火焰伤害。你也可以在施展法术后的随后回合里以一个动作实现该行为。

你到达 5 级时，该法术的伤害增加 1d8（变为 2d8）。11 级时再加 1d8（变为 3d8），17 级时再加 1d8（变为 4d8）。

Entangle.name: 纠缠术
Entangle.description:
在施法距离内的地面上指定一点，并以其为源点蔓延出 20 尺方形区域的杂草和藤蔓。在法术持续时间内，这片被植物覆盖的区域变为困难地形。

在你施展法术时，该区域内的生物必须成功通过一次力量豁免，否则将因为这些缠绕的植物陷入束缚状态，直到法术终止。一个因此被束缚的生物可以使用其动作进行一次力量检定以对抗该法术的豁免 DC，检定成功则摆脱束缚。

法术终止时，所召唤的植物随即枯萎。

Longstrider.name: 大步奔行
Longstrider.description: 你触碰一个生物，该目标速度在法术持续时间内增加 10 尺。

Speak with Animals.name: 动物交谈
Speak with Animals.description: 你在法术持续时间内获得理解野兽并与其沟通的能力。许多野兽智力不高，因此它们的认知水平相当有限，但它们至少能向你提供关于周围地域和怪物的情报，包括任何它们现在以及在前一日内察觉到的东西。你也许可以说服野兽帮你一些小忙，是否成功则由 DM 来判断。

Thunderwave.name: 雷鸣波
Thunderwave.description:
一道雷鸣波从你的身体向外扫去。在以你为源点 15 尺立方区域内的每个生物必须进行一次体质豁免。豁免失败者将受到 2d8 点雷鸣伤害，并被推离 10 尺。豁免成功则伤害减半，且不会被推离。

此外，所有完全位于该区域内且没被固定住的物件都将被自动推离 10 尺。而该法术还会发出方圆 300 尺内都能听见的雷霆巨响。

升环施法：使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Animal Messenger.name: 动物信使
Animal Messenger.description:
该法术令你可以利用动物传递信息。在施法距离内指定一只你能看见的微型野兽（比如松鼠，蓝松鸦，或是蝙蝠）。再选择一个你曾造访过的地点，然后描述收信人的基本信息，如“一个穿着城镇守卫制服的男人或女人”或“一个戴着尖顶帽子的红发矮人”。最后再说出一段不超过二十五个单词的信息。目标野兽将会在法术持续时间内前往你选定的地点。会飞的信使 24 小时内可移动 50 里，不会飞的信使只能移动 25 里。

信使抵达目的地后，会模仿你的声音把信息传递给你描述的人。信使只会把信息传递给符合你描述的人。如果法术持续时间内信使未能抵达目的地则信息将遗失，而曾作为信使的野兽将自行寻路返回你施法的地点。

升环施法：使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，其法术持续时间就增加 48 小时。

Shillelagh.name: 橡棍术
Shillelagh.description: 你将自然之力灌入手中持握的一根短棒或长棍中。你在法术持续时间内使用该武器进行近战攻击时，可以用你的施法属性值代替力量值来进行攻击检定和伤害掷骰，且该武器的伤害骰变为 d8。此外，若该武器原来不是魔法武器，则它将变成魔法武器。你再次施展该法术或丢掉该武器时，该法术也随之终止。

materials.value: 一些槲寄生，一片三叶草叶子，以及一根短棒或长棍

Barkskin.name: 树肤术
Barkskin.description: 你触碰一个自愿生物，并使目标的皮肤在法术终止前呈现粗糙的树皮状外观。期间目标无论着装何种护甲，其 AC 将不会降至 16 以下。

Goatstealer.name: Goatstealer
Goatstealer.description:
Goatstealer

Hungry Livestock Snatcher (Incense and spoiled meat)

Habitat: Desert, Forest, Grassland, Hill

Treasure: None

The hairless, reeking goatstealers are vicious predators and scavengers that earn their name from their habit of preying upon livestock. They latch onto prey with wicked, needle-like teeth, delivering lethal venom and devouring creatures far larger than its wiry frame would suggest is possible. Especially dangerous in packs, the carrion-yet-peaty stench of goatstealers is the stuff of legend.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 12). Until the grapple ends, at the start of each of the goatstealer’s turns, the target takes 3 ([[/r 1d6]]) Poison damage.

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: The goatstealer has Advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the goatstealer’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn’t have the Incapacitated condition.

Stench.name: 恶臭
Stench.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, any creature that starts its turn in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the goatstealer.

Failure: The target has the &reference[poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Success: The target is immune to the Stench of all goatstealers for 1 hour.

Maidenwood.name: Maidenwood
Maidenwood.description:
Maidenwood

Witch-Warped Ambushing Tree

Habitat: Forest, Swamp

Treasure: Individual

Maidenwoods are creatures birthed from tree stumps by old magics, often arising from curses that turn the forest against a transgressor. They scuttle on roots like legs, and the broken trunk becomes a fierce, grinding maw. The maidenwood’s tendrils blossom into lifelike figures it uses to lure its prey close.

Secret. The curse that maintains a maidenwood unravels if one is offered an apple—an ancient trick used by witches turned against them.

Demon of Hunger and Secrets

Resembling a monstrous crow, the corvodaemon’s sleek and twisted form soars on elongated wings tipped with razor-sharp, finger-like claws, its six amber eyes constantly seeking for prey.

Insatiable hunger for both flesh and souls—along with their accumulated secrets—gnaws at these Fiends. Their mimicry lets them take on the voice of those known and trusted by their would-be meals, luring the hapless mortals to their doom.

Secret. Savvy demon hunters bar corvodaemons with warding lines of ash prepared from feathers.

The Wild Titan.name: The Wild Titan
The Wild Titan.description:
The Wild Titan

Ferocious Giant of the Wilderness

Habitat: Arctic, Forest, Hill, Mountain

Wandering the most inhospitable mountain ranges, the Wild Titan is the wilderness made manifest, created long ago by a forgotten will for a purpose that none know. Favoring solitude in the most remote places of the world, when it encounters settlements and “civilized” people, it wants only to turn them to primal savagery or crush them beneath its immense bulk.

Secret. The name of the Wild Titan’s forgotten creator is its undoing. Recovering the lost name and carving its glyph form into a stone creates a zone that severs the titan’s connection to the wild.

The Wild Titan’s Lair

The Wild Titan’s lair is a hollowed-out peak in the mountain range the creature stalks. If encountered in its lair, the Wild Titan has a challenge rating of 22 (41,000 XP).

The region containing the Wild Titan’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Whiteout. Within 1 mile of the lair, there is a 75 percent chance every day of heavy precipitation.

Wild Hunger. Within 1 mile of the lair, creatures always feel ravenously hungry, no matter how much they’ve eaten. A creature that finishes a long rest in this area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion. A creature that doesn’t require food succeeds automatically.

If the Wild Titan dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Multiattack.description: The titan makes two [[/item Massive Fist]] attacks. It can replace one or both attacks with a use of [[/item Thrown Boulder]].

Massive Fist.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 20) from one of two fists and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] until the grapple ends.

Thrown Boulder.description: The titan hurls a boulder at a point it can see within 150 feet of itself. Each creature in a 10-foot radius sphere centered on that point must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 14 ([[/r 4d6]]) bludgeoning damage and is knocked &Reference[Prone apply=false]. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage only.

Wild Roar.description: Each of the titan’s enemies with 100 feet of it must succeed on a DC 19 Wisdom saving throw or be &Reference[Charmed apply=false] until the start of the titan’s next turn. While &Reference[Charmed apply=false] in this way, the creature must use its action to make its most powerful melee or ranged attacks against the nearest creature it can see.

Legendary Actions.description: The titan can take 3 legendary actions (4 in Lair), choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The titan regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Each creature in the projectile’s space, including a hurled creature, must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 19 ([[/r 2d8 + 10]]) bludgeoning damage and is knocked &Reference[Prone apply=false]. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage only.

Lake Dredger.name: Lake Dredger
Lake Dredger.description:
Lake Dredger

Undead Aquatic Monster

Habitat: Coastal, Swamp, Underwater

Treasure: Individual

Lake dredgers are Undead water behemoths, such as whales, giant fish, or dinosaurs. These creatures are reanimated through the deep, primal fear of the unknown horrors that lurk in the murky depths. They dwell in the beds of lakes, rivers, or oceans, dredging up the detritus to replenish their ever-rotting mass.

They also add to their decaying bulk by feeding on living creatures, especially drawn to those who exhibit fear of the deep. Once prey is devoured, it is impaled on its cracked ribs until the waterlogged flesh becomes one with the beast’s.

Secret. Lake dredgers exist because of the fear of the unknown, and their essence is undone in the presence of a captured or crafted depiction of themselves, such as a drawing or carving.

While swallowed, the creature has the &reference[restrained apply=false] condition, has Three-Quarters Cover against attacks and other effects outside the lake dredger, and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of the lake dredger’s turns.

As an action, the swallowed creature can escape through the lake dredger’s ribcage. The creature takes 11 ([[/r 2d10]]) Piercing damage and emerges in a space within 5 feet of the lake dredger.

If the lake dredger dies, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting &reference[prone apply=false].

Depicted Demise.description: The lake dredger takes [[/damage average]] Force damage at the start of its turn if it can see a creature holding a created depiction (such as a drawing, painting, or carving) of the lake dredger.

Doctor Belkin.description:
Wormhost Surgeon

Parasitical Physician

Habitat: Any

Alien parasitic worms that infest the brains of Humanoid bodies mutate their hosts into wormhost surgeons. These aberrant husks are obsessed with anatomical study and with finding new Humanoids to infest with larval worm slurry to propagate their kind. They can pass for ordinary people in most cases but must take care to hide their exposed brains and the wriggling worms within their flesh.

Secret. Wormhost surgeons are drawn to seek out and infest sapient victims, so intelligent creatures with veiled minds slip beneath the surgeons’ notice.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The surgeon makes two [[/item Bone Saw]] attacks.

Bone Saw.name: Bone Saw
Bone Saw.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. On a critical hit, if the target is a creature, its Intelligence score decreases by [[/r 1d4]]. The target dies if this reduces that score to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest.

Infested Spray.name: Infested Spray
Infested Spray.description: The surgeon unleashes a spray of worm-ridden cerebral fluid in a 20-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 17 ([[/r 5d6]]) psychic damage, and it is infested with larval parasitic worms. An infested target takes 7 (2d6) psychic damage at the end of each of its turns as the worms burrow toward its brain. The ongoing damage ends when the target takes poison damage or is targeted by an effect that ends the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only. If the target is reduced to 0 hit points by this psychic damage, the worms reach its brain and it dies. A Humanoid slain in this way rises 24 hours later as a wormhost surgeon.

Protective Parasite.name: Protective Parasite
Protective Parasite.description: When the surgeon is reduced to 0 hit points, the parasite worm emerges from the surgeon’s exposed brain and spits acid in a 20-foot-long, 5-foot-wide line. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Regeneration.description: The surgeon regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns. If it takes poison damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of its next turn. The surgeon dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn’t regenerate.

Veiled Ignorance.name: Veiled Ignorance
Veiled Ignorance.description: A creature whose mind can’t be read, or that is under the effect of a Mind Blank or Nondetection spell, becomes &Reference[Invisible apply=false] toward the surgeon (this ignores the surgeon’s blindsight).

Dingpot.description:
Dingpot

Jovial Cauldron Helper (Spices and rose quartz)

Habitat: Any

Dingpots are animated objects created to assist in magical and alchemical research—or simply to help in the kitchen. Often cheerful, dingpots delight in serving up delicious meals, soothing tea, and the occasional magical draught.

Steam Spray.name: Steam Spray
Steam Spray.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, range 60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the start of the dingpot’s next turn. Being underwater doesn’t grant resistance to this fire damage.

Brew.name: Brew
Brew.description:
The dingpot produces a magical elixir within its vessel. The elixir remains potent for 24 hours. It can choose from the following brews:

  • Healing Draught. As a bonus action, a creature can drink the elixir to regain 4 ([[/r 1d6 + 1]]) hit points.

  • Lucky Draught. As a bonus action, a creature can drink the elixir to gain startling luck for 10 minutes. When the creature fails an ability check or a saving throw, it can reroll the d20 and use the new roll. Once this causes a roll to succeed, the effects of the elixir end early.

Lucky Draught.name: Lucky Draught

Boil And Bubble.name: Boil And Bubble
