The Ghostlight Locomotive.name: The Ghostlight Locomotive
The Ghostlight Locomotive.description:
The Ghostlight Locomotive

Corrupted Ghost Train

Habitat: Any

The Ghostlight Locomotive is the engine of a phantom train that travels unseen between the realms of life and death, ferrying souls of the dead to their afterlife. During its normal operation, the locomotive burns doomed spirits for fuel and races along spectral, misty rails that appear as it travels, and it has little awareness beyond its crucial task.

Only a drastic event, such as the corruption of its soul-made fuel source, can turn the Ghostlight Locomotive from its endless duty, whereupon it stokes a consciousness of the innumerable souls it has burned and vents the fury of the damned upon any obstacles in its path. When pressed, the residue of wicked souls left from the burning of its corrupted fuel overwhelms the engine’s amoral nature, driving it to malevolent and hateful destruction.

The Ghostlight Locomotive’s Lair

The Ghostlight Locomotive’s lair is a 1-mile-radius shrouding mist originating from the locomotive. This mist doesn’t extend within the cars of the Ghostight Express that the locomotive pulls.

The region containing the Ghostlight Locomotive’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Ghastly Shroud. When a creature that isn’t Undead finishes a short or long rest within 1 mile of the locomotive, the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or any time it regains hit points, it only regains half the amount. This effect ends when the creature next finishes a long rest or receives a Lesser Restoration spell or similar magic.

Spirit Calling. Within 1 mile of the locomotive, hostile Shrouded* and Specters are abundant and drawn to any creature that attacks the Ghostlight Locomotive or that tries to keep pace with, climb, or enter the Ghostlight Express.

If the Ghostlight Locomotive dies, these effects end immediately.

Multiattack (Crooked Switch Only).name: Multiattack (Crooked Switch Only)
Multiattack (Crooked Switch Only).description: The locomotive makes two [[/item Rail Slam]] attacks.

Rail Slam.name: Rail Slam
Rail Slam.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target is pushed up to 10 feet straight away.

Spirit Exhaust.name: Spirit Exhaust
Spirit Exhaust.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 30-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The locomotive can take 2 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The locomotive regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Ghostly Rails.name: Ghostly Rails
Ghostly Rails.description: The locomotive moves up to half its Speed in a straight line without provoking Opportunity Attacks. A Large or smaller creature whose space it passes through has the &reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 14) from the spectral rails.

Haunting Whistle.name: Haunting Whistle
Haunting Whistle.description:
The locomotive blows its wailing steam whistle.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature within 30 feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Failure or Success: The locomotive can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description: The Ghostlight Locomotive’s lair is a 1-mile-radius shrouding mist originating from the locomotive. This mist doesn’t extend within the cars of the Ghostight Express that the locomotive pulls. The region containing the Ghostlight Locomotive’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects: If the Ghostlight Locomotive dies, these effects end immediately.

Ghastly Shroud.name: Ghastly Shroud
Ghastly Shroud.description: When a creature that isn’t Undead finishes a short or long rest within 1 mile of the locomotive, the creature must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or any time it regains hit points, it only regains half the amount. This effect ends when the creature next finishes a long rest or receives a Lesser Restoration spell or similar magic.

Spirit Calling.name: Spirit Calling
Spirit Calling.description: Within 1 mile of the locomotive, hostile Shrouded* and Specters are abundant and drawn to any creature that attacks the Ghostlight Locomotive or that tries to keep pace with, climb, or enter the Ghostlight Express.

Crooked Switch.name: Crooked Switch
Crooked Switch.description: When the locomotive has half its hit points or fewer, it regains all expended uses of Legendary Resistance and enters a malevolent form for 12 hours. In this form, it is chaotic evil and can use its Multiattack action.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the locomotive fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Finneas Trout.name: Finneas Trout
Finneas Trout.description:
指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Club.name: 短棒
Club.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+2 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

Giant Centipede.name: 巨蜈蚣
Giant Centipede.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+4 to hit,, 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

The target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or take 10 (3d6) poison damage. If the poison damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the target is stable but poisoned for 1 hour, even after regaining hit points, and is paralyzed while poisoned in this way.

Squabswarm.name: Squabswarm
Squabswarm.description:
Squabswarm

Peeping Fey Pigeons

Habitat: Mountain, Planar (Fey), Urban

Fey messengers that take the form of pigeons can gather into flocks, or squabswarms. Hags and other influential Fey use squabswarms as spies and messengers—and sometimes as unerring trackers to locate any who flee responsibility or judgement.

Secret. Squabswarms’ drive to deliver letters or parcels is overwhelming, and they can be confused by delivery requests.

Peck.name: 啄击
Peck.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, or 2 ([[/r 1d4]]) piercing damage if the swarm has half its hit points or fewer. If the swarm has over half its hit points and the target is a creature, the target is &Reference[Charmed apply=false] until the start of the swarm’s next turn.

Many Eyes, One Voice.name: Many Eyes, One Voice
Many Eyes, One Voice.description: When a creature who tasked the swarm to deliver an item and who is on the same plane as the swarm takes an action to see through the swarm, the swarm becomes a scrying sensor as if the creature cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.fVbCxFRaORalHB20]{Scrying}. For the spell’s duration, the creature can speak through the swarm.

Compelled Delivery.name: Compelled Delivery
Compelled Delivery.description: As an action, a creature can direct the swarm to deliver a letter or parcel (which the creature must provide) to a recipient the creature knows. The swarm is &Reference[Charmed apply=false] until it delivers the item to the specified recipient or until it takes damage. While &Reference[Charmed apply=false] in this way, the swarm must deliver the item to the specified recipient if it knows where the recipient is.

Swarm.name: 集群
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny pigeon. The swarm can’t regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Unerring Delivery.name: Unerring Delivery
Unerring Delivery.description: If the swarm is tasked to deliver an item to a creature, the swarm knows the distance and direction to the creature while they are on the same plane.

CW2C95QJ23zBd3UI.name: The Songstress
CW2C95QJ23zBd3UI.description:
Wayward Haint

Lost Soul Bound to Regret

Habitat: Any

Treasure: None

Wayward haints are restless spirits stuck between the realms of the living and the dead. Be it a curse or an unresolved conflict from their previous life, a haint can’t rest until their unfinished business is resolved.

Haints only show hints of who they were in life, taking on a more symbolic form related to the hurt or loss they can’t let go of. They tend to repeat their monotonous actions—often imitating those performed in life or reenacting their sorrow—over and over for eternity. When provoked, they can display a volatile temper and lash out with a crushing wave of the grief and indecision that binds their spirit.

Secret. Wayward haints can be trapped in empty bottles if they’re tricked or forced to pass over one.

Bottle Trap.name: Bottle Trap
Bottle Trap.description: A haint that enters the space of an upright, empty bottle must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or be drawn into the bottle, and a cork or stopper appears to close the bottle. The trapped haint can see and hear through the bottle out to 10 feet, and any creature in that range can hear the haint. The haint is released if the bottle breaks or another creature opens it.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: The haint can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn inside a solid object.

Draining Regret.name: Draining Regret
Draining Regret.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains 1 &reference[exhaustion apply=false] level. This can’t raise the target’s Exhaustion level above 5, and all Exhaustion levels gained from this action end when the target finishes a Short or Long Rest, or if it receives a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{Lesser Restoration} spell or similar magic

CgbJgAILFFyH25Oi.name: Fleshdobbin
CgbJgAILFFyH25Oi.description:
Fleshdobbin

Flesh-Crafted Amalgam of Knight and Horse

Habitat: Grassland, Hill, Underground, Urban

Treasure: Armaments

Fleshdobbins are abominations created when a horse and its rider are horrifically melded through fleshcrafting magic. Their limbs stretch and deform, though afterward, their bodies resist further transformation.

Fitted with saddles and bearing savage weaponry, these monsters may look like riderless horses from a distance, but each leg culminates in oddly human-looking gnarled hands with fingers ending in wicked claws. Their voices are the comingled shrieks of human and horse.

Secret. Affixing a bridle to a fleshdobbin causes the instincts of the horse within the amalgam to take over, becoming a loyal steed once more.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The fleshdobbin makes one [[/item Claw]] attack and one [[/item Wailing Halberd]] attack.

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &reference[prone apply=false] condition.

Wailing Halberd.name: 戟
Wailing Halberd.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 15 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Shriek.name: 尖叫
Shriek.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 30-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. In addition, the target has the &reference[frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Success: Half damage only.

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
Trigger: A creature the fleshdobbin can see hits it with a melee attack roll while the fleshdobbin is wielding a Melee weapon.

Response: The fleshdobbin adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Chain Mail.name: 链甲
Chain Mail.description: 该护甲由互相锁接的金属环编成。链甲还包括在甲胄下面穿戴的一层织物衬里，用以阻止擦伤并减缓挥击的冲击。此护甲同时还附有护手。

Bridle Binding.name: Bridle Binding
Bridle Binding.description: If a creature puts a bridle on the fleshdobbin (treat as securing @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.items.Item.tWJLHIL6ZIZUez9k]{Manacles}), the fleshdobbin has the &reference[charmed apply=false] condition while it wears the bridle, and it can’t take the bridle off on its own.

Acolyte.name: 侍僧
Acolyte.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Spellcasting.name: 施法Spellcasting
Spellcasting.description: The acolyte is a 1st-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 12, +4 to hit with spell attacks). The acolyte has following cleric spells prepared:• Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy• 1st level (3 slots): bless, cure wounds, sanctuary

Club.name: 短棒
Club.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+2 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

Light.name: 光亮术light
Light.description:
你触碰一个大型或者更小，且未被他人携带或着装的物件。在法术终止前，物件将在其 20 尺半径范围内发出明亮光照，并在其外 20 尺范围发出微光光照。光的颜色由你决定。该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。若你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

若你将一名敌对生物持有或穿戴的物件作为目标，该生物必须成功通过敏捷豁免检定，否则法术生效。

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或磷光苔藓。

Sacred Flame.name: 圣火术
Sacred Flame.description:
如同火焰般的辉光向施法距离内你能看见的一个生物倾泻而下。目标必须要进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。目标在这次豁免检定中无法获得半掩护和四分之三掩护的增益。

戏法强化： 该法术的伤害会在你达到下列等级时增加 1d8：5 级（2d8），11 级（3d8），17 级 1d8（4d8）。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内创造出下列魔法效应之一：

  • 你的声音在 1 分钟内变得比常人响两倍。
  • 你在 1 分钟内使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色。
  • 你使地面震动 1 分钟（完全无害）。
  • 你使某种声音自施法距离内一点瞬间发出，例如雷鸣声，鸦叫声或不祥的低语声。
  • 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗瞬间打开或关上。
  • 你在 1 分钟内改变自己眼睛的颜色。

多次施展该法术时，你可以同时维持最多三个持续 1 分钟的效应。你也可以用一个动作驱散其中一种效应。

Bless.name: 祝福术
Bless.description:
你用言语祝福施法距离内至多三个生物。在法术终止前，每当受术目标进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，可以额外掷一次 d4 并加在其结果上。

升环施法：使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就可以多指定一个目标。

Sanctuary.name: 庇护术
Sanctuary.description:
你的法术保护一个施法距离内的生物不受攻击。在法术终止前，任何试图对受保护者进行攻击或对受保护者施放伤害性法术的生物都必须进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败则该生物必须选定一个新目标，否则将失去本次的攻击或法术。该法术不能保护受术者免受范围效应（如爆炸或火球）的影响。

若受保护生物发动一次攻击，施展一道影响敌人的法术，或是对任何其他生物造成伤害，则该法术随之终止。

Cure Wounds.name: 疗伤术
Cure Wounds.description:
一个你触碰的生物恢复特定数值的生命值，其恢复量等于 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值。该法术对不死生物和构装生物无效。

升环施法：使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，恢复量就增加 1d8。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .w3cX0piuU875Hc2M]] 和 [[/item .2TB9ZSIbtbi4UtSv]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]]在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 其对抗那次攻击时的AC +[[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]（可能令那次攻击失手）。

Use.name: 使用
Use.condition: 在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中

CwhH1UpLfAWahAes.name: Crowstorm
CwhH1UpLfAWahAes.description:
Crowstorm

Fiendish Murder

Habitat: Grassland, Planar (Lower Planes), Urban

Treasure: None

A crowstorm is a great, swirling mass of dark feathers accompanied constant, harshly malevolent crow calls. Hundreds of fiendish birds fly in unison, their beady eyes dripping blood as they swoop down to tear at the flesh of their victims. A crowstorm’s horrific caws mingle into an eerie cacophony of pleading whispers, and it robs the gift of flight from anything that draws too close.

Secret. While they might take the form of crows or possess crow bodies, crowstorms are held at bay by drawn images or crafted effigies of crows.

Peck.name: 啄击
Peck.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, or 7 ([[/r 1d8 + 3]]) Piercing damage if the swarm is Bloodied. If the target is a creature, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of the swarm’s next turn.

Cacophony.name: 不谐和音
Cacophony.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the swarm.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the start of the swarm’s next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

False Crows.name: False Crows
False Crows.description: The swarm can’t enter a space with a drawn or painted image or crafted effigy of a crow. A creature holding such an icon has Advantage on saving throws the swarm forces it to make.

Swarm.name: 集群
Swarm.description: The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny crow. The swarm can’t regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

Wing Bind.name: Wing Bind
Wing Bind.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 13, any creature (other than a Fiend) with a Fly Speed that starts its turn in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the swarm.

Failure: The target’s Fly Speed is 0 until the start of its next turn.

Bat Hound.name: Bat Hound
Bat Hound.description:
Bat Hound

Bloodthirsty Hunter of the Night

Habitat: Forest, Mountain, Underground, Urban

Bat hounds are created through blood magic rituals that manipulate the curse of vampirism to transform a hound into a relentless stalker. Unswervingly loyal companions, bat hounds aid vampiric masters in tracking prey, able to outrun horses and their riders once they smell blood. They seek out stragglers or quarry that are escaping during a hunt and drag them back for capture.

Secret. Running water keeps bat hounds at bay and can destroy them, a lingering remnant from the vampiric curse that spawned them.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a creature, the bat hound regains a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage taken, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 13).

Outmaneuver.name: Outmaneuver
Outmaneuver.description: The bat hound takes the Dash and Disengage actions, and until the end of the turn, needn’t spend extra movement to move a creature it is grappling.

Safe Descent.name: Safe Descent
Safe Descent.description: When the bat hound takes damage from a fall and isn’t wearing heavy armor, it extends its wings and reduces the fall’s damage to 0.

Barred By Water.name: Barred By Water
Barred By Water.description: The bat hound can’t willingly move into running water or to a space up to 20 feet above running water. If it starts its turn in running water, it takes 10 acid damage and is &Reference[Frightened apply=false] until the start of its next turn.

Glide.name: 滑翔
Glide.description: If it isn’t &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] and isn’t wearing heavy armor, the bat hound can extend its membranous wings to move up to 5 feet horizontally for every 1 foot it descends in the air.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The bat hound can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Crooked Effigy.name: Crooked Effigy
Crooked Effigy.description:
Crooked Effigy

Splinter of Crooked Power

Habitat: Forest, Planar (Fey)

Crooked effigies are servants of a twisted archfey known as the Crooked Queen. They are made of gnarled wood and show some bipedal and feminine features in their queen’s image. Crooked effigies impale their enemies with their branch-like arms and drag foes in close, where the thorns on their bodies carry the sting of a victim’s own corruption.

Secret. Crooked effigies are bound to the Old Ways, and they recoil from the tools of forging and tinkering—symbols of a growing civilization.

Impale.name: 穿刺
Impale.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 13) from one of two branch arms. Until the grapple ends, the target is &Reference[Restrained apply=false].

Crooked Thorns.name: Crooked Thorns
Crooked Thorns.description: At the start of each of its turns, the effigy deals 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) psychic damage to any creature it is grappling or any creature grappling it.

Old Bindings.name: Old Bindings
Old Bindings.description: The effigy takes an extra 10 force damage if it’s hit by an attack roll using smith’s tools or tinker’s tools (treat as a club or light hammer).

Adelaide Langtree.name: Adelaide Langtree
Adelaide Langtree.description:
指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Leather Armor.name: 皮甲
Leather Armor.description: 该护甲的护胸和护肩由通过油煮硬化的皮子制成。护甲的其余部分则由更软更灵活的材料制作。

Dark Devotion.name: 黑暗忠诚
Dark Devotion.description: 邪教徒为抵抗魅惑和恐慌而进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Scimitar.name: 弯刀
Scimitar.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+3 to hit,, 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

Drakkenhob.name: Drakkenhob
Drakkenhob.description:
Drakkenhob

Dragon Disguised as a Festival Horse

Habitat: Grasslands, Hills, Urban

The drakkenhob is a draconic monster with a sinister disguise, presenting itself as an actor wearing a horse costume, such as a mounted knight or a festively clad rider. Its draconic head resembles a decorated or armored horse’s head, and its sharp teeth fit together to appear like blunt, harmless decorations. The drakkenhob uses this benign guise to get close to its prey, which are typically within crowds near festivals or parades, before it summons its similarly garbed hunting hounds and strikes. Its breath is a blood-curdling wave of terror that makes lesser victims drop dead from fright alone.

Secret. Unable to resist revelry and merriment, drakkenhob are driven away by payment offered in gold or alcohol.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The drakkenhob makes two [[/item Rend]] attacks.

Rend.name: 撕裂
Rend.description: 近战武器攻击: [[/attack]] 命中, 触及5尺, 单一目标。命中: [[/damage average]] 伤害。

Terrifying Breath.name: Terrifying Breath
Terrifying Breath.description: The drakkenhob breathes waves of panic in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 14 ([[/r 4d6]]) psychic damage, and it drops whatever it is holding and becomes &Reference[Frightened apply=false] for 1 minute. A &Reference[Frightened apply=false] target takes the Dash action and moves away from the drakkenhob by the safest route on each of its turns unless there’s nowhere to move. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only. A &Reference[Frightened apply=false] creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Call The Hounds.name: Call The Hounds
Call The Hounds.description: The drakkenhob lets out a wolf-like howl and magically summons three hunting hounds (use the Wolf stat block) that appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of it. The hounds take their turn immediately after the drakkenhob on the same initiative count, and they obey the drakkenhob’s mental commands. The hounds vanish when they or the drakkenhob drop to 0 hit points, or when the drakkenhob uses this bonus action again.

Irresistible Payment.name: Irresistible Payment
Irresistible Payment.description: As an action, a creature that offers the drakkenhob alcohol or any amount of gold and succeeds on a DC 16 Charisma (Persuasion) check forces the drakkenhob to accept the offer and immediately use its reaction to move up to half its speed to get away from the creature by the safest route possible.

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
触发： [[lookup @name lowercase]]在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中。

响应： [[lookup @name lowercase]] 其对抗那次攻击时的AC +[[lookup @roll.formula activity=aLG3BRZL7P6OEjwd]]（可能令那次攻击失手）。

Use.name: 使用
Use.condition: 在持握武器期间因近战攻击检定被命中

Ghast.name: 妖鬼
Ghast.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Stench.name: 恶臭
Stench.description: 任何在妖鬼5尺内开始其回合的生物必须进行一次DC 10体质豁免，否则将中毒直至其下一回合开始。若豁免成功，该生物将在24小时内免疫妖鬼的恶臭。

Turn Defiance.name: 回合反抗
Turn Defiance.description: 该妖鬼和其30尺内的任何食尸鬼在对抗驱散不死生物turn undead的效应时进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+3 to hit,, 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage.

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+5 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.

If the target is a creature other than an undead, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

The Crimson Abbot.name: The Crimson Abbot
The Crimson Abbot.description:
The Crimson Abbot

Unholy Crusader of Blood

Habitat: Hill, Mountain, Urban

In life, the Crimson Abbot was a virtuous crusader named Sir Marius Renathyr but was seduced by the sweet whispers of an archdevil of deceit and pride who masqueraded as a goddess of righteousness. On the brink of death, the abbot accepted the whispered offer for eternal life, and in so doing, was transformed into a creature of unbearable pride with an unquenchable thirst for blood. He continues to work in the name of his “goddess” and has gathered a fanatically loyal congregation eager for his promise of pure, everlasting life.

Secret. The Crimson Abbot’s pride is nearly unshakable, but seeing a true reminder of the righteous man he once was can crack his façade.

The Crimson Abbot’s Lair

The Crimson Abbot’s lair is a blood-soaked monastery where unworthy mortals are burned in sacrifice, and vampire minions study truths hidden in blood.

The region containing the Crimson Abbot’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Fresh Blood. Within 1 mile of the lair, spilled blood doesn’t dry out or coagulate, instead remaining fresh for 24 hours.

Incinerate Heresy. Within 1 mile of the lair, when an enemy of the abbot’s takes fire damage, that creature starts burning, taking 2 (1d4) damage at the start of its next turn.

If the Crimson Abbot dies or moves his lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The abbot casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDisguiseSe]{Disguise Self} (can appear as a Medium Humanoid, 24-hour duration), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplWordofReca]{Word of Recall} (to lair only)

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The abbot makes two [[/item Sanguine Blade]] attacks. He can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Blood Call]].

Sanguine Blade.name: Sanguine Blade
Sanguine Blade.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Blood Call.name: 鲜血呼唤
Blood Call.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature other than a Construct or Undead within 30 feet.

Failure: 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage, and the target’s Hit Point maximum is reduced by the damage taken.

Success: Half damage only.

Failure or Success: The abbot regains Hit Points equal to the damage taken. A Humanoid reduced to 0 Hit Points by this damage and then buried rises the following sunset as a @UUID[Compendium.the-crooked-moon-2024.tcm2024-bestiary.Actor.6syYfa3idD1RDhwX]{Crimson Clergy}* under the abbot’s control.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The abbot can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The abbot regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

Castigate.name: 惩奸除恶
Castigate.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, one creature within 60 feet.

Failure: The target has the &reference[Frightened apply=false] condition and repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Bloody Strike.name: Bloody Strike
Bloody Strike.description: The abbot moves up to half his Speed and makes one [[/item Sanguine Blade]] attack.

Overwhelm.name: 压制
Overwhelm.description: The abbot casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000]{Command}. He can’t take this action again until the start of his next turn.

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description: The Crimson Abbot’s lair is a blood-soaked monastery where unworthy mortals are burned in sacrifice, and vampire minions study truths hidden in blood. The region containing the Crimson Abbot’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects: If the Crimson Abbot dies or moves his lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Fresh Blood.name: Fresh Blood
Fresh Blood.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, spilled blood doesn’t dry out or coagulate, instead remaining fresh for 24 hours.

Incinerate Heresy.name: Incinerate Heresy
Incinerate Heresy.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, when an enemy of the abbot’s takes fire damage, that creature starts burning, taking 2 ([[/r 1d4]]) damage at the start of its next turn.

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description:
Trigger: The abbot is hit by an attack roll while holding a weapon.

Response: The abbot adds 3 to his AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Half Plate Armor.name: 半身板甲
Half Plate Armor.description: 板甲由覆盖全身，且相互连接的模铸金属板组成。一套板甲包括护手、重皮靴、一顶附面甲的头盔以及在护甲底层的厚重的布甲。其锁扣和皮带结构可以将护甲重量分配到身体各处。

Honor Lost.name: Honor Lost
Honor Lost.description: If a creature takes a bonus action to present a memento or recite a reminder of the abbot’s past and succeeds on a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check, the abbot has disadvantage on the next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw he makes before the start of the creature’s next turn.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the abbot fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The abbot can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity.name: 日照超敏
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.description: The abbot takes 20 radiant damage if he starts his turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, he has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你 5 尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Disguise Self.name: 易容术
Disguise Self.description:
你改变自身以及随身的衣物、护甲、武器等在你身上的所有物。该效应在法术终止时结束。肉眼看来你的身高可以有 1 尺的增减，体态可胖可瘦。你必须选择一个和你肢体基础排列方式一致的形态。此外，幻术的影响范围由你决定。

此法术产生的变化无法应对物理检查。比如，你用此法术添了一顶帽子，那么现实物件会从帽子穿过去，且任何触碰帽子的人将摸不到任何东西。

如果一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Disguised.name: 乔装
Disguised.description: 一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Word of Recall.name: 回返真言
Word of Recall.description:
你和你身边 5 尺内的至多五个自愿生物一起瞬间传送到一个你事先设置好的圣殿。你和与你一起传送的生物将出现在你准备圣殿时指定的地点（见下）旁边最近的未被占据位置。如果你在施放法术前没有事先准备好圣殿，则该法术将不产生任何效应。

你必须指定一个例如一座寺庙的地方，作为圣殿，在那里施放法术。

affects.special: 你和你身边 5 尺内的至多五名自愿生物

Witchwoven.name: Witchwoven
Witchwoven.description:
Witchwoven

Helper Made of Twine and Twigs (Ruby wrapped in a wicker cage)

Habitat: Any

Treasure: None

Witchwoven are little dolls or effigies made of sticks, twine, and other simple materials, then imbued with life. Some happen naturally in places suffused with old nature magic, but most are created to serve as familiars by spellcasters knowledgeable in the Old Ways.

Cursed Scratch.name: Cursed Scratch
Cursed Scratch.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a creature, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of the witchwoven’s next turn.

Protective Bond.name: 保护联结
Protective Bond.description:
Trigger: A creature the witchwoven can see within 60 feet takes damage.

Response: The creature gains Resistance to the triggering damage, and the witchwoven takes [[/damage average]] damage.

EgOcJTcdyvZzkVso.name: Marianna Grey
EgOcJTcdyvZzkVso.description:
指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .jdOlqVzYs89JuqTB]] 和 [[/item .qhM3PIWgXdyRCeul]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Sacred Flame.name: 圣火术
Sacred Flame.description:
如同火焰般的辉光向施法距离内你能看见的一个生物倾泻而下。目标必须要进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。目标在这次豁免检定中无法获得半掩护和四分之三掩护的增益。

戏法强化： 该法术的伤害会在你达到下列等级时增加 1d8：5 级（2d8），11 级（3d8），17 级 1d8（4d8）。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内创造出下列魔法效应之一：

  • 你的声音在 1 分钟内变得比常人响两倍。
  • 你在 1 分钟内使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色。
  • 你使地面震动 1 分钟（完全无害）。
  • 你使某种声音自施法距离内一点瞬间发出，例如雷鸣声，鸦叫声或不祥的低语声。
  • 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗瞬间打开或关上。
  • 你在 1 分钟内改变自己眼睛的颜色。

多次施展该法术时，你可以同时维持最多三个持续 1 分钟的效应。你也可以用一个动作驱散其中一种效应。

Guiding Bolt.name: 光导箭
Guiding Bolt.description:
一道闪光射向射程内你指定的一个生物。对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标受到4d6光耀伤害，并且在你下一回合结束前，由于目标身上闪烁的神秘微光，在此期间对目标进行的下一次攻击检定具有优势。

升环效果。 当你使用2环或更高法术位施展该法术时，使用的法术位每比1环高一环，伤害就增加1d6。

Sanctuary.name: 庇护术
Sanctuary.description:
你的法术保护一个施法距离内的生物不受攻击。在法术终止前，任何试图对受保护者进行攻击或对受保护者施放伤害性法术的生物都必须进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败则该生物必须选定一个新目标，否则将失去本次的攻击或法术。该法术不能保护受术者免受范围效应（如爆炸或火球）的影响。

若受保护生物发动一次攻击，施展一道影响敌人的法术，或是对任何其他生物造成伤害，则该法术随之终止。

Lesser Restoration.name: 次级复原术
Lesser Restoration.description: 你触碰一个生物，并终止正影响它的一种状态：&Reference[blinded]、&Reference[deafened]、&Reference[paralyzed] 或 &Reference[poisoned]。

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器spiritual weapon
Spiritual Weapon.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Spirit Guardians.name: 灵体卫士
Spirit Guardians.description:
在法术持续时间内，保护性的灵体环绕在你的周围 15 尺灵光范围内飞舞。如果你属于善良或中立阵营，则它们飘渺的身形看起来像是天使或精类生物（由你选择）。如果你属于邪恶阵营，则它们将形如邪魔。

施展此法术时，你可以指定特定生物让其不受该法术影响。除此之外的生物在灵光区域内将受法术影响致速度被减半。当灵光进入一个生物的空间、一个生物进入灵光或在灵光内结束回合时，其必须进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败将受到 3d8 点光耀伤害（如果你属于善良或中立）或 3d8 点暗蚀伤害（如果你属于邪恶），豁免成功则只受到半数伤害。一名生物一回合仅需进行一次该豁免。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比三环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
你触碰一个大型或者更小，且未被他人携带或着装的物件。在法术终止前，物件将在其 20 尺半径范围内发出明亮光照，并在其外 20 尺范围发出微光光照。光的颜色由你决定。该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。若你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

若你将一名敌对生物持有或穿戴的物件作为目标，该生物必须成功通过敏捷豁免检定，否则法术生效。

materials.value: 一团萤火虫或者磷光苔藓

Cure Wounds.name: 疗伤术
Cure Wounds.description:
一个你触碰的生物恢复特定数值的生命值，其恢复量等于 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值。该法术对不死生物和构装生物无效。

升环施法：使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，恢复量就增加 1d8。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .hRwqUlEyM9TjOmHy]] 或 [[/item .mmRadiantFlame00]] 发动共计两次攻击。

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpiritGuar]{Spirit Guardians}

kUSS5tMXnfHq9JmJ.name: 光亮术light
kUSS5tMXnfHq9JmJ.description:

该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。如果你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

b8X5GRzIiD6KcwUa.description:

Divine Aid.name: 至圣援护
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Bless.name: 祝福术
Bless.description:
你祝福施法范围内至多 3 个生物。在法术终止前，每当受术目标进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展此法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就能多指定一个生物。

Blessed.name: 祝福
Blessed.description: 在法术终止前，每当你进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

oni5fARI4DH2ABoI.name: 解除魔法
oni5fARI4DH2ABoI.description:
Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target ends. For each ongoing spell of level 4 or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability (DC 10 plus that spell's level). On a successful check, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You automatically end a spell on the target if the spell's level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you use.

Healing Word.name: 治愈真言
Healing Word.description:
你指定施法距离内一个你能看见的生物并恢复其生命值，恢复量等于 2d4 + 你的施法属性调整值。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d4 点。

Zog3yDg2JGPhFtw0.name: 次级复原术
Zog3yDg2JGPhFtw0.description: 你触碰一个生物，并终止正影响它的一种状态：&Reference[blinded]、&Reference[deafened]、&Reference[paralyzed] 或 &Reference[poisoned]。

Reveler of Stories.name: Reveler of Stories
Reveler of Stories.description:
Reveler of Stories

Fiend of Legend and Folklore

Habitat: Planar (Lower Planes), Urban

Treasure: Arcana

Timeless stories have inspired countless mortals, and the echoes of those stories in the Lower Planes have spawned fiendish embodiments of those tales—the revelers of stories. These Fiends twist the themes of their tales, turning inspiration into doom. The revelers’ forms and powers change depending on the theme of stories they embody. Great beast revelers of stories rise from tales of terrible monsters. Hero revelers of stories embody the exploits of knights and other mighty heroes. Witch revelers of stories bring to life tales of wicked witches, wizards, and other magicians.

Secret. Revelers of stories exist because of fables, legends, and other tales, and reciting the moral of a story related to the reveler’s theme robs the reveler of its potency.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The reveler makes three [[/item Thrash]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Fabled Assault if available.

Thrash.name: 猛砸
Thrash.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Fabled Assault.name: Fabled Assault
Fabled Assault.description:
The reveler uses the option determined by its Storied Form:

  • Consuming Bite (Great Beast Only). Constitution Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature within 5 feet (with Disadvantage if the reveler is grappling the target).

    Failure: 36 ([[/r 8d8]]) Necrotic damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, it has the &reference[grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 15), and it has the &reference[restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

    Success: Half damage only.

    Failure or Success: The reveler gains Temporary Hit Points equal to the Necrotic damage taken.

  • Heroic Charge (Hero Only). The reveler moves up to its Speed in a straight line without provoking Opportunity Attacks, and it can move through other creatures without expending extra movement to do so.

    Strength Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature whose space the reveler enters.

    Failure: 26 ([[/r 4d12]]) Force damage, and the target has the &reference[prone apply=false] condition.

    Success: Half damage only.

  • Wicked Storm (Witch Only). Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in a 60-foot Cone.

    Failure: 27 ([[/r 6d8[[) Lightning damage, and the target has the &reference[frightened apply=false] condition. While Frightened in this way, the target’s Speed is 0. A Frightened target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

    Success: Half damage only.

Dramatic Reversal.name: Dramatic Reversal
Dramatic Reversal.description:
Trigger: The reveler is hit by an attack roll.

Response: The reveler adds 4 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Moral Quandary.name: Moral Quandary
Moral Quandary.description: As a Bonus Action, a creature can recite the moral of a story using the same theme as the reveler’s Storied Form to weaken it for 1 hour. While weakened, the reveler can’t take Reactions, and its AC is reduced by 4.

Storied Form.name: Storied Form
Storied Form.description: The reveler takes on a specific form: Great Beast, Hero, or Witch. The form determines certain traits and the theme of stories the reveler embodies (powerful monsters, brave heroes, or wicked magicians, respectively).

Terror Feeding (Witch Only).name: Terror Feeding (Witch Only)
Terror Feeding (Witch Only).description: If there is at least one creature with the &reference[frightened apply=false] condition within 30 feet of the reveler at the end of its turn, the reveler gains 15 Temporary Hit Points.

Rotweaver.name: Rotweaver
Rotweaver.description:
Rotweaver

Fey Thrall of Rot

Habitat: Forest, Planar (Fey), Swamp

Rotweavers were Fey caretakers of the natural world or fey planes who’ve been corrupted by the power of rot. Rotweavers serve powerful beings of withering and blight as minor acolytes and hunters, working to spread the bounds of their beloved decay.

Secret. The rotweavers’ fey nature still holds; binding them with iron, such as manacles or a chain, mutes their strength.

Staff.name: 杖击
Staff.description: 近战武器攻击: [[/attack]] 命中, 触及5尺, 单一目标。命中: [[/damage average]] 伤害。

Call The Rot (Requires Hunting Horn).name: Call The Rot  (Requires Hunting Horn)
Call The Rot (Requires Hunting Horn).description: The rotweaver blows its horn, unleashing rot in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in the area must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 11 ([[/r 2d10]]) necrotic damage and is &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage only. The horn call is audible out to 300 feet, and any non-creature plants in the cone die from fungus and rot.

Fungal Step.name: Fungal Step
Fungal Step.description: The rotweaver ignores difficult terrain caused by plants or fungi.

Hunting Horn.name: Hunting Horn
Hunting Horn.description: The rotweaver carries a hunting horn. The horn has AC 16, HP 10, and immunity to necrotic, poison, and psychic damage.

Iron Binding.name: Iron Binding
Iron Binding.description: If the rotweaver has iron wrapped around a part of its body, such as an iron bracelet, manacles, or chain (treat any of them as applying manacles), the rotweaver can only do one of the following on its turn: move, take an action, or take a bonus action.

FhM50yCQ3EKulcwA.name: Randall Graham
FhM50yCQ3EKulcwA.description:
指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Leather Armor.name: 皮甲
Leather Armor.description: 该护甲的护胸和护肩由通过油煮硬化的皮子制成。护甲的其余部分则由更软更灵活的材料制作。

Dark Devotion.name: 黑暗忠诚
Dark Devotion.description: 邪教狂信者为抵抗魅惑和恐慌而进行的豁免检定具有优势。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The fanatic is a 4th-level spellcaster. Its spell casting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11, +3 to hit with spell attacks).

The fanatic has the following cleric spells prepared:

Cantrips (at will): light, sacred flame, thaumaturgy

1st level (4 slots): command, inflict wounds, shield of faith

2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 邪教狂信者发动两次近战攻击。

Dagger.name: 匕首
Dagger.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
你触碰一个大型或者更小，且未被他人携带或着装的物件。在法术终止前，物件将在其 20 尺半径范围内发出明亮光照，并在其外 20 尺范围发出微光光照。光的颜色由你决定。该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。若你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

若你将一名敌对生物持有或穿戴的物件作为目标，该生物必须成功通过敏捷豁免检定，否则法术生效。

materials.value: 一团萤火虫或者磷光苔藓

Sacred Flame.name: 圣火术
Sacred Flame.description:
如同火焰般的辉光向施法距离内你能看见的一个生物倾泻而下。目标必须要进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。目标在这次豁免检定中无法获得半掩护和四分之三掩护的增益。

戏法强化： 该法术的伤害会在你达到下列等级时增加 1d8：5 级（2d8），11 级（3d8），17 级 1d8（4d8）。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内创造出下列魔法效应之一：

  • 你的声音在 1 分钟内变得比常人响两倍。
  • 你在 1 分钟内使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色。
  • 你使地面震动 1 分钟（完全无害）。
  • 你使某种声音自施法距离内一点瞬间发出，例如雷鸣声，鸦叫声或不祥的低语声。
  • 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗瞬间打开或关上。
  • 你在 1 分钟内改变自己眼睛的颜色。

多次施展该法术时，你可以同时维持最多三个持续 1 分钟的效应。你也可以用一个动作驱散其中一种效应。

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你5尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Inflict Wounds.name: 致伤术
Inflict Wounds.description:
一个你触碰的生物恢复特定数值的生命值，其恢复量等于 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值。该法术对不死生物和构装生物无效。

升环施法：使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，恢复量就增加 1d8。

Shield of Faith.name: 虔诚护盾
Shield of Faith.description: 围绕着施法距离内你指定的一个生物出现一片闪着微光的魔法力场。使目标在法术持续时间内 AC 获得+2 加值。

materials.value: 一小块写有神圣文字的羊皮纸

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入麻痹。目标在其每回合结束时可以再进行一次感知豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法：使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，你就可以额外指定一个类人生物。指定目标时，每个目标生物必须身处其他目标 30 尺范围内。

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器spiritual weapon
Spiritual Weapon.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

FonUCs7tziB0Kc8X.description:
指示物插图由 Forgotten Adventures提供。

Chain Shirt.name: 链甲衫
Chain Shirt.description: 该护甲由互相锁接的金属环组成，通常着装于布衣或皮衣的夹层之间。这种护甲为着装者的上半身提供了适中的保护，且锁环间相互碰撞的声音也可以被外层衣服减弱。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

戏法（随意）：光亮术，圣火术，奇术

1 环（4 法术位）：疗伤术，光导箭，庇护术

2 环（3 法术位）：次级复原术，灵体武器

3 环（2 法术位）：解除魔法，灵体卫士

Divine Eminence.name: 神圣启示
Divine Eminence.description:
As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit.

This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

Mace.name: 硬头锤
Mace.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+2 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

Sacred Flame.name: 圣火术
Sacred Flame.description:
如同火焰般的辉光向施法距离内你能看见的一个生物倾泻而下。目标必须要进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。目标在这次豁免检定中无法获得半掩护和四分之三掩护的增益。

  • 你使某种声音自施法距离内一点瞬间发出，例如雷鸣声，鸦叫声或不祥的低语声。
  • 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗瞬间打开或关上。

Guiding Bolt.name: 光导箭
Guiding Bolt.description:
一道闪光射向射程内你指定的一个生物。对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标受到4d6光耀伤害，并且在你下一回合结束前，由于目标身上闪烁的神秘微光，在此期间对目标进行的下一次攻击检定具有优势。

升环效果。 当你使用2环或更高法术位施展该法术时，使用的法术位每比1环高一环，伤害就增加1d6。

Sanctuary.name: 庇护术
Sanctuary.description:
你的法术保护一个施法距离内的生物不受攻击。在法术终止前，任何试图对受保护者进行攻击或对受保护者施放伤害性法术的生物都必须进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败则该生物必须选定一个新目标，否则将失去本次的攻击或法术。该法术不能保护受术者免受范围效应（如爆炸或火球）的影响。

若受保护生物发动一次攻击，施展一道影响敌人的法术，或是对任何其他生物造成伤害，则该法术随之终止。

Lesser Restoration.name: 次级复原术
Lesser Restoration.description: 你触碰一个生物，并终止正影响它的一种状态：&Reference[blinded]、&Reference[deafened]、&Reference[paralyzed] 或 &Reference[poisoned]。

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器spiritual weapon
Spiritual Weapon.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Spirit Guardians.name: 灵体卫士
Spirit Guardians.description:
在法术持续时间内，保护性的灵体环绕在你的周围 15 尺灵光范围内飞舞。如果你属于善良或中立阵营，则它们飘渺的身形看起来像是天使或精类生物（由你选择）。如果你属于邪恶阵营，则它们将形如邪魔。

施展此法术时，你可以指定特定生物让其不受该法术影响。除此之外的生物在灵光区域内将受法术影响致速度被减半。当灵光进入一个生物的空间、一个生物进入灵光或在灵光内结束回合时，其必须进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败将受到 3d8 点光耀伤害（如果你属于善良或中立）或 3d8 点暗蚀伤害（如果你属于邪恶），豁免成功则只受到半数伤害。一名生物一回合仅需进行一次该豁免。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比三环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
你触碰一个大型或者更小，且未被他人携带或着装的物件。在法术终止前，物件将在其 20 尺半径范围内发出明亮光照，并在其外 20 尺范围发出微光光照。光的颜色由你决定。该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。若你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

若你将一名敌对生物持有或穿戴的物件作为目标，该生物必须成功通过敏捷豁免检定，否则法术生效。

materials.value: 一团萤火虫或者磷光苔藓

Cure Wounds.name: 疗伤术
Cure Wounds.description:
一个你触碰的生物恢复特定数值的生命值，其恢复量等于 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值。该法术对不死生物和构装生物无效。

升环施法：使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，恢复量就增加 1d8。

Herald of Fools.name: Herald of Fools
Herald of Fools.description:
Herald of Fools

Leader of Fiendish Revels

Habitat: Planar (Lower Planes), Urban

Heralds of fools lead troupes of fiendish revelers in service to the enigmatic Lord of Fools, a clown or jester entity who is a curious mix of levity and cruelty (though always with a sense of irony). The heralds are agile and graceful, every movement a dance, spinning their banner poles in intricate displays that can swiftly turn from entertainment to death.

Secret. Heralds of fools are wonderful dancers, and they must never stop dancing, or they quickly perish.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The herald makes three [[/item Banner Pole]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Lethal Jape]].

Banner Pole.name: Banner Pole
Banner Pole.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit (with advantage if the target’s speed is 0), reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, the herald can move it to any other unoccupied space within the Banner Pole’s reach.

Lethal Jape.name: Lethal Jape
Lethal Jape.description: The herald taunts one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 24 ([[/r 7d6]]) psychic damage, and its speed is 0 until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Wave The Banner.name: Wave The Banner
Wave The Banner.description: When an ally of the herald’s within 60 feet of it misses with an attack roll or fails a saving throw, the ally can reroll the d20 and must use the new roll.

Endless Footwork.name: Endless Footwork
Endless Footwork.description: When the herald’s speed is 0, attack rolls made against it have advantage, and if its speed is 0 at the start of its turn, it takes 20 necrotic damage.

Perfect Grace.name: Perfect Grace
Perfect Grace.description: The herald doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it leaves an enemy’s reach.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] 使用 [[/item .jdOlqVzYs89JuqTB]] 和 [[/item .qhM3PIWgXdyRCeul]] 发动共计两次攻击。

Weston Murdoch.name: Weston Murdoch
Weston Murdoch.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Chain Shirt.name: 链甲衫
Chain Shirt.description: 该护甲由互相锁接的金属环组成，通常着装于布衣或皮衣的夹层之间。这种护甲为着装者的上半身提供了适中的保护，且锁环间相互碰撞的声音也可以被外层衣服减弱。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

戏法（随意）：光亮术，圣火术，奇术

1 环（4 法术位）：疗伤术，光导箭，庇护术

2 环（3 法术位）：次级复原术，灵体武器

3 环（2 法术位）：解除魔法，灵体卫士

Divine Eminence.name: 神圣启示
Divine Eminence.description:
As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit.

This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

Mace.name: 硬头锤
Mace.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+2 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

Sacred Flame.name: 圣火术
Sacred Flame.description:
如同火焰般的辉光向施法距离内你能看见的一个生物倾泻而下。目标必须要进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。目标在这次豁免检定中无法获得半掩护和四分之三掩护的增益。

戏法强化： 该法术的伤害会在你达到下列等级时增加 1d8：5 级（2d8），11 级（3d8），17 级 1d8（4d8）。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内创造出下列魔法效应之一：

  • 你的声音在 1 分钟内变得比常人响两倍。
  • 你在 1 分钟内使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色。
  • 你使地面震动 1 分钟（完全无害）。
  • 你使某种声音自施法距离内一点瞬间发出，例如雷鸣声，鸦叫声或不祥的低语声。
  • 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗瞬间打开或关上。
  • 你在 1 分钟内改变自己眼睛的颜色。

多次施展该法术时，你可以同时维持最多三个持续 1 分钟的效应。你也可以用一个动作驱散其中一种效应。

Guiding Bolt.name: 光导箭
Guiding Bolt.description:
一道闪光射向射程内你指定的一个生物。对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标受到4d6光耀伤害，并且在你下一回合结束前，由于目标身上闪烁的神秘微光，在此期间对目标进行的下一次攻击检定具有优势。

升环效果。 当你使用2环或更高法术位施展该法术时，使用的法术位每比1环高一环，伤害就增加1d6。

The Vermintoll Abomination.name: The Vermintoll Abomination
The Vermintoll Abomination.description:
The Vermintoll Abomination

Verminous Coven Amalgamation

Habitat: Forest, Planar (Fey), Mountain, Urban

The magic that binds hag covens together is far more powerful than many spellcasters can fully comprehend. Vermintoll abominations come about when the magics of a centipede hag, a pigeon hag, and a weasel hag enmesh and fuse the witches into one mass, bound to their cauldron.

The Vermintoll Abomination’s Lair

The Vermintoll Abomination’s lair is a decrepit hideaway, often hidden in plain sight such as an attic, basement, or a seized home.

The region containing the Vermintoll Abomination’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Endless Vermin. Within 1 mile of the lair, centipedes, weasels, (including giant varieties of both), and pigeons (use the Raven stat block) are common nuisances. They steal Tiny objects and foul food.

Loyal Dwelling. The lair itself, including any greater structure or complex it resides within, rejects intruders. Ability checks to pick locks or find secret doors have disadvantage.

If the Vermintoll Abomination dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Hypnotic Pattern.name: 催眠图纹
Hypnotic Pattern.description:
你在施法距离内一处边长 30 尺的立方区域内创造出一个在空中舞动旋转的彩色图纹。图纹在出现片刻后消失，然后迫使区域内每个看到它的生物进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败者将在法术持续时间内被&Reference[charmed]。被该法术魅惑的生物陷入&Reference[incapacitated]状态，且速度降为 0。

如果受术生物受到任何伤害，或有其他生物用动作将其从恍惚中摇醒，则其身上的此效应将提前终止。

materials.value: 一根点燃的熏香或一个装有磷光材料的水晶小瓶

Hypnotic Pattern.name: 催眠图纹 Hypnotic Pattern
Hypnotic Pattern.description: 该生物在法术持续时间内被魅惑。被该法术魅惑的生物陷入失能状态，且速度降为 0。

Contagion.name: 疫病术contagion
Contagion.description:
你的触碰带着疾病。你对触及范围内一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则该目标中毒。

该中毒目标的每一回合结束时，必须进行一次体质豁免。若该目标累计三次该豁免成功，则其不再中毒且该法术终止。若该目标累计三次该豁免失败，其亦不再中毒，但必须从以下描述的疾病中选择其一。随后该目标将受选定的疾病影响直至该法术持续时间结束。

由于法术对目标引发的是自然疾病，因此任何移除疾病或改善疾病状况的效应都可以对受术生物产生影响。

失明症 Blinding Sickness。 痛苦缠绕着患病者的意志，并使其眼睛变成奶白色。患病生物进行感知检定和感知豁免时具有劣势，并且承受目盲状态。

腐热症 Filth Fever。 患者身体发起严重的高烧。患病生物进行力量检定和力量豁免时，以及发动基于力量的攻击检定时具有劣势。

烂肉症 Flesh Rot。 患者的肌肤逐渐腐朽。患病生物进行魅力检定时具有劣势，并且具有所有伤害类型的伤害易伤。

脑热症 Mindfire。患者头脑发热。患病生物进行智力检定和智力豁免时具有劣势，并且其在战斗中视为受到困惑术 confusion 效应影响。

癫痫症 Seizure。患者全身颤抖不止。患病生物进行敏捷检定和敏捷豁免时，以及发动基于敏捷的攻击检定时具劣势。

恶心症 Slimy Doom。 患者开始不受控地流血。患病生物进行体质检定和体质豁免时具有劣势。另外每当该生物受到伤害时都会陷入震慑状态，直至其下一回合结束。

Dream.name: 托梦术
Dream.description:
此法术塑造一个生物的梦境。选择一个你所认识的生物作为法术目标。该目标必须与你在同一存在位面。不睡觉的生物，例如精灵，无法被该法术影响。你，或一个你所接触的自愿生物，进入一种恍惚状态，扮演信使的角色。在恍惚状态下，信使能感知其周围环境，但不能采取动作或移动。

如果目标已睡着，信使将出现在目标的梦境中，并且只要目标保持睡眠状态，信使便可在法术持续时间内与目标交谈。信使还可以塑造梦境环境，创造风景、物体和其他景象。信使可以在任何时候脱离恍惚状态，提前结束法术效果。目标醒来后能完美地回忆起梦境。如果施法时目标是清醒的，信使会知道这一点，并可以选择结束恍惚状态（及法术），或者等待目标入睡，届时信使将出现在目标的梦境中。

你可以让信使以一个可怖且吓人的形态出现在目标面前。如果你这么做，信使可以传递不超过十个词的信息，然后目标必须进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，幻象怪物的回响会生成一个噩梦，持续目标睡眠的整个时间，并使目标无法从这次休息中获得任何益处。此外，当目标醒来时，它会受到 3d6 点心灵伤害。

如果你拥有目标身体的一部分，如一缕头发、一片指甲或类似的身体部分，则目标进行豁免时处于劣势。

materials.value: 一把沙子，一点墨水，和一支从沉睡的鸟儿身上拔下的可书写羽毛

Dominate Person.name: 支配类人
Dominate Person.description:
你尝试迷惑一个在射程内你能看见的类人生物。它必须进行一次感知豁免，若失败则在该法术的持续时间内被你&Reference[魅惑]。若你或对你友好的生物正在与它战斗，则它在该豁免中具有优势。

当目标被魅惑时，只要你与它处于同一位面，你便与它存在心灵感应连结。你可以用此连结向该生物下达命令(无需动作)，而它会尽力服从。你可以指定一个简单且概括的行动方针，例如“攻击那个生物”、“跑到那边”或“取来那个物件”。如果该生物完成了命令且没有从你处收到进一步的指示，它便会尽其所能地自卫和求生。

你可以使用你的动作来完全且精确地控制目标。直到你的下一回合结束前，该生物仅采取你选择的动作，并且不会做任何你不允许它做的事。在此期间，你还可以令该生物使用反应，但这需要你也使用你自己的反应。

每当目标受到伤害时，它需针对该法术进行一次新的感知豁免。若豁免成功，则该法术终止。

升环施法效应。当你使用6环法术位施展该法术时，持续时间为专注，至多10分钟。当你使用7环法术位时，持续时间为专注，至多1小时。当你使用8环或更高法术位时，持续时间为专注，至多8小时。

Dominate Person.name: Dominate Person
Dominate Person.description: 目标被魅惑了，而且必须尽其所能遵从任何来自施法者的指令。

Spellcasting.description:
The abomination casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.15Fa6q1nH27XfbR8], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.6g3WLOZ2u0EbaLAd]

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.CjIq8Ed7bu3vVwT1], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.kSPRpeIx3w3nihrF], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.91Sw6vOIaO7U8DvM]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The abomination makes three attacks, using [[/item Cauldron Slam]] or [[/item Brew Spray]] in any combination.

Cauldron Slam.name: Cauldron Slam
Cauldron Slam.description: 近战武器攻击: [[/attack]] 命中, 触及5尺, 单一目标。命中: [[/damage average]] 伤害。

Brew Spray.name: Brew Spray
Brew Spray.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, range 90 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target takes a −2 penalty to AC until the end of the abomination’s next turn.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The abomination can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The abomination regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Corrosive Teleport.name: Corrosive Teleport
Corrosive Teleport.description: The abomination teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Each creature within 10 feet of the abomination when it appears must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ([[/r 2d6]]) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Hag’s Head.name: Hag’s Head
Hag’s Head.description:
The abomination uses one of the following options (if the necessary head is alive); it can’t use that option again until the start of its next turn:

  • Contagious Miasma (Centipede Hag Head). One creature the abomination can see within 5 feet of it must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 17 ([[/r 5d6]]) poison damage, is &Reference[Poisoned apply=false], and can’t regain hit points while &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] in this way. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only. A &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] creature repeats the saving throw when it finish a long rest, ending the effect on itself on a success.

  • Overwhelming Doubt (Pigeon Hag Head). One creature the abomination can see within 30 feet it must make a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 13 ([[/r 3d8]]) psychic damage and is &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

  • Waking Nightmare (Weasel Hag Head). One creature the abomination can see within 30 feet of it must make a DC 18 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 13 ([[/r 2d12]]) psychic damage and is &Reference[Frightened apply=false] for 1 minute. While &Reference[Frightened apply=false], the target perceives its allies as enemies but isn’t compelled to act in a specific way. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only. A &Reference[Frightened apply=false] creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Crushing Leap.name: Crushing Leap
Crushing Leap.description: The abomination jumps to a space within 30 feet that contains one or more Large or smaller creatures. Each creature in the destination space must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 17 ([[/r 2d12 + 4]]) bludgeoning damage and is knocked &Reference[Prone apply=false]. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet straight away from the abomination.

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description: The Vermintoll Abomination’s lair is a decrepit hideaway, often hidden in plain sight such as an attic, basement, or a seized home. The region containing the Vermintoll Abomination’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects: If the Vermintoll Abomination dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Endless Vermin.name: Endless Vermin
Endless Vermin.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, centipedes, weasels, (including giant varieties of both), and pigeons (use the Raven stat block) are common nuisances. They steal Tiny objects and foul food.

Loyal Dwelling.name: Loyal Dwelling
Loyal Dwelling.description: The lair itself, including any greater structure or complex it resides within, rejects intruders. Ability checks to pick locks or find secret doors have disadvantage.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the abomination fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The abomination has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiple Heads.name: 万首
Multiple Heads.description: The abomination has three heads: a centipede hag’s, a pigeon hag’s, and a weasel hag’s. Whenever the abomination takes 50 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies (determined randomly). The abomination dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns, if it has at least 1 hit point and any of its heads are dead, the abomination regains 20 hit points and one of its dead heads returns to life.

Ketgrinn.name: Ketgrinn
Ketgrinn.description:
Ketgrinn

Voice-Stealing Trickster

Habitat: Forest, Hill, Planar (Fey), Urban

Ketgrinn are catlike Fey spirits who delight in puzzles, riddles, and bargains. They have large, bright eyes and too-wide grins that gleam starkly even in shadows. Ketgrinn are tricksters and spies, often sent by those they serve to steal the voices of a rival’s minions to sow chaos and confusion.

Secret. Ketgrinn can’t resist a puzzle or riddle, and a difficult one can send a ketgrinn’s mind spiraling.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The ketgrinn makes two [[/item Claw]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Consume Voice]].

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a creature, it has disadvantage on the next saving throw the ketgrinn forces it to make before the end of the ketgrinn’s next turn.

Consume Voice.name: Consume Voice
Consume Voice.description: The ketgrinn leers menacingly at one creature within 5 feet of it. The target must make a DC 14 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 18 ([[/r 4d8]]) psychic damage, and the ketgrinn steals the target’s voice. The target can’t speak or make any verbal sound while its voice is stolen. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If it fails three of these saving throws, the loss is permanent, and its voice only returns when the ketgrinn dies. On a successful initial save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The ketgrinn casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B] on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

Teleport.name: 传送
Teleport.description: The ketgrinn teleports up to 40 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The ketgrinn has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Mimicry.name: 拟声
Mimicry.description: The ketgrinn can mimic any voice it has heard, or a voice it has stolen (see Consume Voice below). A creature that hears the voice can tell it’s an imitation with a successful DC 14 Wisdom (Insight) check. The DC increases to 19 for a voice the ketgrinn has stolen.

Riddle Bound.name: Riddle Bound
Riddle Bound.description: As an action, a creature that poses a riddle to the ketgrinn and succeeds on a DC 16 Charisma (Deception) check incapacitates the ketgrinn until the start of the creature’s next turn. Each riddle posed increases the DC for future riddles by 1 for 24 hours.

Witchwoven

Helper Made of Twine and Twigs (Ruby wrapped in a wicker cage)

Habitat: Any

Witchwoven are little dolls or effigies made of sticks, twine, and other simple materials, then imbued with life. Some happen naturally in places suffused with old nature magic, but most are created to serve as familiars by spellcasters knowledgeable in the Old Ways.

Protective Bond.name: 保护联结

GvrWCFMLLKQvzgLt.description:
Ravencraft

Undead Avian Amalgamation (Silver wire)

Habitat: Any

Treasure: None

Ravencrafts are a grotesque fusion of feathers, sinew, and bone. Their tiny form is a contorted and twisted nightmare carelessly sewn together into the mockery of a bird. The mere presence of a ravencraft is an affront to natural death and can keep further death at bay, or they can chill the hearts of their foes with cries of torment from beyond the grave.

Beak.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Harbinger Of Doom.name: Harbinger Of Doom

The ravencraft lets out a wail of anguish commingling with the croaking of ravens.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 11, one creature within 60 feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Trigger: A creature within 30 feet of the ravencraft makes a Death Saving Throw.

Response: The creature has Advantage on the save.

Undead Fortitude.name: 不死坚韧
Undead Fortitude.description: If damage reduces the ravencraft to 0 Hit Points, it makes a Constitution saving throw (DC 5 plus the damage taken) unless the damage is Radiant or from a Critical Hit. On a successful save, the ravencraft drops to 1 Hit Point instead.

Vermin Familiar.name: Vermin Familiar
Vermin Familiar.description:
Vermin Familiar

Infesting Hag Companion

Habitat: Planar (Fey), Urban

Treasure: Any

Capricious Fey spirits incarnated into bodies reminiscent of normal pests, vermin familiars serve spellcasters and especially vermin hags. While they are most often drawn to serve wicked masters, they also delight in playing the part of dutiful servants to corrupt spellcasters who aren’t evil.

Secret. Vermin familiars are gripped by deep-seated fears shared by the vermin forms they inhabit, and as such, are terrified of dogs and other canines.

Multiattack.description: The familiar makes two [[/item Rend]] attacks.

Incarnated Assault.name: Incarnated Assault
Incarnated Assault.description:
The familiar uses the option that matches its incarnation.

  • Confounding Scratch (Weasel Only). Charisma Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the familiar can see within 5 feet.

    Failure: 21 ([[/r 6d6]]) Necrotic damage, and the target is affected by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]{Confusion} spell until the start of the familiar’s next turn.

    Success: Half damage only.

  • Infectious Sting (Centipede Only). Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the familiar can see within 5 feet.

    Failure: 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) Poison damage, and the target has the &reference[poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of the familiar’s next turn. While Poisoned in this way, the target has the&reference[paralyzed apply=false] condition.

    Success: Half damage only.

  • Terrifying Flutter (Pigeon Only). Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the familiar can see within 5 feet.

    Failure: 21 ([[/r 6d6]]) Psychic damage, and the target has the &reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the end of the familiar’s next turn. The Frightened target uses its movement on its turn to get as far away as possible from the familiar, moving by the safest route.

    Success: Half damage only.

Invisibility.description: The familiar casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplInvisibili]{Invisibility} on itself, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

Disparate Incarnation.name: Disparate Incarnation
Disparate Incarnation.description: The familiar incarnates in a body similar to a pest: Centipede, Pigeon, or Weasel, which determines other traits and actions the familiar has.

Fear Of Canines.name: Fear Of Canines
Fear Of Canines.description: If the familiar can see a dog, wolf, or other canine at the start of its turn, it has the &reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn. While Frightened in this way, it has Disadvantage on saving throws.

Flyby (Pigeon Only).name: Flyby (Pigeon Only)
Flyby (Pigeon Only).description: The familiar doesn’t provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

Spider Climb (Centipede Only).name: Spider Climb (Centipede Only)
Spider Climb (Centipede Only).description: The familiar can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Vermin Telepathy.name: Vermin Telepathy

Festerhulk.name: Festerhulk
Festerhulk.description:
Festerhulk

Fungal Undead Giant

Habitat: Forest, Swamp, Underground

Treasure: None

Festerhulks are dead giants whose corpses are infested with fungus engorged by the magic of decay. This fungus has consumed and replaced much of the giant’s flesh and now animates the corpse. The heads of these giants are often completely overtaken by repulsive mushrooms and other fungal growths. The spores given off by their infestation can spread to victims killed by festerhulks, giving rise to further Undead.

Secret. Festerhulks shrink from sunlight, which harms the fungus that animates them.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The festerhulk makes two [[/item Fetid Slam]] attacks and uses Slime Mold if available.

Fetid Slam.name: Fetid Slam
Fetid Slam.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Slime Mold.name: Slime Mold
Slime Mold.description: The festerhulk disgorges a mass of ravenous slime mold into an unoccupied space within 20 feet. This mass uses the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.NwQpeeaMxAC3fRft]{Black Pudding} stat block except it is a Plant, and its size is Medium. The mass acts on the festerhulk’s Initiative. It, and any masses it Split into, dries up and dies in 1 hour.

Fungal Step.name: Fungal Step
Fungal Step.description: The festerhulk ignores Difficult Terrain caused by plants or fungi.

Spore Cloud.name: 孢子云雾
Spore Cloud.description: At the end of each of the festerhulk’s turns, each creature in a 5-foot Emanation originating from the festerhulk takes [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. A Giant or Humanoid killed by this damage rises as a new creature 24 hours later: Festerhulk (if a Giant), @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.monsters.Actor.NAISFPoNNgUCsEyW]{Zombie} (if a Humanoid).

Sunlight Hypersensitivity.name: 日照超敏
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.description: The festerhulk takes 10 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

IIDfGarbTmbHcfAs.description:
Hemonculus

Sanguine Servitor (Fresh blood and gem dust)

Habitat: Planar (Lower Planes)

Hemonculus are servitors created by a blood magic ritual that binds a fiendish spirit into a blood-formed body. For the cost of a small sacrifice in blood (the creator’s own or otherwise), the creatures serve as spies and assist in procuring further blood for magical use.

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the hemonculus attaches to the target. While attached, the hemonculus automatically hits the target with its Claw attacks. The hemonculus can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement. The target or a creature within 5 feet of it can detach the hemonculus as an action.

Exsanguinate.name: Exsanguinate
Exsanguinate.description: The hemonculus magically draws blood from nearby creatures. Each creature of the hemonculus’ choice within 15 feet of the hemonculus must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) necrotic damage, and it can’t regain hit points until the start of the hemonculus’s next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only. If the hemonculus is attached to a creature, the hemonculus regains hit points equal to the necrotic damage taken by that target.

Blood Sense.name: 血之感知
Blood Sense.description: The hemonculus knows the location of any creature within 60 feet of it that has half its hit points or fewer, unless the creature is a Construct or Undead.

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: The hemonculus doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
