  • 目标必须在每个自己的回合结束时重复进行[[/save ability=con format=long]]，直到获得三次成功或失败。

  • 每当目标受到能够结束其中毒状态的效应作用时，目标必须成功进行[[/save ability=con format=long]]，否则该状态不会结束。

Infected (Charisma).name: 感染（魅力）
Infected (Charisma).description:
• 当&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]时，目标在使用所选属性进行豁免时具有劣势。

  • 目标必须在每个自己的回合结束时重复进行[[/save ability=con format=long]]，直到其获得三次成功或失败。

  • 每当目标受到能够结束其中毒状态的效应作用时，目标必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=con format=long]]，否则该状态不会在其身上结束。

Disguise Self.name: 易容术
Disguise Self.description:
你改变自身以及随身的衣物、护甲、武器等在你身上的所有物。该效应在法术终止时结束。肉眼看来你的身高可以有 1 尺的增减，体态可胖可瘦。你必须选择一个和你肢体基础排列方式一致的形态。此外，幻术的影响范围由你决定。

此法术产生的变化无法应对物理检查。比如，你用此法术添了一顶帽子，那么现实物件会从帽子穿过去，且任何触碰帽子的人将摸不到任何东西。

如果一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Disguised.name: 乔装
Disguised.description: 一名生物想要分辨你是否易容，则必须使用一个研究动作研究你的外貌，并成功于一次对抗你法术豁免DC的 [[/check ability=int skill=inv]] 检定。

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description:
A creature you touch has the &Reference[invisible apply=false] condition until the spell ends. The spell ends early immediately after the target makes an attack roll, deals damage, or casts a spell.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You can target one additional creature for each spell slot level above 2.

materials.value: 一根包裹在阿拉伯胶中的睫毛

Invisible.name: 隐形
Invisible.description: 如果你进行攻击检定、造成伤害或施展法术，则该法术提前终止。

Insect Plague.name: 疫病虫群
Insect Plague.description:
你指定施法距离内一点，并以该点为中心使半径 20 尺的球状区域内堆满成群的噬人蝗虫。虫群使整个区域成为 &Reference[DifficultTerrain] ，且处于 &Reference[LightlyObscured]，在法术终止前都会持续存在。

当虫群显现时，其区域内的每个生物都必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败则受到 4d10 的穿刺伤害，豁免成功受到半数伤害。生物在一个回合内第一次进入该区域内，或者在区域内结束其回合时，也必须进行该豁免。一名生物每回合仅需进行一次该豁免。

升环施法：使用六环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比五环高一环，伤害就增加 1d10。

Polymorph.name: 变形术
Polymorph.description:
你尝试将射程内一个你能看见的生物转变为野兽。目标必须进行一次感知豁免，否则将在持续时间内变形为野兽形态。该形态可以是任何你选择的挑战等级等于或低于目标挑战等级（若其无挑战等级则为其等级）的野兽。目标的游戏资料卡将被所选野兽的资料卡取代，但目标保留其阵营、个性、生物类型、生命值和生命骰。有关野兽资料卡的示例，请参阅附录B。

目标获得等于野兽形态生命值的临时生命值。若法术结束时仍有剩余，这些临时生命值将消失。若目标不再拥有任何临时生命值，则法术提前结束。

目标可执行的动作受其新形态的解剖结构限制，且无法说话或施展法术。

目标的装备会融入新形态。生物无法使用该装备或从其获得任何效益。

Woodwarped.name: Woodwarped
Woodwarped.description:
Woodwarped

Facsimile Grown of Root and Vine

Habitat: Forest

Treasure: Armaments

Whispered among forest dwellers is the tale of a cursed vine, said to creep into the bodies of the living or the dead, twisting them into woodwarped. These wooden creations of tangled roots and bark take shape into a crude yet eerily familiar imitation of their hosts. Those that slay their hosts are sometimes clad in the stolen clothing and armor of their victims, silently wandering the woods with hollow eyes that reflect the unnatural force that binds them to the forest. Cutting pieces from their bodies is a dangerous proposition, as the fragments quickly grow into new woodwarped.

Secret. Woodwarped possess a deep fear of axes—tools capable of severing not only their bodies but their bond to the forest. The mere sight of an axe is enough to hold the creatures at bay, and the bite of its blade slices them like smoke.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The woodwarped makes two [[/item Claw]] attacks.

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 14) from one of two claws.

Thorn Spray.name: Thorn Spray
Thorn Spray.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from the woodwarped, with Disadvantage if Grappled by it.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[poisoned apply=false] condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Success: Half damage only.

Splintered Propagation.name: Splintered Propagation
Splintered Propagation.description:
Trigger: The woodwarped takes Slashing damage that isn’t from a Battleaxe, Greataxe, or Handaxe.

Response: A fragment of the woodwarped breaks off and rapidly grows into a new Woodwarped* in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the original. The new woodwarped is Small, has 10 Hit Points, only has the Claw action, lacks this Reaction, and takes its turn on the original woodwarped’s Initiative.

Aversion To Axes.name: Aversion To Axes
Aversion To Axes.description: At the start of the woodwarped’s turn, if it can see a creature holding a Battleaxe, a Greataxe, or a Handaxe, it has the &reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Thorns.name: 荆棘
Thorns.description: At the start of each of its turns, the woodwarped deals [[/damage average]] damage to any creature it is grappling or any creature grappling it.

Jeremiah Stover.name: Jeremiah Stover
Jeremiah Stover.description:
Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Leather Armor.name: 皮甲
Leather Armor.description: 该护甲的护胸和护肩由通过油煮硬化的皮子制成。护甲的其余部分则由更软更灵活的材料制作。

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 暴徒至少有一个未处于失能的盟友在目标生物 5 尺内时，它对该生物发动的攻击检定有优势。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 暴徒发动两次近战攻击。

Heavy Crossbow.name: 重弩
Heavy Crossbow.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

Mace.name: 硬头锤
Mace.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+4 to hit,, 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.

dRfYCxZw2dWRayry.name: The Daydreamer
dRfYCxZw2dWRayry.description:
Wayward Haint

Lost Soul Bound to Regret

Habitat: Any

Treasure: None

Wayward haints are restless spirits stuck between the realms of the living and the dead. Be it a curse or an unresolved conflict from their previous life, a haint can’t rest until their unfinished business is resolved.

Haints only show hints of who they were in life, taking on a more symbolic form related to the hurt or loss they can’t let go of. They tend to repeat their monotonous actions—often imitating those performed in life or reenacting their sorrow—over and over for eternity. When provoked, they can display a volatile temper and lash out with a crushing wave of the grief and indecision that binds their spirit.

Secret. Wayward haints can be trapped in empty bottles if they’re tricked or forced to pass over one.

Bottle Trap.name: Bottle Trap
Bottle Trap.description: A haint that enters the space of an upright, empty bottle must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or be drawn into the bottle, and a cork or stopper appears to close the bottle. The trapped haint can see and hear through the bottle out to 10 feet, and any creature in that range can hear the haint. The haint is released if the bottle breaks or another creature opens it.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: The haint can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn inside a solid object.

Draining Regret.name: Draining Regret
Draining Regret.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains 1 &reference[exhaustion apply=false] level. This can’t raise the target’s Exhaustion level above 5, and all Exhaustion levels gained from this action end when the target finishes a Short or Long Rest, or if it receives a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{Lesser Restoration} spell or similar magic

Gobblegeist.name: Gobblegeist
Gobblegeist.description:
Gobblegeist

Blood-Drinking Avian Predator

Habitat: Forest, Hill

Gobblegeists are massive birdlike monsters with earth-toned plumage, reptilian faces and claws, and a metallic beak edged with sharp teeth. These ravenous creatures descend from forest canopies or hilltops to snatch their prey unawares and carry them off to feed on their blood in solitude. Their single, unblinking eye can unnerve and dazzle more alert prey, making would-be threats an easy meal.

Secret. The folk who venerate the Old Ways believe that a seven-pointed star repels gobblegeists. They keep the monsters at bay by painting or weaving star sigils from wicker to hang from their homes or in trees.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The gobblegeist makes two [[/item Beak]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a Talons attack.

Beak.name: 喙啄
Beak.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. The target’s hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken until it finishes a long rest, and the gobblegeist regains hit points equal to that amount.

Talons.name: 禽爪
Talons.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 15) from both talons, and it is &Reference[Restrained apply=false] until the grapple ends.

Eye Beam.name: 眼棱射线
Eye Beam.description: The gobblegeist unleashes a beam from its eye in a line that is 120 feet long, and 5 feet wide. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or take 6 ([[/r 1d12]]) psychic damage and become &Reference[Stunned apply=false] until the start of the gobblegeist’s next turn.

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: The gobblegeist doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

Repelled By Stars.name: Repelled By Stars
Repelled By Stars.description: The gobblegeist can’t willingly move to a space within 10 feet of a seven-pointed star drawn on a surface or woven from wicker.

Priest Acolyte.name: 侍祭僧侣
Priest Acolyte.description:
Gear: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbarmChainShirt]{Chain Shirt}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.equipment24.Item.phbwepMace000000]{Mace}

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability:

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{Light}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{Thaumaturgy}

Divine Aid.name: 至圣援护
Divine Aid.description: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplBless00000]{Bless}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHealingWor]{Healing Word}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLesserRest]{Lesser Restoration}, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

Bless.name: 祝福术
Bless.description:
你祝福施法范围内至多 3 个生物。在法术终止前，每当受术目标进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展此法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，就能多指定一个生物。

Blessed.name: 祝福
Blessed.description: 在法术终止前，每当你进行攻击检定或豁免检定时，都可以在检定结果中额外加入 1d4。

Healing Word.name: 治愈真言
Healing Word.description:
你指定施法距离内一个你能看见的生物并恢复其生命值，恢复量等于 2d4 + 你的施法属性调整值。

升环施法： 使用高于一环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，治疗量就增加 2d4 点。

Sanctuary.name: 庇护术
Sanctuary.description:
你为施法距离内的一名生物施加守护。在法术终止前，当任何生物将受守护的生物定为其攻击检定或伤害性法术的目标时，该生物都必须成功通过一次 [[/save ability=wis dc=@attributes.spelldc ]] 豁免，否则该生物必须改为选定另一名生物作为新的目标或者失去本次的攻击/法术。不过此法术无法令受术者免受区域效应的影响。

若受保护生物发动一次攻击，施展一道法术，或是造成任何伤害，则该法术随之终止。

Warded.name: 庇护
Warded.description:
在法术终止前，任何试图对受保护者进行攻击或对受保护者施放伤害性法术的生物都必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=wis format=long]]豁免，若豁免失败，该生物必须选定一个新目标，否则将失去本次的攻击或法术。

若受保护生物发动一次攻击，施展一道法术，或是造成任何伤害，则该法术随之终止。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
你触碰一个大型或者更小，且未被他人携带或着装的物件。在法术终止前，物件将在其 20 尺半径范围内发出明亮光照，并在其外 20 尺范围发出微光光照。光的颜色由你决定。

该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。如果你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Animated Rug of Smothering.name: 活化闷人毯
Animated Rug of Smothering.description:
活化物件

@Embed[Compendium.dnd5e.content24.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.YKvIouWZhOP2prWL caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm free-rules-embed"]

指示物插图由Forgotten Adventures提供。

Smother.name: 卷紧
Smother.description:
[[/attack extended]]。[[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过中型，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 可使其陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）替代造成伤害。直至擒抱结束，目标陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 和 &Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态，且 &Reference[Suffocating]{窒息}，并在其回合开始时受到 [[/damage average]] 伤害。[[lookup @name lowcase]] 同时能卷紧的生物数上限为一。

擒抱目标期间，[[lookup @name lowercase]] 无法执行此动作；[[lookup @name lowercase]] 受到伤害时，其受到的伤害减半（向下取整），而受擒目标将受到相同数值的伤害。

Grappled + Other Conditions.name: 受擒与其他状态
Grappled + Other Conditions.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC 13，[[/check ability=str skill=ath format=long]]）替代造成伤害。直至擒抱结束，你陷入 &Reference[Blinded apply=false] 和 &Reference[Restrained apply=false]状态，且 &Reference[Suffocating]{窒息}

eFeU72gl8ACIPRg7.name: The Crimson Abbot
eFeU72gl8ACIPRg7.description:
The Crimson Abbot

Unholy Crusader of Blood

Habitat: Hill, Mountain, Urban

In life, the Crimson Abbot was a virtuous crusader named Sir Marius Renathyr but was seduced by the sweet whispers of an archdevil of deceit and pride who masqueraded as a goddess of righteousness. On the brink of death, the abbot accepted the whispered offer for eternal life, and in so doing, was transformed into a creature of unbearable pride with an unquenchable thirst for blood. He continues to work in the name of his “goddess” and has gathered a fanatically loyal congregation eager for his promise of pure, everlasting life.

Secret. The Crimson Abbot’s pride is nearly unshakable, but seeing a true reminder of the righteous man he once was can crack his façade.

The Crimson Abbot’s Lair

The Crimson Abbot’s lair is a blood-soaked monastery where unworthy mortals are burned in sacrifice, and vampire minions study truths hidden in blood.

The region containing the Crimson Abbot’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Fresh Blood. Within 1 mile of the lair, spilled blood doesn’t dry out or coagulate, instead remaining fresh for 24 hours.

Incinerate Heresy. Within 1 mile of the lair, when an enemy of the abbot’s takes fire damage, that creature starts burning, taking 2 (1d4) damage at the start of its next turn.

If the Crimson Abbot dies or moves his lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你5尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Disguise Self (can appear as a Medium Hu.name: Disguise Self (can appear as a Medium Humanoid, 24-hour duration)
Disguise Self (can appear as a Medium Hu.description:
You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends or until you use your action to dismiss it. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between. You can't change your body type, so you must adopt a form that has the same basic arrangement of limbs. Otherwise, the extent of the illusion is up to you.

The changes wrought by this spell fail to hold up to physical inspection. For example, if you use this spell to add a hat to your outfit, objects pass through the hat, and anyone who touches it would feel nothing or would feel your head and hair. If you use this spell to appear thinner than you are, the hand of someone who reaches out to touch you would bump into you while it was seemingly still in midair.

To discern that you are disguised, a creature can use its action to inspect your appearance and must succeed on an Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC.

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内创造出下列魔法效应之一：

  • 你的声音在 1 分钟内变得比常人响两倍。
  • 你在 1 分钟内使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色。
  • 你使地面震动 1 分钟（完全无害）。
  • 你使某种声音自施法距离内一点瞬间发出，例如雷鸣声，鸦叫声或不祥的低语声。
  • 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗瞬间打开或关上。
  • 你在 1 分钟内改变自己眼睛的颜色。

多次施展该法术时，你可以同时维持最多三个持续 1 分钟的效应。你也可以用一个动作驱散其中一种效应。

Word of Recall (to lair only).name: Word of Recall (to lair only)
Word of Recall (to lair only).description:
You and up to five willing creatures within 5 feet of you instantly teleport to a previously designated sanctuary. You and any creatures that teleport with you appear in the nearest unoccupied space to the spot you designated when you prepared your sanctuary (see below). If you cast this spell without first preparing a sanctuary, the spell has no effect.

You must designate a sanctuary by casting this spell within a location, such as a temple, dedicated to or strongly linked to your deity. If you attempt to cast the spell in this manner in an area that isn't dedicated to your deity, the spell has no effect.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The abbot casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.arzCrMRgcNiQuh43], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.A3q2gTNqG6fvNGrv], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.MUO1uYN7JR1hm4dR]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The abbot makes two [[/item Sanguine Blade]] attacks. He can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Blood Call]].

Sanguine Blade.name: Sanguine Blade
Sanguine Blade.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Blood Call.name: 鲜血呼唤
Blood Call.description: One creature other than a Construct or Undead within 30 feet of the abbot must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 7 ([[/r 2d6]]) necrotic damage and its hit point maximum is reduced by the damage taken until it finishes a long rest. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage only. The abbot regains hit points equal to the damage taken. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage and then buried rises the following sunset as a Crimson Clergy* under the abbot’s control.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The abbot can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The abbot regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

Castigate.name: Castigate
Castigate.description: One creature the abbot can see within 60 feet of himself must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or become &Reference[Frightened apply=false] for 1 minute. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Bloody Strike.name: Bloody Strike
Bloody Strike.description: The abbot moves up to half his speed and makes one [[/item Sanguine Blade]] attack.

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description: The Crimson Abbot’s lair is a blood-soaked monastery where unworthy mortals are burned in sacrifice, and vampire minions study truths hidden in blood. The region containing the Crimson Abbot’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects: If the Crimson Abbot dies or moves his lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Fresh Blood.name: Fresh Blood
Fresh Blood.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, spilled blood doesn’t dry out or coagulate, instead remaining fresh for 24 hours.

Incinerate Heresy.name: Incinerate Heresy
Incinerate Heresy.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, when an enemy of the abbot’s takes fire damage, that creature starts burning, taking 2 ([[/r 1d4]]) damage at the start of its next turn.

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description: When the abbot is hit by an attack roll while holding a weapon, he adds 3 to his AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Half Plate Armor.name: 半身板甲
Half Plate Armor.description: 板甲由覆盖全身，且相互连接的模铸金属板组成。一套板甲包括护手、重皮靴、一顶附面甲的头盔以及在护甲底层的厚重的布甲。其锁扣和皮带结构可以将护甲重量分配到身体各处。

Honor Lost.name: Honor Lost
Honor Lost.description: If a creature takes a bonus action to present a memento or recite a reminder of the abbot’s past and succeeds on a DC 15 Charisma (Persuasion) check, the abbot has disadvantage on the next ability check, attack roll, or saving throw he makes before the start of the creature’s next turn.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the abbot fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The abbot can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity.name: 日照超敏
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.description: The abbot takes 20 radiant damage if he starts his turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, he has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

Salmon of Knowledge.name: Salmon of Knowledge
Salmon of Knowledge.description:
Salmon of Knowledge

Elemental Font of Wisdom (Crushed opal)

Habitat: Coastal, Planar (Elemental Plane of Water), Underwater

Treasure: None

Legends speak of the salmon of knowledge—shimmering fish said to embody the wisdom of the ages. Their scales gleam with an iridescent light, and they are forever enveloped in a sphere of gently flowing water that defies gravity. This magical orb is said to carry the essence of the sacred Current of Wisdom—where knowledge of all time and space flows through the rivers of the cosmos.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The salmon makes two [[/item Water Spray]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Prophetic Guidance]].

Water Spray.name: 水雾喷溅
Water Spray.description: Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], range 20/60 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Prophetic Guidance.name: Prophetic Guidance
Prophetic Guidance.description: A creature the salmon can see within 30 feet gains a flash of foresight. Once in the next minute, when the creature fails a D20 Test, it can roll [[/r 1d4]] and add it to the total, potentially turning the failure into a success.

Echo From The Current.name: Echo From The Current
Echo From The Current.description:
Trigger: A creature within 5 feet makes an Intelligence or Wisdom check.

Response: The creature can use the salmon’s Wisdom modifier (+4) in place of its own ability modifier for the check.

Orb Of Water.name: Orb Of Water
Orb Of Water.description: The salmon is surrounded by a sphere of flowing water that moves with it. While inside of the sphere, the salmon has Resistance to Fire damage. A creature that grapples the salmon can choose to pull it out of the orb of water. The orb of water moves up to 20 feet toward the salmon at the start of each of the salmon’s turns. If it enters the salmon’s space, the Grappled condition ends on the salmon.

Water Breathing.name: 水下呼吸
Water Breathing.description: The salmon can breathe only underwater.

Strength Drain.name: 力量吸取
Strength Drain.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+4 to hit,, 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

The target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

Gloomwood.name: Gloomwood
Gloomwood.description:
Gloomwood

Blighted Treant

Habitat: Forest, Swamp

Treasure: None

Gloomwoods were once treants in service to an archfey, but they were corrupted by a supernatural fungal blight. The growth bores through their trunks and into their souls, making the gloomwoods cruel and vicious, interested only in spreading more decay. Fungal spores drift from their trunks and branches, rotting any flesh and digging into the ground around them to spread the blight.

Secret. Carving the Sylvan name of the forest the gloomwood once called home into the creature’s trunk quells its aggression.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The gloomwood makes two attacks, using [[/item Slam]] or [[/item Fungal Fling]] in any combination.

Slam.name: 粗枝猛击
Slam.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 16) from one of two branches. Until the grapple ends, the target has the &reference[restrained apply=false] condition.

Fungal Fling.name: Fungal Fling
Fungal Fling.description: Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], range 60/180 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Spore Stomp.name: Spore Stomp
Spore Stomp.description:
Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]]damage.

Hit or Miss: Each creature within a 20-foot Sphere centered on the target must make the following saving throw.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15.

Failure: 36 ([[/r 8d8]]) Poison damage, and the target has the &reference[poisoned apply=false]condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Blighted Aura.name: Blighted Aura
Blighted Aura.description: The ground in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the gloomwood is Difficult Terrain from mushrooms and fungus that grow in the area. A creature that ends its turn in the Emanation takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Carved Past.name: Carved Past
Carved Past.description: As an action, a creature can use a Dagger or Woodcarver’s Tools to carve the name in Sylvan of the ancient home of the gloomwoods into the gloomwood’s trunk. Until the gloomwood finishes a Long Rest, it can’t use its Fungal Fling or Spore Stomp actions.

Fungal Step.name: Fungal Step
Fungal Step.description: The gloomwood ignores Difficult Terrain caused by plants or fungi.

Goat.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Charge.name: 冲锋
Charge.description:
If the goat moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a target and then hits it with a ram attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 2 (1d4) bludgeoning damage.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 10 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

Sure-Footed.name: 稳步
Sure-Footed.description: 山羊抵抗应击倒地效应所进行的力量和敏捷豁免具有优势。

Ram.name: 冲撞
Ram.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+3 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) bludgeoning damage.

Night Creature.name: Night Creature
Night Creature.description:
Night Creature

Bestial Blood Hunter

Habitat: Any

Treasure: None

Night creatures are fiendish spirits bound into vampire-blood-tainted corpses through profane rituals. The hulking brutes are fanatically loyal to their creators, a fact some vampire overlords learn too late when those they employ to create the night creatures develop ambitions of their own.

Secrets. Night creatures are quickly undone by the purity of salt if wiped on a weapon and driven into a wound.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The night creature makes one [[/item Claw]] attack and uses [[/item Bite]].

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]] reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 14) from one of two claws.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the &reference[grappled apply=false], &reference[incapacitated apply=false], or &reference[restrained apply=false] condition.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target’s Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the night creature regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

Shape-shift.name: Shape-shift
Shape-shift.description: If the night creature isn’t in sunlight, it shape-shifts into a Medium Humanoid or returns to its true form. Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Blood Stalker.name: Blood Stalker
Blood Stalker.description: The night creature has Advantage on Wisdom checks made to find or track a creature that is missing any Hit Points.

Salt Susceptibility.name: Salt Susceptibility
Salt Susceptibility.description: The night creature has Vulnerability to damage from weapons wiped with salt. A creature can take a Bonus Action to wipe salt onto a weapon, which remains coated for 1 minute, or until it hits a creature.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The night creature can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity.name: 日照超敏
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.description: The night creature takes [[/damage average]] damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

ezKYW9TTWDhxSDDM.name: Devil’s Glove
ezKYW9TTWDhxSDDM.description:
Devil’s Glove

Five-Fingered Fungus (Rare wood chips)

Habitat: Forest, Swamp, Underground

Treasure: None

Comprised of five twitching, blood-red tendrils lined with black slime, the devil’s glove fungus feeds voraciously off decaying matter, unwary insects, and small creatures. Resembling a long-fingered hand, they grow from bulbous roots that look like leathery, white eggs and constantly emit an overpowering scent of death and rot. Despite their unpleasant aura, these fungus creatures can form beneficial relationships with others, providing nourishment and resilience in exchange for protection and a ready supply of decaying material to feed upon.

Tendril.name: 卷须
Tendril.description:
Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the devil’s glove attaches to the target. While attached, the devil’s glove can’t make Tendril attacks against other targets, and if the target is a creature, the target has the &reference[poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn if it can smell the devil’s glove.

The devil’s glove can detach itself by spending 5 feet of its movement.

The target or a creature within 5 feet of it can detach the devil’s glove as an action.

Decaying Bloom.name: Decaying Bloom
Decaying Bloom.description:
Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the devil’s glove.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target can’t regain Hit Points until the start of the devil’s glove's next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Symbiosis.name: Symbiosis
Symbiosis.description: The devil’s glove forms a magical bond with a willing creature it touches. The bonded creature doesn’t need to eat or drink, and the creature has Advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the &reference[poisoned apply=false] condition. The bond ends when the creature dies, the devil's glove dies, the devil's glove ends the bond (no action required), or when the devil's glove uses this Bonus Action again.

Scent Of Death.name: Scent Of Death
Scent Of Death.description: Creatures that can smell have Advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks made to find the devil’s glove.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The devil’s glove can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

fCG5qm0hX4DtsndY.name: The Wild Titan
fCG5qm0hX4DtsndY.description:
The Wild Titan

Ferocious Giant of the Wilderness

Habitat: Arctic, Forest, Hill, Mountain

Wandering the most inhospitable mountain ranges, the Wild Titan is the wilderness made manifest, created long ago by a forgotten will for a purpose that none know. Favoring solitude in the most remote places of the world, when it encounters settlements and “civilized” people, it wants only to turn them to primal savagery or crush them beneath its immense bulk.

Secret. The name of the Wild Titan’s forgotten creator is its undoing. Recovering the lost name and carving its glyph form into a stone creates a zone that severs the titan’s connection to the wild.

The Wild Titan’s Lair

The Wild Titan’s lair is a hollowed-out peak in the mountain range the creature stalks. If encountered in its lair, the Wild Titan has a challenge rating of 22 (41,000 XP).

The region containing the Wild Titan’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Whiteout. Within 1 mile of the lair, there is a 75 percent chance every day of heavy precipitation.

Wild Hunger. Within 1 mile of the lair, creatures always feel ravenously hungry, no matter how much they’ve eaten. A creature that finishes a long rest in this area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of exhaustion. A creature that doesn’t require food succeeds automatically.

If the Wild Titan dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The titan makes two [[/item Massive Fist]] attacks. It can replace one or both attacks with a use of [[/item Thrown Boulder]].

Massive Fist.name: Massive Fist
Massive Fist.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 20 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the &referenve[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 20) from one of two fists, and it has the &reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Thrown Boulder.name: Thrown Boulder
Thrown Boulder.description:
The titan hurls a boulder at a point it can see within 150 feet.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 10-foot radius Sphere centered on that point.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

Wild Roar.name: Wild Roar
Wild Roar.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 19, each of the titan’s enemies in a 100-foot Emanation originating from the titan.

Failure: The target has the &reference[Charmed apply=false] condition until the start of the titan’s next turn. While Charmed in this way, the creature must use its action to make its most powerful melee or ranged attacks against the nearest creature it can see.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The titan can take 3 legendary actions (4 in Lair), choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The titan regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Arm Sweep.name: Arm Sweep
Arm Sweep.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in a 20-foot Cone.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

Failure or Success: The titan can’t use this action again until the start of its next turn.

Stomping Stride.name: Stomping Stride
Stomping Stride.description: The titan moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. It can enter a Huge or smaller creature's space, and the creature is pushed to nearest unoccupied space.

Crushing Hurl.name: Crushing Hurl
Crushing Hurl.description:
The titan hurls an object it is holding, a creature it is grappling, or a Large clod of earth to a space within 100 feet.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 25, each creature in the projectile's space, including a hurled creature.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage only.

Success or Failure: The titan can't use this action again until the start of its next turn.

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description: The Wild Titan’s lair is a hollowed-out peak in the mountain range the creature stalks. If encountered in its lair, the Wild Titan has a challenge rating of 22 (41,000 XP). The region containing the Wild Titan’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects: If the Wild Titan dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Whiteout.name: Whiteout
Whiteout.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, there is a 75 percent chance every day of heavy precipitation.

Wild Hunger.name: Wild Hunger
Wild Hunger.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, creatures always feel ravenously hungry, no matter how much they’ve eaten. A creature that finishes a long rest in this area must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or gain 1 level of &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]. A creature that doesn’t require food succeeds automatically.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the titan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The titan has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Runic Sever.name: Runic Sever
Runic Sever.description: If the titan starts its turn within 50 feet of a stone at least 10 feet high and 10 feet wide that is carved with the glyph representing its forgotten creator, the titan takes [[/damage average]] damage and has the &reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of its next turn.

Siege Monster.name: 攻城怪物
Siege Monster.description: The titan deals double damage to objects and structures.

fuJHMByh1BJraTQi.name: Gobblegeist
fuJHMByh1BJraTQi.description:
Gobblegeist

Blood-Drinking Avian Predator

Habitat: Forest, Hill

Treasure: None

Gobblegeists are massive birdlike monsters with earth-toned plumage, reptilian faces and claws, and a metallic beak edged with sharp teeth. These ravenous creatures descend from forest canopies or hilltops to snatch their prey unawares and carry them off to feed on their blood in solitude. Their single, unblinking eye can unnerve and dazzle more alert prey, making would-be threats an easy meal.

Secret. The folk who venerate the Old Ways believe that a seven-pointed star repels gobblegeists. They keep the monsters at bay by painting or weaving star sigils from wicker to hang from their homes or in trees.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The gobblegeist makes two [[/item Beak]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a [[/item Talons]] attack.

Beak.name: 喙啄
Beak.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. The target’s Hit Point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the gobblegeist regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

Talons.name: 禽爪
Talons.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &reference[grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 15) from both talons, and it has the &reference[restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Eye Beam.name: 眼棱射线
Eye Beam.description:
Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 120-foot-long, 5-foot-wide line.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target has the &reference[stunned apply=false] condition until the start of the gobblegeist’s next turn.

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: The gobblegeist doesn’t provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

Repelled By Stars.name: Repelled By Stars
Repelled By Stars.description: The gobblegeist can’t willingly move to a space within 10 feet of a seven-pointed star drawn on a surface or woven from wicker.

The Beast of Blight.name: The Beast of Blight
The Beast of Blight.description:
The Beast of Blight

Manifestation of Rot and Decay

Habitat: Forest, Swamp

The Beast of Blight was once known as Farryn of the Greenwood, a druidic protector of the natural cycle who delved into forbidden lore to save her dead lover. Her love was virtuous, but in the end, it caused nothing but pain. Rot overtook the druid, and she is now a monstrous being that spreads and thrives on decay. The Beast of Blight moves effortlessly through decay and spews putrid spores when roused to anger.

Secret. Buried deep within the Beast of Blight, a tiny fragment of Farryn still exists. If shown an image of her lost love, the ignited memory will burn away the rot.

The Beast of Blight’s Lair

The Beast of Blight’s lair is a cave in the heart of a rotten forest where blight creeps endlessly forth.

The region containing the Beast of Blight’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Fouling Blight. Within 6 miles of the lair, ability checks made to forage for food or water have disadvantage, and magic that creates food or water only produces half the normal amount.

Rapid Decay. Within 1 mile of the lair, objects that aren’t worn or carried have vulnerability to necrotic damage, and the length of time in which a dead creature can be brought back to life is halved.

If the Beast of Blight dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The beast makes two [[/item Claw]] attacks.

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 17) from one of two claws. If the beast moved at least 20 feet immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 7 ([[/r 2d6]]) poison damage.

Project Image.name: 投影术
Project Image.description: The beast casts the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ePhRKHXRE7l1sEoQ]{Project Image} spell, requiring no spell components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability. During the spell’s duration, the beast can use its Spew Blight action and Rot Stride bonus action as if it were in the image’s space.

Spew Blight.name: Spew Blight
Spew Blight.description: The beast expels rot in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 18 ([[/r 4d8]]) necrotic damage and is &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only. A &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The beast can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The beast regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Trample.name: 践踏
Trample.description: The beast moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks. A Large or smaller creature in a space the beast enters must succeed on a DC 19 Strength saving throw or be knocked &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Impale.name: 穿刺
Impale.description: A creature the beast is grappling must make a DC 19 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 14 ([[/r 4d6]]) piercing damage and is impaled on one of the beast’s exposed ribs, transferred from the claw. The target is &Reference[Restrained apply=false] until the grapple ends. The beast can have two creatures impaled at a time. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Hallucinate.name: Hallucinate
Hallucinate.description: The beast exhales hallucinatory spores that fill a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within 60 feet. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Constitution saving throw or be affected by the @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.9hQXdMSmerkTsHDe]{Confusion} spell until the start of the beast’s next turn.

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description: The Beast of Blight’s lair is a cave in the heart of a rotten forest where blight creeps endlessly forth. The region containing the Beast of Blight’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects: If the Beast of Blight dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Fouling Blight.name: Fouling Blight
Fouling Blight.description: Within 6 miles of the lair, ability checks made to forage for food or water have disadvantage, and magic that creates food or water only produces half the normal amount.

Rapid Decay.name: Rapid Decay
Rapid Decay.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, objects that aren’t worn or carried have vulnerability to necrotic damage, and the length of time in which a dead creature can be brought back to life is halved.

Rot Stride.name: Rot Stride
Rot Stride.description: The beast teleports to an unoccupied space within 60 feet. Either its starting or destination space must contain fungus or rotting organic matter.

Blighted Overgrowth.name: Blighted Overgrowth
Blighted Overgrowth.description: While the beast has half its hit points or fewer, it has disadvantage on attack rolls, its Spew Blight action recharges at the start of its turn, and if it has at least 1 hit point at the start of its turn, it regains 20 hit points. If it takes fire damage, it doesn’t regain hit points at the start of its next turn.

Fungal Step.name: Fungal Step
Fungal Step.description: The beast ignores difficult terrain caused by plants or fungi.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the beast fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Unraveled Longing.name: Unraveled Longing
Unraveled Longing.description: If the beast can see the likeness of its long-lost love at the start of its turn, the beast takes 10 psychic damage and has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the start of its next turn.

goz1vhY34i1kDr8z.name: Project Image
goz1vhY34i1kDr8z.description:
You create an illusory copy of yourself that lasts for the Duration. The copy can appear at any location within range that you have seen before, regardless of intervening obstacles. The Illusion looks and sounds like you but is intangible. If the illusion takes any damage, it disappears, and the spell ends.

You can use your action to move this illusion up to twice your speed, and make it gesture, speak, and behave in whatever way you choose. It mimics your mannerisms perfectly.

You can see through its eyes and hear through its ears as if you were in its space. On Your Turn as a Bonus Action, you can switch from using its senses to using your own, or back again. While you are using its senses, you are Blinded and Deafened in regard to your own surroundings.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, because things can pass through it. A creature that uses its action to examine the image can determine that it is an Illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and any noise it makes sounds hollow to the creature.

materials.value: A small replica of you made from material worth at least 5gp

Confusion.name: 困惑术
Confusion.description:
该法术冲击并扭曲生物的心智，滋生妄想并引发失控行为。当你施展该法术时，在你选择射程内一点为圆心、半径10尺球状区域内的每个生物必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则受其影响。

受影响的目标无法执行反应，并在其每回合开始时必须从@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.tables.RollTable.LHEts1oDaDwcehuj]{困惑术 Confusion}表中骰出结果来决定其该回合的行为。

升环施法效应。 当你用五环或更高法术位施展该法术时，球状区域的半径你使用的法术位每四环高一环增加5尺。

Concentrating: Project Image.name: Concentrating: Project Image
Concentrating: Project Image.description:
You are maintaining concentration on the effects of the 'Project Image' Spell.

Spider Climb.description: 巨虫能够在困难表面上攀爬，包括倒吊在天花板上，而不需要进行属性检定。

Multiattack.description:
The insect makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (round down).

[[floor(@flags.dnd5e.summon.level / 2)]]{Number of attacks}

Poison Jab.name: 猛毒刺
Poison Jab.description: Melee Attack Roll: Bonus equals your spell attack modifier, reach 10 ft. Hit: 1d6 + 3 plus the spell's level Piercing damage plus 1d4 Poison damage.

Venomous Spew.name: 剧毒喷涌
Venomous Spew.description: Constitution Saving Throw: Your spell save DC, one creature the insect can see within 10 feet. Failure: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the insect's next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你会处于 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态，直至巨虫下一轮开始。

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]], and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s next turn.

Poisoned.name: 中毒
Poisoned.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 状态直至海盗将军的下一回合开始。

gIM2KVjsPra8DzZd.name: Night Creature
gIM2KVjsPra8DzZd.description:
Night Creature

Bestial Blood Hunter

Habitat: Any

Night creatures are fiendish spirits bound into vampire-blood-tainted corpses through profane rituals. The hulking brutes are fanatically loyal to their creators, a fact some vampire overlords learn too late when those they employ to create the night creatures develop ambitions of their own.

Secrets. Night creatures are quickly undone by the purity of salt if wiped on a weapon and driven into a wound.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The night creature makes one [[/item Claw]] attack and uses [[/item Bite]].

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 14) from one of two claws.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: One creature within 5 feet of the night creature that is willing or that’s &Reference[Grappled apply=false], &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false], or &Reference[Restrained apply=false] must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, or it takes 6 ([[/r 1d4 + 4]]) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. The target’s hit point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken until it finishes a long rest, and the night creature regains hit points equal to that amount.

Shape-shift.name: Shape-shift
Shape-shift.description: If the night creature isn’t in sunlight, it shape-shifts into a Medium Humanoid or returns to its true form. Its game statistics, other than its size, are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn’t transformed.

Blood Stalker.name: Blood Stalker
Blood Stalker.description: The night creature has advantage on Wisdom checks made to find or track a creature that is missing any hit points.

Salt Susceptibility.name: Salt Susceptibility
Salt Susceptibility.description: The night creature has vulnerability to damage from weapons wiped with salt. A creature can take a bonus action to wipe salt onto a weapon, which remains coated for 1 minute, or until it hits a creature.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The night creature can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Sunlight Hypersensitivity.name: 日照超敏
Sunlight Hypersensitivity.description: The night creature takes 20 radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

House of Horror.name: House of Horror
House of Horror.description:
House of Horror

Cursed House Brought to Malevolent Life

Habitat: Any

Houses of horror are living houses, often angry or bitter due to the circumstances of their awakening. They were once mundane buildings or dwellings where powerful magics of life and death took place and infused the stones and timber.

Houses of horror jealously covet the true life that its former inhabitants enjoyed, or they carry echoes of the suffering that bodies and souls experienced within them. The houses vent this fury on any who enter, tormenting and terrifying trespassers. The souls of those who die inside are trapped, waiting to be unleashed upon future victims.

Secret. While not haunted houses in the traditional sense, houses of horror can have their consciousness quelled by the same exorcism or purification rituals that put unquiet spirits to rest or drive out possessing spirits.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The house makes three attacks, using [[/item Structure Slam]] or [[/item Object Fling]] in any combination, and it uses Agonized Souls.

Structure Slam.name: Structure Slam
Structure Slam.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 16). The house can grapple up to two creatures at a time, using animated furniture, objects, or fixtures such as stair railings.

Object Fling.name: Object Fling
Object Fling.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 ([[/r 2d4 + 6]]) bludgeoning or piercing damage (house’s choice). If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is knocked &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Agonized Souls.name: Agonized Souls
Agonized Souls.description: The house’s stolen souls torment a creature within 10 feet of the house. The target must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw, taking 36 ([[/r 8d8]]) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Alter Structure.name: Alter Structure
Alter Structure.description: The house can reshape itself to change the location of walls, doors, floors, and other features of its construction. When one of these features appears or disappears, a creature within 5 feet of a changing feature can make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a successful save, the creature chooses which side of a feature it ends up on, or it moves to the nearest unoccupied space to avoid falling.

Construction.name: Construction
Construction.description: Creatures can enter the house’s space and navigate it as a normal building. The house makes attacks from any surface or object that isn’t being worn or carried within its space. It doesn’t have disadvantage on ranged attack rolls due to an enemy being within 5 feet of it. If a creature deals 30 or more damage in a single turn to a 5-foot section of the house’s structure, the house must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw or a 5-foot opening appears in that space until the start of the creature’s next turn.

Exorcism Susceptibility.name: Exorcism Susceptibility
Exorcism Susceptibility.description: If the house is targeted by a Dispel Evil and Good spell, it becomes &Reference[Stunned apply=false]. At the end of each of its turns, it can make a DC 15 Charisma saving throw, ending the condition on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. As an action, a creature inside the house that throws a flask of holy water against the house and succeeds on a DC 20 Charisma check affects the house as above.

Soul Trap.name: Soul Trap
Soul Trap.description: A Humanoid that dies within the house has its soul trapped there until the house dies. The creature can’t be returned to life by any means short of a True Resurrection or Wish spell.

gd4HzvJIzwSfMtyz.name: Maidenwood
gd4HzvJIzwSfMtyz.description:
Maidenwood

Witch-Warped Ambushing Tree

Habitat: Forest, Swamp

Maidenwoods are creatures birthed from tree stumps by old magics, often arising from curses that turn the forest against a transgressor. They scuttle on roots like legs, and the broken trunk becomes a fierce, grinding maw. The maidenwood’s tendrils blossom into lifelike figures it uses to lure its prey close.

Secret. The curse that maintains a maidenwood unravels if one is offered an apple—an ancient trick used by witches turned against them.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The maidenwood makes two [[/item Tendril]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a Chew attack.

Tendril.name: 卷须
Tendril.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 16) from one of two tendrils. Until the grapple ends, it is &Reference[Restrained apply=false].

Chew.name: Chew
Chew.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is &Reference[Restrained apply=false], it takes an extra 18 ([[/r 4d8]]) piercing damage.

Lure.name: 诱捕
Lure.description: The maidenwood shapes its lure into a Small or Medium Humanoid, or it retracts the lure. The maidenwood can speak through the lure and move it anywhere within reach of its tendrils. It then attempts to attract one creature within 30 feet of the lure. The target must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or be &Reference[Charmed apply=false] until the start of the maidenwood’s next turn. The &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target must approach the lure as closely as it can. The maidenwood has advantage on attack rolls against the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] target. If the target takes damage, the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition ends at the end of the current turn.

Absorb Magic.name: 吸收魔力
Absorb Magic.description: If the maidenwood succeeds on a saving throw against a spell or other magical effect, or if a spell attack roll misses it, the maidenwood gains 10 temporary hit points.

Undoing Gift.name: Undoing Gift
Undoing Gift.description: The maidenwood must accept and eat an apple offered to it or to its lure. The maidenwood then takes 55 ([[/r 10d10]]) poison damage and is &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] for 1 minute.

gflmg7Z2iu183vsi.name: Phantom Trainhopper
gflmg7Z2iu183vsi.description:
Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Amorphous.name: 无定形
Amorphous.description: 该阴影可以穿过窄至1英寸宽的空间而无需挤身。

Shadow Stealth.name: 幽影隐匿
Shadow Stealth.description: 在微光光照或黑暗环境下，该暗影可以用附赠动作执行躲藏动作。

Sunlight Weakness.name: 日光弱点
Sunlight Weakness.description: 处于阳光照射下时，该暗影在攻击检定、属性检定和豁免上具有劣势。

Strength Drain.name: 力量吸取
Strength Drain.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+4 to hit,, 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) necrotic damage.

The target's Strength score is reduced by 1d4. The target dies if this reduces its Strength to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.If a non-evil humanoid dies from this attack, a new shadow rises from the corpse 1d4 hours later.

Crooked Hare.name: Crooked Hare
Crooked Hare.description:
Crooked Hare

Crooked Trickster (Anything stolen or gained by trickery)

Habitat: Forest, Hill, Planar (Fey)

Treasure: Individual

Crooked hares look like rabbits at first glance, but their true nature is given away by the antlers and wings they grow and the cunning gleam in their eyes. They are mischievous tricksters that delight in stealing things from unsuspecting travelers and hiding them in amusing, slightly dangerous, or just unlikely places. If roused to anger or cornered, crooked hares deliver a bite that carries an unsettling—if minor—curse. Despite their troublesome nature, crooked hares might serve as companions for woods-crafty folk who have a good sense of humor.

Twisting Bite.name: Twisting Bite
Twisting Bite.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 11 Charisma saving throw or become cursed for 24 hours. The cursed creature’s limbs sporadically twist and move in unnatural ways, giving the creature Disadvantage on attack rolls and on ability checks that rely on Charisma.

Trackless Step.name: Trackless Step
Trackless Step.description: The crooked hare leaves no tracks, or it leaves the tracks of a Large or smaller creature of its choice. If it doesn’t have the &reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition, it can share the effects of this trait with another creature within 5 feet (no action required).

Invader out of Space.name: Invader out of Space
Invader out of Space.description:
Invader Out of Space

Intruder From Beyond the Stars

Habitat: Any

Treasure: Any

Invaders out of space appeared after a falling star blazed down from the cosmos. These alien beings have an unsettling habit of appearing between glances and silently watching. Invaders stand upright like a biped, shrouded in what are either voluminous robes or draping folds of skin.

Observers who are lucky find the invaders gone in a blink, and those who aren’t so fortunate hear the bloodcurdling hiss these things from beyond the stars emit as they attack. All that remains of their victims is a spray of gray powder amid crumpled clothing.

Secret. The invaders have little resilience to the toxic and virulent threats of the Material Plane, and they succumb quickly to diseases and poisons

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The invader makes three [[/item Disrupting Touch]] attacks and uses Unnerving Glare if available.

Disrupting Touch.name: 扰乱触及
Disrupting Touch.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: 1[[/damage average]] damage. A creature killed or an object destroyed by this damage is reduced to a fine gray dust. Magic items, and any equipment worn or carried by a disintegrated creature, don’t disintegrate.

Unnerving Glare.name: Unnerving Glare
Unnerving Glare.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature the invader can see within 60 feet.

Failure: The target has the &reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition until the start of the invader’s next turn.

Otherworldly Slip.name: Otherworldly Slip
Otherworldly Slip.description:
Trigger: The invader takes damage. Response: The invader teleports to an unoccupied space it can see within 60 feet and can cause the following—

Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature within a 30-foot Emanation originating from the space where the invader vanished or appeared (invader’s choice).

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target's Speed is halved until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

Alien Mind.name: 异怪心智
Alien Mind.description: If a creature tries to read the intruder’s mind or deals Psychic damage to it, that creature must succeed on a DC 16 Intelligence saving throw or have the &reference[stunned apply=false]condition for 1 minute. It repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Gliding Levitation.name: Gliding Levitation
Gliding Levitation.description: The invader hovers 6 inches above the ground and leaves no tracks. It ignores Difficult Terrain caused by conditions on the ground, can move over liquids, and takes no damage from falling.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The invader has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Weak Constitution.name: Weak Constitution
Weak Constitution.description: The invader has Disadvantage on saving throws to avoid or end the &reference[poisoned apply=false]condition. If the invader is &reference[poisoned apply=false] at the start of its turn, it takes [[/damage average]] damage.

Veteran.name: 老兵
Veteran.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Splint Armor.name: 板条甲
Splint Armor.description: 这套护甲由窄长的竖直金属条制成，铆接在布质衬垫外层的皮甲背衬上。灵活的链甲保护着关节部位。

Longsword.name: 长剑
Longsword.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+5 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击Multiattack。
Multiattack.description: 这名老兵可以使用长剑发动两次攻击，若使用的武器时短剑，也可以使用短剑发动两次攻击。

Shortsword.name: 短剑
Shortsword.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+5 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

Heavy Crossbow.name: 重弩
Heavy Crossbow.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) piercing damage.

The Mariner.name: The Mariner
The Mariner.description:
Wayward Haint

Lost Soul Bound to Regret

Habitat: Any

Treasure: None

Wayward haints are restless spirits stuck between the realms of the living and the dead. Be it a curse or an unresolved conflict from their previous life, a haint can’t rest until their unfinished business is resolved.

Haints only show hints of who they were in life, taking on a more symbolic form related to the hurt or loss they can’t let go of. They tend to repeat their monotonous actions—often imitating those performed in life or reenacting their sorrow—over and over for eternity. When provoked, they can display a volatile temper and lash out with a crushing wave of the grief and indecision that binds their spirit.

Secret. Wayward haints can be trapped in empty bottles if they’re tricked or forced to pass over one.

Bottle Trap.name: Bottle Trap
Bottle Trap.description: A haint that enters the space of an upright, empty bottle must succeed on a DC 16 Charisma saving throw or be drawn into the bottle, and a cork or stopper appears to close the bottle. The trapped haint can see and hear through the bottle out to 10 feet, and any creature in that range can hear the haint. The haint is released if the bottle breaks or another creature opens it.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: The haint can move through other creatures and objects as if they were Difficult Terrain. It takes [[/damage average]] damage if it ends its turn inside a solid object.

Draining Regret.name: Draining Regret
Draining Regret.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target gains 1 &reference[exhaustion apply=false] level. This can’t raise the target’s Exhaustion level above 5, and all Exhaustion levels gained from this action end when the target finishes a Short or Long Rest, or if it receives a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.F0GsG0SJzsIOacwV]{Lesser Restoration} spell or similar magic

hLT7vvWy7nwzK9Yc.name: Hugo
hLT7vvWy7nwzK9Yc.description:
Serum Brute

Cursed Giant Enhanced by Alchemy

Habitat: Underground, Urban

Serum brutes are descended from giants who suffered an enduring curse when they failed to take over a Fey domain. They have third eyes, usually in their foreheads, which channel the giants’ curse into the world around them. All three of their eyes are sewn or otherwise sealed shut to contain the curse. Serum brutes are further enhanced with—and get their name from—a series of alchemical infusions, often delivered through implanted vessels and tubes, which seek to deaden their sorrow and pain, as well as the disturbing power of their third eyes. They form deep emotional bonds with any who offer them comfort and an escape from the pain of their curse, and they are often willing to die for those allies.

Secret. Serum brutes are dependent upon their curse, and magic that breaks curses can leave the giants debilitated and bereft.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The brute makes two [[/item Fist]] attacks and can use Cursed Gaze if available.

Fist.name: 拳击
Fist.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If Caustic Secretion is active, the target takes an extra 11 ([[/r 2d10]]) acid damage.

Cursed Gaze (Unleashed Eyes Only).name: Cursed Gaze (Unleashed Eyes Only)
Cursed Gaze (Unleashed Eyes Only).description: The brute glares with its opened third eye. Each creature in a 30-foot cone must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw, taking 9 ([[/r 2d8]]) psychic damage and becoming &Reference[Frightened apply=false] until the start of the brute’s next turn on a failed save, or it takes half as much damage only on a successful one.

Devotion.name: 虔信者
Devotion.description: When one of the brute’s allies within 5 feet of it takes damage, the ally gains resistance to the triggering damage, and the brute takes an amount of psychic damage equal to the damage the ally takes.

Curse Dependent.name: Curse Dependent
Curse Dependent.description: If the brute is targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]{Remove Curse} spell or similar magic, until it finishes a long rest, the brute loses its blindsight, its Withering Eye trait, and its Cursed Gaze action.

Stimulant Rush.name: Stimulant Rush
Stimulant Rush.description:
At the start of its turn, the brute must choose one of the following options (it can’t use that option twice in a row):

  • Catalyst Infusion. Until the start of its next turn, the brute’s speed increases to 50 feet, it doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it leaves an enemy’s reach, and its long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet with or without a running start.

  • Caustic Secretion. Until the start of its next turn, its Fist attack deals an extra 11 ([[/r 2d10]]) acid damage.

  • Stim Boost. Gain 10 temporary hit points.

Unleashed Eyes.name: Unleashed Eyes
Unleashed Eyes.description: When the brute has half its hit points or fewer, its sealed eyes rip open and unleash its curse. It is no longer blind beyond 60 feet, and it can use its Withering Eye trait and Cursed Gaze action until it finishes a long rest, whereupon its eyes seal shut again.

Withering Eye (Unleashed Eyes Only).name: Withering Eye (Unleashed Eyes Only)
Withering Eye (Unleashed Eyes Only).description: When the brute moves to within 5 feet of a creature, the creature takes 4 ([[/r 1d8]]) psychic damage. A creature takes this damage only once per turn.

hNSeGmhZIKX0Gsrk.name: Vander Boone
hNSeGmhZIKX0Gsrk.description:

Studded Leather Armor.name: 镶钉皮甲
Studded Leather Armor.description: 该护甲由坚固而柔韧的皮革制成，其表面由紧密的铆钉和尖刺进行加固。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 首领发动三次近战攻击：两次弯刀攻击和一次匕首攻击。首领也可以选择进行两次远程匕首攻击。

Scimitar.name: 弯刀
Scimitar.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+5 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Dagger.name: 匕首
Dagger.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description: 首领在被一次近战攻击命中时，其AC加上 2。此时该首领必须能看见攻击者，且有在持用一把近战武器。

Ethereal Sight.name: 以太视界
Ethereal Sight.description: 该幽魂在物质位面时可以看到以太位面60尺内的情况，反之亦然。

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description:
该幽魂可以穿过其他生物和物件，如同它们是困难地形。

如果它在物件内结束其回合，它将受到5 (1d10) 力场伤害。

Withering Touch.name: 凋零之触
Withering Touch.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+5 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (4d6 + 3) necrotic damage.

Etherealness.name: 以太化
Etherealness.description: 幽魂从物质位面进入以太位面，或反之亦然。当它在边界太空中时，在物质位面上是可见的，反之亦然，但它无法影响也无法被另一个位面上的任何事物影响。

Horrifying Visage.name: 恐惧面容
Horrifying Visage.description:
距离该幽魂60尺内, 能看见它的每个非不死生物生物必须进行一次DC 13 感知豁免, 豁免失败则恐慌1分钟。若豁免结果比DC低5或更多, 目标还会衰老1d4 x 10年。

一个恐慌的目标可以在每个自己的回合结束时重复该豁免, 豁免成功则自身结束恐慌状态。若一个目标的豁免成功或此效应对其结束, 该目标在接下来的24小时内对此幽魂的骇人外貌免疫。衰老效应可以通过高等复原术法术逆转, 但仅限于其发生后的24小时内。

Possession.name: 附身
Possession.description:
该幽魂5尺范围内一个它能看见的类人生物必须进行一次DC 13魅力豁免，失败则被幽魂附身；随后幽魂消失，目标陷入失能状态并失去对身体的控制权。幽魂此时掌控着躯体但不会剥夺目标的感知。

除驱散不死生物类效果外，幽魂无法被任何攻击、法术或其他效应选定为目标，且保留其阵营、智力、感知、魅力及对魅惑和恐慌的免疫。其余情况使用被附身目标的资料卡，但无法获取目标的知识、职业特性或熟练项。附身持续至躯体生命值降至0、幽魂以附赠动作主动终止、或被驱散或类似反制善恶法术的效应驱逐。附身结束时，幽魂在躯体5尺内未占据空间重新显现。目标在豁免成功后或附身结束后的24小时内对该幽魂的附身免疫。

hq0sNa90UEri1LWK.name: Crocodile
hq0sNa90UEri1LWK.description: 指示物插图由Forgotten Adventures提供。

Hold Breath.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 可以屏息一小时。

Bite.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过中型，则其还会陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false] 状态（逃脱DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]）。受擒期间，目标还会陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态。

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚

Bite.name: 啃咬

Acid Spray.name: 酸液喷射
