敏捷豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]]，[[lookup @target.template.size activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]] 尺长， [[lookup @target.template.width activity=20GU2JBM5zJfNPD1]] 尺宽的线状区域内的所有生物。

失败：[[/damage average]]伤害。

成功：半伤。

Keeper of the Blight.name: Keeper of the Blight
Keeper of the Blight.description:
Keeper of the Blight

Druid Transformed by Blight

Habitat: Forest, Swamp, Underground

Keepers of the blight arise from Fey beings that dwell in a natural region that becomes overtaken by a supernatural or spiritual rot. Where they once tended the balance and cycles of their home, keepers are consumed by the blight and channel their magic through fungus, mold, and rot, pushing the cycle of life toward death, decay, and the flourishing of things that thrive in gloom.

Secret. The fungus growing throughout keepers of the blight empowers and sustains them, and killing that growth diminishes their power.

Druidcraft.name: 德鲁伊伎俩
Druidcraft.description:
你向自然之魂低语，并创造以下效应之一：

  • 你创造一个微小而无害的感官效应，并以之预报你所在地接下来 24 小时的天气状况。该效应可表现为一个代表晴空的金球，一朵代表雨天的云彩，代表雪日而飘飞的雪花等等。该效应将持续 1 轮。
  • 你可以立即让一朵鲜花绽放，一颗种子破壳，一片叶蕾发芽。
  • 你创造一个微小而无害的即时感官效应，如落叶，微风，小动物的动静或者臭鼬的微弱气味。该效应只能在 5 尺的立方空间内起效。
  • 你可以立即点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一把火把或一处小篝火。

Ray Of Sickness.name: Ray Of Sickness
Ray Of Sickness.description:
A ray of sickening greenish energy lashes out toward a creature within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d8 poison damage and must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it is also poisoned until the end of your next turn.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by 1d8 for each slot level above 1st.

Blight.name: 枯萎术
Blight.description:
死灵魔法的能量袭向一个施法距离内你能看见的生物，并榨取他的水分和活力。目标必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败者将受到 8d8 点暗蚀伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。本法术对构装生物和不死生物无效。

若你以一个植物类生物或魔法植物为目标，则其豁免检定具有劣势，且法术对它的伤害取最大值。

若你以一个非魔法非生物的植物为目标，如一棵树或灌木，则它不进行豁免而直接枯萎死去。

升环施法： 使用五环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比四环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The keeper casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.SbSvZKkJASyk8jKo], Ray Of Sickness

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pybg5MNc3lkerH4Y]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The keeper makes two attacks, using [[/item Blight Staff]] or [[/item Spore Spray]] in any combination, and it uses Rotting Ritual.

Blight Staff.name: Blight Staff
Blight Staff.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Spore Spray.name: Spore Spray
Spore Spray.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] until the end of the keeper’s next turn.

Rotting Ritual.name: Rotting Ritual
Rotting Ritual.description:
The keeper magically creates one of the following effects of its choice. It can’t use the same effect twice in a row.

  • Frenzying Spores. The keeper wafts spores toward a creature the keeper can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) psychic damage, and it must use its reaction to make a melee or ranged attack against a creature of the keeper’s choice that is within reach or range of the attack. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

  • Blight Spawn. The keeper magically summons a Rotweaver (lacks a Hunting Horn) in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of itself. The rotweaver takes its turn immediately after the keeper on the same initiative count, and it obeys the keeper. The rotweaver vanishes after 1 minute, or when it or the keeper dies.

  • Devouring Fungus. Life-sapping fungus sprouts from the ground in a 60-foot radius centered on the keeper. The area is difficult terrain, and a creature is &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] while within the area. The fungus remains for 1 minute, until the keeper uses this effect again, or until it dies.

Blight Dependent.name: Blight Dependent
Blight Dependent.description: If the keeper is targeted by an effect that ends the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition, it takes 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) force damage and has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws until the end of its next turn.

Fungal Step.name: Fungal Step
Fungal Step.description: The keeper ignores difficult terrain caused by plants or fungi.

iL29vgKsKdohKFyf.name: Lyla Webb
iL29vgKsKdohKFyf.description:
Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Chain Shirt.name: 链甲衫
Chain Shirt.description: 该护甲由互相锁接的金属环组成，通常着装于布衣或皮衣的夹层之间。这种护甲为着装者的上半身提供了适中的保护，且锁环间相互碰撞的声音也可以被外层衣服减弱。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

戏法（随意）：光亮术，圣火术，奇术

1 环（4 法术位）：疗伤术，光导箭，庇护术

2 环（3 法术位）：次级复原术，灵体武器

3 环（2 法术位）：解除魔法，灵体卫士

Divine Eminence.name: 神圣启示
Divine Eminence.description:
As a bonus action, the priest can expend a spell slot to cause its melee weapon attacks to magically deal an extra 10 (3d6) radiant damage to a target on a hit.

This benefit lasts until the end of the turn. If the priest expends a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each level above 1st.

Mace.name: 硬头锤
Mace.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+2 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage.

Sacred Flame.name: 圣火术
Sacred Flame.description:
如同火焰般的辉光向施法距离内你能看见的一个生物倾泻而下。目标必须要进行一次敏捷豁免，豁免失败则受到 1d8 点光耀伤害。目标在这次豁免检定中无法获得半掩护和四分之三掩护的增益。

戏法强化： 该法术的伤害会在你达到下列等级时增加 1d8：5 级（2d8），11 级（3d8），17 级 1d8（4d8）。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内创造出下列魔法效应之一：

  • 你的声音在 1 分钟内变得比常人响两倍。
  • 你在 1 分钟内使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色。
  • 你使地面震动 1 分钟（完全无害）。
  • 你使某种声音自施法距离内一点瞬间发出，例如雷鸣声，鸦叫声或不祥的低语声。
  • 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗瞬间打开或关上。
  • 你在 1 分钟内改变自己眼睛的颜色。

多次施展该法术时，你可以同时维持最多三个持续 1 分钟的效应。你也可以用一个动作驱散其中一种效应。

Guiding Bolt.name: 光导箭
Guiding Bolt.description:
一道闪光射向射程内你指定的一个生物。对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。命中时，目标受到4d6光耀伤害，并且在你下一回合结束前，由于目标身上闪烁的神秘微光，在此期间对目标进行的下一次攻击检定具有优势。

升环效果。 当你使用2环或更高法术位施展该法术时，使用的法术位每比1环高一环，伤害就增加1d6。

Sanctuary.name: 庇护术
Sanctuary.description:
你的法术保护一个施法距离内的生物不受攻击。在法术终止前，任何试图对受保护者进行攻击或对受保护者施放伤害性法术的生物都必须进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败则该生物必须选定一个新目标，否则将失去本次的攻击或法术。该法术不能保护受术者免受范围效应（如爆炸或火球）的影响。

若受保护生物发动一次攻击，施展一道影响敌人的法术，或是对任何其他生物造成伤害，则该法术随之终止。

Lesser Restoration.name: 次级复原术
Lesser Restoration.description: 你触碰一个生物，并终止正影响它的一种状态：&Reference[blinded]、&Reference[deafened]、&Reference[paralyzed] 或 &Reference[poisoned]。

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器spiritual weapon
Spiritual Weapon.description:
你创造出一块形似你选择的武器的浮空灵体力场，并使其持续到法术持续时间结束。它出现在施法距离内你选择的一点，并且你可以立即对该武器周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次近战法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值的力场伤害。

在你之后的回合内，你可以以一个附赠动作让该武器移动至多 20 尺，并再对它周围 5 尺内的一个生物发动一次同样的攻击。

升环施法： 使用高于二环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
在施法距离内指定一名生物、一个物件或一处魔法效应。所有影响该目标的三环或更低环阶法术即告终止。每个影响目标的四环或更高环阶法术都需要以你的施法属性进行一次属性检定（DC 10 + 目标法术环阶），检定成功时目标法术终止。

升环施法： 你直接终止影响目标的小于等于该施法环阶的法术效应。

Spirit Guardians.name: 灵体卫士
Spirit Guardians.description:
在法术持续时间内，保护性的灵体环绕在你的周围 15 尺灵光范围内飞舞。如果你属于善良或中立阵营，则它们飘渺的身形看起来像是天使或精类生物（由你选择）。如果你属于邪恶阵营，则它们将形如邪魔。

施展此法术时，你可以指定特定生物让其不受该法术影响。除此之外的生物在灵光区域内将受法术影响致速度被减半。当灵光进入一个生物的空间、一个生物进入灵光或在灵光内结束回合时，其必须进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败将受到 3d8 点光耀伤害（如果你属于善良或中立）或 3d8 点暗蚀伤害（如果你属于邪恶），豁免成功则只受到半数伤害。一名生物一回合仅需进行一次该豁免。

升环施法： 使用高于三环的法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比三环高一环，法术的伤害就增加 1d8。

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
你触碰一个大型或者更小，且未被他人携带或着装的物件。在法术终止前，物件将在其 20 尺半径范围内发出明亮光照，并在其外 20 尺范围发出微光光照。光的颜色由你决定。该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。若你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

若你将一名敌对生物持有或穿戴的物件作为目标，该生物必须成功通过敏捷豁免检定，否则法术生效。

materials.value: 一团萤火虫或者磷光苔藓

Cure Wounds.name: 疗伤术
Cure Wounds.description:
一个你触碰的生物恢复特定数值的生命值，其恢复量等于 1d8 + 你的施法属性调整值。该法术对不死生物和构装生物无效。

升环施法：使用二环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，恢复量就增加 1d8。

iXXg49tXUKWxehi9.name: Bayou Beast
iXXg49tXUKWxehi9.description:
Bayou Beast

Spirit Hex-Bound to the Swamp

Habitat: Swamp

Treasure: None

Bayou beasts are elemental spirits bound into great mounds of swamp plant matter through jinxcraft magic. These hulks obey their creators unfailingly, often lingering long after their death and carrying out their final orders. The hexed seals, fashioned from carved trinkets and masks, that trap the spirit in its form impart their curse on the creature’s enemies.

Secret. The jinxcraft seals can be washed away with alcohol, hindering and even destroying the bayou beast.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The elemental makes two [[/item Hexed Slam]] attacks.

Hexed Slam.name: Hexed Slam
Hexed Slam.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be cursed until the start of the elemental’s next turn. While cursed, the creature subtracts 1d4 from its attack rolls and saving throws.

Swamp Grasp.name: Swamp Grasp
Swamp Grasp.description:
Swamp water and plants roil around the elemental.

Strength Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature on the ground in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the elemental.

Failure: 11 ([[/r 2d10]]) Poison damage, and the target has the &reference[restrained apply=false] condition for 1 minute, until the elemental has the &reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition, or until the elemental dies. The target or a creature within 5 feet of it can take an action to make a DC 16 Strength (Athletics) check, ending the Restrained condition on the target on a success.

Spirits Susceptibility.name: Spirits Susceptibility
Spirits Susceptibility.description: The elemental takes 9 (2d8) Force damage for every bottle of alcohol splashed onto it, and its Speed is reduced to 0 until the end of its next turn.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+2 to hit,, 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (2d6 + 2) piercing damage.

Claws.name: 爪击
Claws.description:
Melee Weapon Attack:+4 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) slashing damage.

If the target is a creature other than an elf or undead, it must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Wellwyrm.name: Wellwyrm
Wellwyrm.description:
Wellwyrm

Serpent Lurking Beneath the Surface

Habitat: Coastal, Underground, Swamp

Wellwyrms are serpents originally touched by cruel Fey masters. The wyrms live in shallow waters where land-dwelling creatures frequent, such as wells and watering holes, lying in wait to coil around unsuspecting victims. Wellwyrms then drag their prey into water, or into burrows they dig under seemingly safe ground, to drown or suffocate.

Secret. The sound of a hunting horn drives wellwyrms into a panicked frenzy.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The wellwyrm makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and uses [[/item Constrict]].

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Constrict.name: 绞缠
Constrict.description: One Medium or smaller creature the wellwyrm can see within 5 feet of itself must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or take 13 ([[/r 2d8 + 4]]) bludgeoning damage and be &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 14). The target is &Reference[Restrained apply=false] until the grapple ends. The wellwyrm needn’t spend extra movement to move during this grapple.

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: The wellwyrm can breathe air and water.

Hunting Terror.name: Hunting Terror
Hunting Terror.description: If the wellwyrm hears a creature play a horn or similar musical instrument, it becomes &Reference[Frightened apply=false] until the end of its next turn.

Robin Wells.name: Robin Wells
Robin Wells.description:

Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Training.name: 技艺受训
Training.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 具有某项技能熟练（由DM选择），且在进行使用该技能的属性检定时具有优势。

Club.name: 短棒
Club.description: [[/attack extended]]. [[/damage average extended]].

Doppelganger.description:

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 发动两次 [[/item .mmSlam0000000000]] 攻击并使用 [[/item .mmUnsettlingVisa]]（若条件允许）。

Slam.name: 猛击
Slam.description: 近战攻击检定：[[/attack]]（[[lookup @activation.condition activity=mEQjWdqU7zGv6Ott]]），触及 [[lookup @range.value activity=mEQjWdqU7zGv6Ott]] 尺。[[/damage average extended]]。

attack.condition: 在每场战斗的第一轮中具有优势

Read Thoughts.name: 读心
Read Thoughts.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDetectThou]，无需法术成分并使用魅力作为施法属性（法术豁免DC [[lookup @abilities.cha.dc]]）。

Detect Thoughts.name: 侦测思想
Detect Thoughts.description:
你激活下述效应之一。直到法术结束为止，你可以在你随后的回合用一个魔法动作以激活下述任意效应之一。

感知思想。 你感知距你 30 尺内，知晓语言或能够心灵感应的思想的存在。你并不会阅读这些思想，但你知道这里存在一名有理智的生物。

此法术会被 1 尺厚的岩石、泥土或木头，1 寸厚的金属，或薄薄一层铅阻隔。

阅读思想。 选择一名距你 30 尺内的可见生物，或一名距你 30 尺内被感知思想侦测到的生物。你了解到此时目标最关心的事情。如果目标不知晓任何语言也不会心灵感应，则你不能得到任何信息。

在你的下一回合，用一个魔法动作，你可以尝试深入目标的心灵。如果你选择这么做，目标进行一次感知豁免。豁免失败，则你了解到他的逻辑推理、情绪状态以及他头脑中的一些大事（比如忧虑、挚爱和仇恨的事物）。豁免成功，法术终止。无论哪种情况，目标都会知道你正在窥探其心灵，且直到你的注意力从它的心灵上移开为止，目标均可以在其回合内使用动作进行一次 [[/check ability=int skill=arc dc=@attributes.spelldc]] 检定，对抗你的法术豁免DC，目标胜出对抗时，法术终止。

Unsettling Visage.name: 诡异面容
Unsettling Visage.description:
感知豁免检定：DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]]，源自 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的 [[lookup @target.template.size activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]] 光环区域内的所有能看见 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的生物。

失败：目标陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，并在其每一回合结束时重复豁免，成功则终止其身上的此效应。[[lookup @duration.value activity=USxIbGZPLvfPnnoI]] 分钟后，其豁免自动成功。

Frightened.name: 恐慌
Frightened.description: 你陷入 &Reference[Frightened apply=false] 状态，并在每一回合结束时重复豁免，成功则终止自身上的此效应。1 分钟后，豁免自动成功。

Shape-Shift.name: 变形
Shape-Shift.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 变形为小型或中型的类人生物，或变回其真实形态。除体型以外，其各形态下游戏数据均相同。[[lookup @name lowercase]] 着装或携带的任何装备都不会随之变化。

The Lord of Fools.name: The Lord of Fools
The Lord of Fools.description:
The Lord of Fools

Fiendish Master of Revels

Habitat: Planar (Lower Planes), Urban

The Lord of Fools is the embodiment of revelry, cherishing amusement at any cost. He most often leads a procession of revelers of song, revelers of stories, and heralds of fools, compelling townsfolk and travelers to join their celebration to the exclusion of all other concerns. Many of these celebrants dance, drink, and make merry until they drop—sometimes dead! The Lord of Fools laughs all the louder and longer at their demise.

Secret. The Lord of Fools thrives on laughter and amusement, so when someone doesn’t react accordingly to one of his japes, he becomes enraged at that creature to the exclusion of others.

The Lord of Fools’ Lair

The Lord of Fools’ lair is the Fool’s Revel carnival.

The region containing the Lord of Fools’ lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Empty Treats. Within 1 mile of the lair, carnival snack food is abundant even in unlikely places. The food is delicious but offers no sustenance. A creature that eats the food can’t feel the effects of starvation (though they still suffer the effects of going without food) for 24 hours.

Pratfalls. Within 1 mile of the lair, ability checks or saving throws made to avoid being knocked prone have disadvantage.

If the Lord of Fools dies or moves his lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Hideous Laughter.name: Hideous Laughter
Hideous Laughter.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的生物，如果该法术对其生效，则一切事物在该生物眼中都变得滑稽可笑，使它开始狂笑起来。目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则俯身倒地，并在法术持续时间内陷入失能状态且无法起立。智力为4或更低的生物不受影响。

在每个自己的回合结束时，以及每次受到伤害时，目标可以再进行一次感知豁免。由伤害触发的豁免具有优势。豁免成功时，法术终止。

materials.value: 微型小馅饼和一根在空中挥舞的羽毛

Project Image (appears as a Small Humano.name: Project Image (appears as a Small Humanoid jester)
Project Image (appears as a Small Humano.description:
You create an illusory copy of yourself that lasts for the Duration. The copy can appear at any location within range that you have seen before, regardless of intervening obstacles. The Illusion looks and sounds like you but is intangible. If the illusion takes any damage, it disappears, and the spell ends.

You can use your action to move this illusion up to twice your speed, and make it gesture, speak, and behave in whatever way you choose. It mimics your mannerisms perfectly.

You can see through its eyes and hear through its ears as if you were in its space. On Your Turn as a Bonus Action, you can switch from using its senses to using your own, or back again. While you are using its senses, you are Blinded and Deafened in regard to your own surroundings.

Physical interaction with the image reveals it to be an illusion, because things can pass through it. A creature that uses its action to examine the image can determine that it is an Illusion with a successful Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC. If a creature discerns the illusion for what it is, the creature can see through the image, and any noise it makes sounds hollow to the creature.

materials.value: A small replica of you made from material worth at least 5gp

Vicious Mockery (4d6 psychic damage).name: Vicious Mockery (4d6 psychic damage)
Vicious Mockery (4d6 psychic damage).description:
You unleash a string of insults laced with subtle enchantments at a creature you can see within range. If the target can hear you (though it need not understand you), it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or take 1d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of its next turn.

This spell's damage increases by 1d4 when you reach 5th level (2d4), 11th level (3d4), and 17th level (4d4).

Irresistible Dance.name: 无法抗拒之舞
Irresistible Dance.description:
Choose one creature that you can see within range. The target begins a comic dance in place: shuffling, tapping its feet, and capering for the duration. Creatures that can't be charmed are immune to this spell.

A dancing creature must use all its movement to dance without leaving its space and has disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws and attack rolls. While the target is affected by this spell, other creatures have advantage on attack rolls against it. As an action, a dancing creature makes a Wisdom saving throw to regain control of itself. On a successful save, the spell ends.

Magnificent Mansion.name: 摩登肯豪宅术
Magnificent Mansion.description:
你在射程内召唤一个持续整个法术持续时间的异次元居所。你选择其唯一入口的位置。入口微微闪烁，宽5尺，高10尺。只要传送门保持开启，你和任何你在施法时指定的生物都可以进入异次元居所。如果你在传送门30尺范围内，你可以开启或关闭它。关闭时，传送门是隐形的。

传送门后方是一个宏伟的门厅，其后连接着众多房间。环境洁净、清新且温暖。

你可以创造任意喜欢的平面布局，但空间不能超过50个立方体，每个立方体边长为10尺。该地点按你的选择配备家具和装饰。它包含足以供应多达100人九道菜宴席的食物。一百名近乎透明的仆从侍奉所有进入者。你决定这些仆从的外貌和服饰。他们完全服从你的命令。每个仆从能执行普通人仆从能做的任何工作，但他们不能发动攻击或采取任何会直接伤害其他生物的行动。因此仆从可以取物、清洁、修补、叠衣、生火、上菜、斟酒等等。仆从可以前往宅邸内任何地方，但不能离开它。由此法术创造的家具和其他物品若被移出宅邸，会化作烟雾消散。当法术终止时，异次元空间内的所有生物会被驱逐到最靠近入口的开阔空间。

materials.value: 一个由象牙雕刻的微型传送门、一小块抛光大理石和一把微型银勺，每件物品价值至少5金币

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The lord casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 19):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.BQk5Row4NymMnUQl], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.ePhRKHXRE7l1sEoQ], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.cdrYKaFi98YWaBMw]

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.TfRzwEgBHHkCc6Ql], @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.pn4SnsFDvYDiE6rC]

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The lord makes two attacks, using [[/item Ribbon]] or [[/item Joy Buzzer]] in any combination. If the lord has cast Project Image, he can make melee [[/item Joy Buzzer]] attacks from the image’s space.

Ribbon.name: Ribbon
Ribbon.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 15) from one of six ribbons and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] until the grapple ends.

Joy Buzzer.name: Joy Buzzer
Joy Buzzer.description: The lord’s Infinite Jest illusion moves to a target within range. Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target can’t take reactions until the end of the lord’s next turn. Hit or Miss: The jester vanishes and reappears in the lord’s space.

Exploding Pie.name: Exploding Pie
Exploding Pie.description: The lord throws a massive, corrosive custard pie. The pie explodes in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point the lord can see within 100 feet of himself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 16 ([[/r 3d10]]) acid damage and is &Reference[Blinded apply=false] until the end of the lord’s next turn. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage only.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The lord can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The lord regains spent legendary actions at the start of his turn.

Frolic.name: Frolic
Frolic.description: The lord moves up to half his speed without provoking opportunity attacks, during which he can move through other creature’s spaces without expending extra movement to do so. A creature whose space the lord enters takes 7 ([[/r 2d6]]) psychic damage. A creature takes this damage only once per turn.

Joke’s on You.name: Joke’s on You
Joke’s on You.description: The lord uses [[/item Spellcasting]] to cast @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.TfRzwEgBHHkCc6Ql] or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.cdrYKaFi98YWaBMw].

Ribbon Dance.name: Ribbon Dance
Ribbon Dance.description: Each creature the lord is grappling must make a DC 18 Strength saving throw, taking 22 ([[/r 4d10]]) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description: The Lord of Fools’ lair is the Fool’s Revel carnival. The region containing the Lord of Fools’ lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects: If the Lord of Fools dies or moves his lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Empty Treats.name: Empty Treats
Empty Treats.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, carnival snack food is abundant even in unlikely places. The food is delicious but offers no sustenance. A creature that eats the food can’t feel the effects of starvation (though they still suffer the effects of going without food) for 24 hours.

Pratfalls.name: Pratfalls
Pratfalls.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, ability checks or saving throws made to avoid being knocked &Reference[Prone apply=false] have disadvantage.

Ribbon Step.name: Ribbon Step
Ribbon Step.description: The lord vanishes in a burst of confetti and ribbons and teleports to an unoccupied space he can see within 30 feet.

Bitter Medicine.name: Bitter Medicine
Bitter Medicine.description: As a bonus action, a creature can dismiss or belittle the lord’s attempts at humor. If the creature succeeds on a DC 16 Charisma (Deception) check, the lord has disadvantage on attack rolls against any target other than that creature until the start of the creature’s next turn.

Infinite Jest.name: Infinite Jest
Infinite Jest.description: The lord creates an illusion of a Small Humanoid jester in his space. While he isn’t &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false], the lord can move the image up to 60 feet during his turn (no action required). The lord can perceive and speak through this image as if he were in the image’s space. The image is insubstantial, but it can manipulate objects as if it has a Strength of 10.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the lord fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

Reactive.name: 机敏
Reactive.description: The lord can take one reaction on every turn of combat.

jjwL3WWVhUJ9SmkZ.name: Wellwyrm
jjwL3WWVhUJ9SmkZ.description:
Wellwyrm

Serpent Lurking Beneath the Surface

Habitat: Coastal, Underground, Swamp

Treasure: Any

Wellwyrms are serpents originally touched by cruel Fey masters. The wyrms live in shallow waters where land-dwelling creatures frequent, such as wells and watering holes, lying in wait to coil around unsuspecting victims. Wellwyrms then drag their prey into water, or into burrows they dig under seemingly safe ground, to drown or suffocate.

Secret. The sound of a hunting horn drives wellwyrms into a panicked frenzy.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The wellwyrm makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and uses [[/item Constrict]].

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 10 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Constrict.name: 绞缠
Constrict.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC 16, one Medium or smaller creature the wellwyrm can see within 5 feet.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage. The target has the &reference[grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 14), and it has the &reference[restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends. The wellwyrm needn’t spend extra movement to move during this grapple.

Amphibious.name: 水陆两栖
Amphibious.description: The wellwyrm can breathe air and water.

Hunting Terror.name: Hunting Terror
Hunting Terror.description: If the wellwyrm hears a creature play a horn or similar Musical Instrument, it has the &reference[frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

jsMSxEGRbXiyBrvJ.name: The Galloping Headsman
jsMSxEGRbXiyBrvJ.description:
The Galloping Headsman

Headless Executioner of Vengeance

Habitat: Forest, Grassland, Hill, Urban

The Galloping Headsman is a formidable combination of human and horse musculature fused with nightmarish magic and dark revenge. Gouts of flame burst from where its head and tail should be and dance dangerously along the edge of its massive two-headed axe. A burning, skull-shaped pumpkin floats eerily in one hand, its fiery visage a constantly shifting train of agonized faces.

Secret. The Galloping Headsman’s original skull is its greatest weakness, and anyone holding the skull becomes the apparition’s bane.

The Galloping Headsman’s Lair

The Galloping Headsman’s lair is the stretch of road that serves as the anchor point of the creature’s search for vengeance. If encountered in his lair, the Galloping Headsman has a challenge rating of 19 (22,000 XP).

The region containing the Galloping Headsman’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Encroaching Doom. Within 6 miles of the lair, an air of doom clings to creatures. Creatures have disadvantage on saving throws made to avoid or end the frightened condition that aren’t caused by the Galloping Headsman.

Interminable Journey. Paths warp and stretch within 6 miles of the lair. In that area, travel pace outside of combat is halved.

If the Galloping Headsman dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The headsman makes two [[/item Headsman’s Axe]] attacks and one [[/item Hooves]] attack.

Headsman’s Axe.name: Headsman’s Axe
Headsman’s Axe.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a creature with at least one head and the headsman rolled a 20 on the attack roll, the target must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw or it is decapitated and dies if it can’t survive without a head. A target is immune to this effect if it takes none of the damage, has Legendary Actions, or is Huge or larger. Such a creature takes an extra 28 ([[/r 8d6]]) force damage from the hit.

Hooves.name: 蹄击
Hooves.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the headsman moved at least 20 feet immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 9 ([[/r 2d8]]) necrotic damage and is knocked &Reference[Prone apply=false].

Flaming Skull.name: Flaming Skull
Flaming Skull.description: The headsman hurls its skull in a 90-foot-long, 10-foot-wide line. The skull then reappears in the headsman’s hand. Each creature in that line must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw, taking 63 ([[/r 14d8]]) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A target that takes damage from the skull ignites. Until a creature within 5 feet of the target takes an action to douse the flames, the target takes 2 (1d4) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The headsman can take 3 legendary actions (4 in Lair), choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The headsman regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Move.name: 移动
Move.description: The headsman moves up to half its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

Rancorous Gaze.name: Rancorous Gaze
Rancorous Gaze.description: One creature the headsman can see within 90 feet of itself must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become &Reference[Frightened apply=false] for 1 minute. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Relentless Execution.name: Relentless Execution
Relentless Execution.description: The headsman makes one [[/item Headsman’s Axe]] attack with advantage. If the target is &Reference[Frightened apply=false], treat a 19 on the d20 as a 20

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description: The Galloping Headsman’s lair is the stretch of road that serves as the anchor point of the creature’s search for vengeance. If encountered in his lair, the Galloping Headsman has a challenge rating of 19 (22,000 XP). The region containing the Galloping Headsman’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects: If the Galloping Headsman dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Encroaching Doom.name: Encroaching Doom
Encroaching Doom.description: Within 6 miles of the lair, an air of doom clings to creatures. Creatures have disadvantage on saving throws made to avoid or end the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition that aren’t caused by the Galloping Headsman.

Interminable Journey.name: Interminable Journey
Interminable Journey.description: Paths warp and stretch within 6 miles of the lair. In that area, travel pace outside of combat is halved.

Binding Skull.name: Binding Skull
Binding Skull.description: The headsman has vulnerability to any damage dealt by a creature holding the headsman’s original skull, and it has disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls made against that creature.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the headsman fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The headsman has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Speed: -20 ft..description: 若你受到寒冷伤害，你的速度降低 20 尺，直至下一回合结束。

Slam.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。若目标生物体型不超过大型，则其陷入 &Reference[Prone] 状态。

Whelm.name: 淹没
Whelm.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]], each [[lookup @target.affects.type activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] in the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s space.

Failure: [[/damage average activity=TQchFj2VXXJgU7Lq]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &Reference[Grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC [[lookup @skills.ath.passive]]). Until the grapple ends, the target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition, is &Reference[suffocating]{suffocating} unless it can breathe water, and takes [[/damage average activity=khxVwH3AB0sx1qRG]] damage at the start of each of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s turns. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can grapple one Large creature or up to two Medium or smaller creatures at a time with Whelm.

As an action, a creature within 5 feet of the [[lookup @name lowercase]] can pull a creature out of it by succeeding on a [[/check ath dc=@skills.ath.passive format=long]].

Success: Half damage only.

Grappled & Restrained.name: 受擒并束缚
Grappled & Restrained.description: 若你的生物体型不超过大型，则陷入 &Reference[Grappled apply=false]状态（逃脱 DC 14）。直至擒抱结束，你陷入 &Reference[Restrained apply=false] 状态，你 &Reference[suffocating]{窒息} 除非其能在水中呼吸，且你在 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的回合开始时受到额外伤害。

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
[[lookup @name lowercase]]施展以下一道法术，使用感知作为施法属性（法术豁免 DC [[lookup @attributes.spell.dc]]，法术攻击命中 +4）：

随意： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplLight00000]{光亮术}，@UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplThaumaturg]{奇术}

2/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplCommand000]{命令术}

1/日： @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHoldPerson]{定身人类}

Light.name: 光亮术
Light.description:
你触碰一个大型或者更小，且未被他人携带或着装的物件。在法术终止前，物件将在其 20 尺半径范围内发出明亮光照，并在其外 20 尺范围发出微光光照。光的颜色由你决定。

该物件被不透明的东西完全遮盖时，其光照被遮挡。如果你再次施展该法术，则该法术终止。

materials.value: 一只萤火虫或一片磷光苔藓

Hold Person.name: 定身类人
Hold Person.description:
指定施法距离内一个你能看见的类人生物。该目标必须进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败则其在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[paralyzed apply=false] 状态。目标在其每回合结束时可以重新进行这次豁免，豁免成功则终止其身上该法术的效应。

升环施法： 使用三环或更高法术位施展该法术时，你使用的法术位每比二环高一环，就可以额外指定一个生物作为目标。

Paralyzed.name: 麻痹
Paralyzed.description: 你在每回合结束时可以重新进行[[/save ability=wis]]豁免，豁免成功则终止你身上该法术的效应。

Thaumaturgy.name: 奇术
Thaumaturgy.description:
你在施法距离内显现一道次级奇迹。你在施法距离内创造下述效应之一。如果你多次施展该法术，则可以同时维持至多三个不同的持续 1 分钟的效应。

改变眼睛。 你改变自己眼睛的外观，其效应持续 1 分钟。

扩音。 你的声音变为一般时候的三倍，其效应持续 1 分钟。在此期间，你在 [[/check ability=cha skill=itm]] 检定上具有优势。

玩火。 你使一团火焰闪烁，变亮，变暗或变色，其效应持续 1 分钟。

无形之手。 你使一扇没有锁上的门或窗立即打开或关上。

幻音。 你使一阵瞬时声音自施法距离内一点发出，例如雷鸣声，渡鸦叫声或不祥低语声。

震动。 你在地面上引发无害的震动，其效应持续 1 分钟。

Command.name: 命令术
Command.description:
你对施法距离内一个你能看见的生物说出一个单词的命令。目标生物必须通过一次感知豁免，否则在它自己的下一回合中，其必须服从这道命令行事。从以下选项中选择一条命令：

过来。 目标以最短最直接的路线向你移动，若其到达你 5 尺范围内，其会结束自己的回合。

放下。 目标放下持握的任何东西，然后结束自己的回合。

走开。 目标消耗其整个回合，以最快最有效的方式远离你。

趴下。 目标陷入倒地状态并结束自己的回合。

立定。 在其回合内，目标不进行移动且不作任何动作和附赠动作。

升环施法： 你使用的法术位每比一环高一环，法术就能多影响一个目标。

Spiritual Weapon.name: 灵体武器spiritual weapon
Spiritual Weapon.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 施展法术 @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplSpiritualW]，使用其施法动作的施法属性。

sH8d5uApR2iWlYBB.name: Spiritual Weapon
sH8d5uApR2iWlYBB.description:
You create a floating, spectral force that resembles a weapon of your choice and lasts for the duration. The force appears within range in a space of your choice, and you can immediately make one melee spell attack against one creature within 5 feet of the force. On a hit, the target takes Force damage equal to 1d8 plus your spellcasting ability modifier.

As a Bonus Action on your later turns, you can move the force up to 20 feet and repeat the attack against a creature within 5 feet of it.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. The damage increases by 1d8 for every slot level above 2.

lOBbUPgae5QLfYx1.name: Reveler of Stories
lOBbUPgae5QLfYx1.description:
Reveler of Stories

Fiend of Legend and Folklore

Habitat: Planar (Lower Planes), Urban

Timeless stories have inspired countless mortals, and the echoes of those stories in the Lower Planes have spawned fiendish embodiments of those tales—the revelers of stories. These Fiends twist the themes of their tales, turning inspiration into doom. The revelers’ forms and powers change depending on the theme of stories they embody. Great beast revelers of stories rise from tales of terrible monsters. Hero revelers of stories embody the exploits of knights and other mighty heroes. Witch revelers of stories bring to life tales of wicked witches, wizards, and other magicians.

Secret. Revelers of stories exist because of fables, legends, and other tales, and reciting the moral of a story related to the reveler’s theme robs the reveler of its potency.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The reveler makes three [[/item Thrash]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Fabled Assault if available.

Thrash.name: 猛砸
Thrash.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Fabled Assault.name: Fabled Assault
Fabled Assault.description:
The reveler uses the option determined by its Storied Form:

  • Consuming Bite (Great Beast Only). One creature within 5 feet must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw (with disadvantage if the reveler is grappling the target). On a failed save, a the target takes 36 ([[/r 8d8]]) necrotic damage, and if it’s Huge or smaller, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 15) and &Reference[Restrained apply=false] until the grapple ends. On a successful saving throw the target takes half as much damage only. The reveler gains temporary hit points equal to the necrotic damage taken.

  • Heroic Charge (Hero Only). The reveler moves up to its speed in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks, and it can move through other creatures without expending extra movement to do so. Each creature whose space the reveler enters must make a DC 17 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 26 ([[/r 4d12]]) force damage and is knocked &Reference[Prone apply=false]. On a successful save, it takes half as much damage only.

  • Wicked Storm (Witch Only). The reveler summons a crackling storm in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 27 ([[/r 6d8]]) lightning damage and becomes &Reference[Frightened apply=false] for 1 minute. While &Reference[Frightened apply=false] in this way, the target’s speed is 0. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage only. A creature &Reference[Frightened apply=false] by the storm repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

Dramatic Reversal.name: Dramatic Reversal
Dramatic Reversal.description: When the reveler is hit by an attack roll, the reveler adds 4 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

Moral Quandary.name: Moral Quandary
Moral Quandary.description: As a bonus action, a creature can recite the moral of a story using the same theme as the reveler’s Storied Form to weaken it for 1 hour. While weakened, the reveler can’t take reactions, and its AC is reduced by 4.

Storied Form.name: Storied Form
Storied Form.description: The reveler takes on a specific form: Great Beast, Hero, or Witch. The form determines certain traits and the theme of stories the reveler embodies (powerful monsters, brave heroes, or wicked magicians, respectively).

Terror Feeding (Witch Only).name: Terror Feeding (Witch Only)
Terror Feeding (Witch Only).description: If there is at least one &Reference[Frightened apply=false] creature within 30 feet of the reveler at the end of its turn, the reveler gains 15 temporary hit points.

Dream Eater.name: Dream Eater
Dream Eater.description:
Dream Eater

Devourer of Nightmares

Habitat: Forest, Hill, Mountain, Swamp

Treasure: None

Dream eaters are horrors that feed on the dreams, sense of identity, and—some say—the very souls of other creatures. Dream eaters have the bodies and wings of great owls, while their beaks are filled with blunt, humanlike teeth and hide long snaking tongues. Their feathers are drab colors on the exterior, but their wings display a dazzling cascade of rainbow hues on the undersides when unfurled.

These colors flow and shift, mesmerizing the dream eater’s prey and leaving them helpless. A creature whose dreams are devoured is left in a listless, near-blank state. Without help, their victims waste away.

Secret. Dream eaters are confused by the intricate patterns on moth wings, and it disrupts their own colorful hypnosis.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The dream eater makes two [[/item Talons]] attacks and can use Devour Dreams.

Talons.name: 禽爪
Talons.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 14) from one of two talons, and it has the &reference[restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Devour Dreams.name: Devour Dreams
Devour Dreams.description:
The dream eater unfurls its tongue and devours the dreams from a creature’s mind.

Charisma Saving Throw: DC 16, a creature the dream eater is grappling, or a creature within 5 feet of it that has the &reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition (Incapacitated creatures fail automatically).

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the creature’s Charisma score decreases by [[/r 1d6]]. A creature reduced to 0 Charisma by this effect doesn’t recover lost Charisma when it finishes a Long Rest, and it has the Incapacitated condition until its mind is restored with a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.WzvJ7G3cqvIubsLk]{Greater Restoration}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.qcYitWoSMTnKkzM1]{Heal}, or @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.3okM6Gn63zzEULkz]{Wish} spell.

Success: Half damage only.

Hypnotic Wings.name: Hypnotic Wings
Hypnotic Wings.description:
The dream eater’s wings shine with dazzling rainbow colors until the start of its next turn, emitting Bright Light in a 30-foot Emanation originating from the dream eater and Dim Light for an additional 30 feet.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, each creature in the dream eater’s Bright Light.

Failure: Until the start of the dream eater’s next turn, the target has the &reference[incapacitated apply=false] condition, and its Speed is 0.

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: The dream eater doesn’t provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

Moth Ward.name: Moth Ward
Moth Ward.description: A creature holding a moth’s wing automatically succeeds on saving throws against the dream eater’s Hypnotic Wings.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The dream eater can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Pack Tactics.name: 集群战术
Pack Tactics.description: 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 的攻击目标生物周围 5 尺范围内存在有至少一个 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 未失能的盟友，则 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 对该生物进行的攻击检定具有优势。

mkR54wUHh2EX8eY6.name: Serum Brute
mkR54wUHh2EX8eY6.description:
Serum Brute

Cursed Giant Enhanced by Alchemy

Habitat: Underground, Urban

Serum brutes are descended from giants who suffered an enduring curse when they failed to take over a Fey domain. They have third eyes, usually in their foreheads, which channel the giants’ curse into the world around them. All three of their eyes are sewn or otherwise sealed shut to contain the curse. Serum brutes are further enhanced with—and get their name from—a series of alchemical infusions, often delivered through implanted vessels and tubes, which seek to deaden their sorrow and pain, as well as the disturbing power of their third eyes. They form deep emotional bonds with any who offer them comfort and an escape from the pain of their curse, and they are often willing to die for those allies.

Secret. Serum brutes are dependent upon their curse, and magic that breaks curses can leave the giants debilitated and bereft.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The brute makes two [[/item Fist]] attacks and can use Cursed Gaze if available.

Fist.name: 拳击
Fist.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If Caustic Secretion is active, the target takes an extra 11 ([[/r 2d10]]) acid damage.

Cursed Gaze (Unleashed Eyes Only).name: Cursed Gaze (Unleashed Eyes Only)
Cursed Gaze (Unleashed Eyes Only).description: The brute glares with its opened third eye. Each creature in a 30-foot cone must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw, taking 9 ([[/r 2d8]]) psychic damage and becoming &Reference[Frightened apply=false] until the start of the brute’s next turn on a failed save, or it takes half as much damage only on a successful one.

Devotion.name: 虔信者
Devotion.description: When one of the brute’s allies within 5 feet of it takes damage, the ally gains resistance to the triggering damage, and the brute takes an amount of psychic damage equal to the damage the ally takes.

Curse Dependent.name: Curse Dependent
Curse Dependent.description: If the brute is targeted by a @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.XZhdgVK3cLoxNCQl]{Remove Curse} spell or similar magic, until it finishes a long rest, the brute loses its blindsight, its Withering Eye trait, and its Cursed Gaze action.

Stimulant Rush.name: Stimulant Rush
Stimulant Rush.description:
At the start of its turn, the brute must choose one of the following options (it can’t use that option twice in a row):

  • Catalyst Infusion. Until the start of its next turn, the brute’s speed increases to 50 feet, it doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it leaves an enemy’s reach, and its long jump is up to 30 feet and its high jump is up to 15 feet with or without a running start.

  • Caustic Secretion. Until the start of its next turn, its Fist attack deals an extra 11 ([[/r 2d10]]) acid damage.

  • Stim Boost. Gain 10 temporary hit points.

Unleashed Eyes.name: Unleashed Eyes
Unleashed Eyes.description: When the brute has half its hit points or fewer, its sealed eyes rip open and unleash its curse. It is no longer blind beyond 60 feet, and it can use its Withering Eye trait and Cursed Gaze action until it finishes a long rest, whereupon its eyes seal shut again.

Withering Eye (Unleashed Eyes Only).name: Withering Eye (Unleashed Eyes Only)
Withering Eye (Unleashed Eyes Only).description: When the brute moves to within 5 feet of a creature, the creature takes 4 ([[/r 1d8]]) psychic damage. A creature takes this damage only once per turn.

mzD6x7OvEzIB5EHD.name: Magpie of Omens
mzD6x7OvEzIB5EHD.description:
Magpie of Omens

Bird of Fate and Fortune (Crystal or gemstone shards)

Habitat: Forest, Grassland, Planar (Fey)

Treasure: None

To those who respect the Old Ways, this bird of black and white brings tidings both fair and foul. Although the omens the magpie delivers can bring joy and grief in equal measure, they are always trustworthy.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The magpie makes two [[/item Beak]] attacks.

Beak.name: 喙啄
Beak.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Bonded Voice.name: Bonded Voice
Bonded Voice.description: The magpie can form or dissolve a magical bond with a willing creature within 5 feet. While the bond lasts, the bonded creature can speak through the magpie using the creature’s own voice and language, but with a birdlike lilt. The bond ends when the creature dies or if the magpie creates a new bond.

One For Sorrow.name: One For Sorrow
One For Sorrow.description:
Trigger: A creature within 30 feet of the magpie makes a D20 Test with Advantage.

Response: The target rolls [[/r 1d6]] and subtracts it from the total.

Two For Joy.name: Two For Joy
Two For Joy.description:
Trigger: The magpie or another creature within 30 feet makes an ability check or a saving throw.

Response: The target rolls [[/r 1d4]] and adds it to the total.

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: The magpie doesn’t provoke an Opportunity Attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

n6v8HLbHbKBRjVAH.name: Phantom Hearse
n6v8HLbHbKBRjVAH.description:
Phantom Hearse

Ghostly Coach of the Dead

Habitat: Any

Phantom hearses are ghostly carriages complete with horses and coachmen—amalgamations of tormented souls driven to claim the living and drag them to the land of the dead.

The spirit coachmen strike with phantom whips and weapons, and even fly out to harry foes at a distance, while the ghostly horses drive the hearse in a crushing charge that gathers victims and seals them into a spectral coffin that drains the warmth and vitality from flesh and bone. The tolling bell on the carriage precedes the apparition’s appearance, and its sepulchral sound has caused more than a few witnesses to drop dead on the spot.

Secret. Phantom hearses are driven to collect the living, and they can’t see a living creature that holds its breath.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The hearse makes two [[/item Ghostly Coachman]] attacks. It can replace one of the attacks with a use of [[/item Trample]], if available.

Ghostly Coachman.name: Ghostly Coachman
Ghostly Coachman.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a creature, it can’t regain hit points until the start of the hearse’s next turn.

Trample.name: 践踏
Trample.description: The hearse moves in a straight line up to its speed. Each creature whose space the hearse enters during this action must make a DC 16 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 10 ([[/r 3d6]]) cold damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 14), and it is &Reference[Restrained apply=false] until the grapple ends. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage only.

Tolling Bell.name: Tolling Bell
Tolling Bell.description: The hearse rings its bell, signaling the doom of its foes. Each creature of the hearse’s choice that it can see within 30 feet of the hearse must make a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 44 ([[/r 8d10]]) psychic damage and it speed is halved until the start of the hearse’s next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Entomb.name: Entomb
Entomb.description: One Medium or smaller creature &Reference[Grappled apply=false] by the hearse must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or be entombed in a coffin in the hearse, and the grapple ends. While entombed, the creature is &Reference[Blinded apply=false] and &Reference[Restrained apply=false], it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the hearse, and at the start of each of the hearse’s turns it takes 21 ([[/r 6d6]]) necrotic damage and gains 1 level of &Reference[Exhaustion apply=false]. The hearse can have up to three creatures &Reference[Grappled apply=false] at a time. If the hearse takes 20 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside a coffin, the hearse must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or release all entombed creatures, each of which falls in a space within 5 feet of the hearse and is knocked &Reference[Prone apply=false]. If the hearse dies, any entombed creature falls to the ground &Reference[Prone apply=false] in the hearse’s former space.

Breathless Warding.name: Breathless Warding
Breathless Warding.description: A creature holding its breath is &Reference[Invisible apply=false] to the hearse. If the creature takes damage while holding its breath, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or let out its breath and become visible to the hearse until the start of the creature’s next turn, when it can hold its breath again.

Incorporeal Movement.name: 虚体移动
Incorporeal Movement.description: The hearse can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. It takes 5 ([[/r 1d10]]) force damage if it ends its turn inside an object.

nZMEV4jjo1MaG1xI.name: Dream Eater
nZMEV4jjo1MaG1xI.description:
Dream Eater

Devourer of Nightmares

Habitat: Forest, Hill, Mountain, Swamp

Dream eaters are horrors that feed on the dreams, sense of identity, and—some say—the very souls of other creatures. Dream eaters have the bodies and wings of great owls, while their beaks are filled with blunt, humanlike teeth and hide long snaking tongues. Their feathers are drab colors on the exterior, but their wings display a dazzling cascade of rainbow hues on the undersides when unfurled.

These colors flow and shift, mesmerizing the dream eater’s prey and leaving them helpless. A creature whose dreams are devoured is left in a listless, near-blank state. Without help, their victims waste away.

Secret. Dream eaters are confused by the intricate patterns on moth wings, and it disrupts their own colorful hypnosis.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The dream eater makes two [[/item Talons]] attacks and can use Devour Dreams.

Talons.name: 禽爪
Talons.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it is &Reference[Grappled apply=false] (escape DC 14) from one of two talons, and it is &Reference[Restrained apply=false] until the grapple ends.

Devour Dreams.name: Devour Dreams
Devour Dreams.description: The dream eater unfurls its tongue and devours the dreams of a creature it is grappling, or an &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] creature within 5 feet of it. The target must make a DC 16 Charisma saving throw. &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] targets fail the save automatically. On a failed save, the target takes 18 ([[/r 4d8]]) psychic damage, and its Charisma score decreases by 1d6. A creature reduced to 0 Charisma by this effect becomes &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] until its mind is restored with a Greater Restoration, Heal, or Wish spell. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until it finishes a long rest. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage only.

Hypnotic Wings.name: Hypnotic Wings
Hypnotic Wings.description: The dream eater’s wings shine with dazzling rainbow colors until the start of its next turn, emitting bright light in a 30-foot radius from the dream eater and dim light for an additional 30 feet. Each other creature within the bright light that can see the dream eater must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] until the start of the dream eater’s next turn. While &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] in this way, the target’s speed is reduced to 0.

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: The dream eater doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

Moth Ward.name: Moth Ward
Moth Ward.description: A creature holding a moth’s wing automatically succeeds on saving throws against the dream eater’s Hypnotic Wings.

Spider Climb.name: 蛛行
Spider Climb.description: The dream eater can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

nb9XWuiJS6wzHpqX.name: Keeper of the Blight
nb9XWuiJS6wzHpqX.description:
Keeper of the Blight

Druid Transformed by Blight

Habitat: Forest, Swamp, Underground

Treasure: Relics

Keepers of the blight arise from Fey beings that dwell in a natural region that becomes overtaken by a supernatural or spiritual rot. Where they once tended the balance and cycles of their home, keepers are consumed by the blight and channel their magic through fungus, mold, and rot, pushing the cycle of life toward death, decay, and the flourishing of things that thrive in gloom.

Secret. The fungus growing throughout keepers of the blight empowers and sustains them, and killing that growth diminishes their power.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
Spellcasting. The keeper casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks):

At Will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDruidcraft]{Druidcraft}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplRayofSickn]{Ray of Sickness}

1/Day: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplBlight0000]{Blight}

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The keeper makes two attacks, using [[/item Blight Staff]] or [[/item Spore Spray]] in any combination, and it uses Rotting Ritual.

Blight Staff.name: Blight Staff
Blight Staff.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Spore Spray.name: Spore Spray
Spore Spray.description: Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], range 60 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a creature, it has the &reference[poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of the keeper’s next turn.

Rotting Ritual.name: Rotting Ritual
Rotting Ritual.description:
The keeper magically creates one of the following effects of its choice. It can’t use the same effect twice in a row.

  • Frenzying Spores. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, a creature the keeper can see within 30 feet.

    Failure: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target must immediately take a Reaction to make a melee or ranged attack against a creature of the keeper’s choice that is within reach or range of the attack.

    Success: Half damage only.

  • Blight Spawn. The keeper magically summons a Rotweaver (lacks a Hunting Horn) in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of itself. The rotweaver takes its turn immediately after the keeper on the same Initiative count, and it obeys the keeper. The rotweaver vanishes after 1 minute, or when it or the keeper dies.

  • Devouring Fungus. Life-sapping fungus sprouts from the ground in a 60-foot radius centered on the keeper. The area is Difficult Terrain, and a creature has the &reference[poisoned apply=false] condition while within the area. The fungus remains for 1 minute, until the keeper uses this effect again, or until it dies.

Blight Dependent.name: Blight Dependent
Blight Dependent.description: If the keeper is targeted by an effect that ends the &reference[poisoned apply=false] condition, it takes [[/damage average]] damage and has Disadvantage on D20 Tests until the end of its next turn.

Fungal Step.name: Fungal Step
Fungal Step.description: The keeper ignores Difficult Terrain caused by plants or fungi.

Druidcraft.name: 德鲁伊伎俩
Druidcraft.description:
你向自然精魂低语，在施法距离内创造出下述效应之一。

感知天气。 你创造一个微型而无害的感官效应，并以之预报你所在地接下来 4 小时的天气状况。该效应可表现为一个代表晴空的金球，一朵代表雨天的云彩，代表雪日而飘飞的雪花等等。该效应将持续 1 轮。

盛放。 你可以立即让一朵鲜花绽放，一颗种子破壳，一片叶蕾发芽。

感官效应。 你创造一个无害的感官效应，例如落叶，幽灵般舞动的小仙灵们，微风，动物的声音或者臭鼬的微弱臭气。该效应只能在 5 尺的立方空间内起效。

玩火。 你点亮或熄灭一根蜡烛、一根火把或一处小篝火。

Ray of Sickness.name: 致病射线
Ray of Sickness.description:
你朝施法距离内一名生物射出一道绿色射线。对目标进行一次远程法术攻击。若命中，则目标受到 2d8 点毒素伤害且陷入 &Reference[poisoned] 状态直至你的下一回合结束。

升环施法： 使用的法术位每比一环高一环，伤害就增加 1d8。

Blight.name: 枯萎术
Blight.description:
你在射程内能看见的一个生物进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败则受到8d8暗蚀伤害，豁免成功则伤害减半。植物生物自动豁免失败。

或者，以一个非生物的非魔法植物为目标，例如一棵树或灌木。它不进行豁免；它只会枯萎并死亡。

使用更高法术位。 使用的法术位每比4环高一环，伤害就增加1d8。

Hypnovulfen.name: Hypnovulfen
Hypnovulfen.description:
Hypnovulfen

Hungry Hypnotizing Wolf

Habitat: Forest, Hill

Treasure: Individual

Hypnovulfen resemble massive wolves with unnaturally large orange eyes and wide, crooked maws. Despite their size, hypnovulfen are shockingly stealthy, able to stalk their prey and snare them with a hypnotic gaze from the shadows. The gaze beguiles victims into seeing a loved one beckoning them closer for a warm embrace. All the better for a hypnovulfen to feed and consume the unfortunate morsel’s memories.

Secret. Hypnovulfen have no power to mesmerize anyone holding a keepsake or memento received from a loved one, as it overpowers the false beckoning of the monster’s gaze.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The hypnovulfen makes one [[/item Bite]] attack and one [[/item Claw]] attack, and it can use Swallow.

Bite.name: 啃咬
Bite.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the &reference[grappled apply=false] condition (escape DC 17), and it has the &reference[restrained apply=false] condition until the grapple ends.

Claw.name: 爪击
Claw.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the &reference[prone apply=false] condition.

Swallow.name: 吞咽
Swallow.description:
Strength Saving Throw: DC 20, one Medium or smaller creature &reference[grappled apply=false] by the hypnovulfen (the hypnovulfen can have only one creature swallowed at a time).

Failure: The hypnovulfen swallows the target, which is no longer Grappled. While swallowed, a creature has the &reference[blinded apply=false] and &reference[restrained apply=false] conditions, has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the hypnovulfen, and takes [[/damage average]] damage at the start of each of the hypnovulfen’s turns. If the creature dies from this damage, the hypnovulfen absorbs its memories and regains 25 Hit Points.

If the hypnovulfen takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the hypnovulfen must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate the creature, which falls in a space within 10 feet of the hypnovulfen and has the &reference[prone apply=false] condition.

If the hypnovulfen dies, a swallowed creature is no longer Restrained and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting &reference[prone apply=false].

Hypnotic Gaze.name: 催眠凝视
Hypnotic Gaze.description:
Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 19, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. A creature holding a keepsake from a loved one succeeds automatically.

Failure: The creature has the &reference[charmed apply=false] condition until it takes damage. While charmed, it has the Incapacitated condition and must move as close to the hypnovulfen as possible by the safest route. The creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The hypnovulfen has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

o30xGteMCeHNfXTF.name: The Vermintoll Abomination
o30xGteMCeHNfXTF.description:
The Vermintoll Abomination

Verminous Coven Amalgamation

Habitat: Forest, Planar (Fey), Mountain, Urban

The magic that binds hag covens together is far more powerful than many spellcasters can fully comprehend. Vermintoll abominations come about when the magics of a centipede hag, a pigeon hag, and a weasel hag enmesh and fuse the witches into one mass, bound to their cauldron.

The Vermintoll Abomination’s Lair

The Vermintoll Abomination’s lair is a decrepit hideaway, often hidden in plain sight such as an attic, basement, or a seized home.

The region containing the Vermintoll Abomination’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects:

Endless Vermin. Within 1 mile of the lair, centipedes, weasels, (including giant varieties of both), and pigeons (use the Raven stat block) are common nuisances. They steal Tiny objects and foul food.

Loyal Dwelling. The lair itself, including any greater structure or complex it resides within, rejects intruders. Ability checks to pick locks or find secret doors have disadvantage.

If the Vermintoll Abomination dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Spellcasting.name: 施法
Spellcasting.description:
The abomination casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18):

At will: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplHypnoticPa]{Hypnotic Pattern}

1/Day Each: @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplContagion0]{Contagion}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDream00000]{Dream}, @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells24.Item.phbsplDominatePe]{Dominate Person}

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The abomination makes three attacks, using [[/item Cauldron Slam]] or [[/item Brew Spray]] in any combination.

Cauldron Slam.name: Cauldron Slam
Cauldron Slam.description: Melee Attack Roll: [[/attack]], reach 5 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Brew Spray.name: Brew Spray
Brew Spray.description: Ranged Attack Roll: [[/attack]], range 90 ft. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and the target takes a −2 penalty to AC until the end of the abomination’s next turn.

Legendary Actions.name: 传奇动作
Legendary Actions.description: The abomination can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature’s turn. The abomination regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

Corrosive Teleport.name: Corrosive Teleport
Corrosive Teleport.description:
The abomination teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18, each creature in a 10-foot Emanation originating from the abomination at its destination space.

Failure: [[/damage average]] damage.

Success: Half damage.

Hag’s Head.name: Hag’s Head
Hag’s Head.description:
The abomination uses one of the following options (if the necessary head is alive); it can’t use that option again until the start of its next turn:

Contagious Miasma (Centipede Hag Head).

  • Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18, one creature the abomination can see within 5 feet.

  • Failure: The target takes [[/damage 3d8 poison]]{13 (3d8) Poison} damage and has the &reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition. While Poisoned, it can’t regain Hit Points. The target repeats the saving throw when it finishes a Long Rest, ending the effect on itself on a success.

  • Success: Half damage only.

Overwhelming Doubt (Pigeon Hag Head).

  • Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 18, one creature the abomination can see within 30 feet.

  • Failure: [[/damage 3d6 psychic]]{10 (3d6) Psychic} damage, and the target has the &reference[Incapacitated apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

  • Success: Half damage only.

Waking Nightmare (Weasel Hag Head).

  • Charisma Saving Throw: DC 18, one creature the abomination can see within 30 feet.

  • Failure: [[/damage 2d10 psychic]]{11 (2d10) Psychic} damage, and the target has the &reference[Frightened apply=false] condition. While Frightened, the target perceives its allies as enemies but isn’t compelled to act in a specific way. The target repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

  • Success: Half damage only.

Crushing Leap.name: Crushing Leap
Crushing Leap.description:
The abomination jumps to a space within 30 feet that contains one or more Large or smaller creatures.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, each creature in the abomination’s destination space.

Failure: [[/damage average]] Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the &reference[Prone apply=false] condition.

Success: Half damage only, and the target is pushed 5 feet straight away from the abomination.

Failure or Success: The abomination can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

Lair Actions.name: 巢穴动作
Lair Actions.description: The Vermintoll Abomination’s lair is a decrepit hideaway, often hidden in plain sight such as an attic, basement, or a seized home. The region containing the Vermintoll Abomination’s lair is changed by its presence, creating the following effects: If the Vermintoll Abomination dies or moves its lair elsewhere, these effects end immediately.

Endless Vermin.name: Endless Vermin
Endless Vermin.description: Within 1 mile of the lair, centipedes, weasels, (including giant varieties of both), and pigeons (use the Raven stat block) are common nuisances. They steal Tiny objects and foul food.

Loyal Dwelling.name: Loyal Dwelling
Loyal Dwelling.description: The lair itself, including any greater structure or complex it resides within, rejects intruders. Ability checks to pick locks or find secret doors have disadvantage.

Legendary Resistance.name: 传奇抗性
Legendary Resistance.description: If the abomination fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

Magic Resistance.name: 魔法抗性
Magic Resistance.description: The abomination has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

Multiple Heads.name: 万首
Multiple Heads.description: The abomination has three heads: a centipede hag’s, a pigeon hag’s, and a weasel hag’s. Whenever the abomination takes 50 damage or more on a single turn, one of its heads dies (determined randomly). The abomination dies if all its heads are dead. At the end of each of its turns, if it has at least 1 Hit Point and any of its heads are dead, the abomination regains 20 Hit Points and one of its dead heads returns to life.

Dispel Magic.name: 解除魔法
Dispel Magic.description:
Choose one creature, object, or magical effect within range. Any ongoing spell of level 3 or lower on the target ends. For each ongoing spell of level 4 or higher on the target, make an ability check using your spellcasting ability (DC 10 plus that spell's level). On a successful check, the spell ends.

Using a Higher-Level Spell Slot. You automatically end a spell on the target if the spell's level is equal to or less than the level of the spell slot you use.

Hypnotic Pattern.name: 催眠图纹
Hypnotic Pattern.description:
在施法距离内一处边长 30 尺的立方区域内创造出一个在空中舞动旋转的彩色图纹。图纹在出现片刻后消失，然后迫使区域内每个看到它的生物进行一次感知豁免，豁免失败者将在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态。被该法术魅惑的生物陷入 &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] 状态，且速度降为 0。

如果受术生物受到任何伤害，或有其他生物用动作将其从恍惚中摇醒，则其身上的此效应将提前终止。

Hypnotized.name: 催眠
Hypnotized.description: 你在法术持续时间内陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] 状态。被该法术魅惑的生物陷入 &Reference[incapacitated apply=false] 状态，且速度降为 0。

Contagion.name: 疫病术contagion
Contagion.description:
你的触碰会散播一种魔法疫病。目标必须进行一次体质豁免，豁免失败则受到11d8暗蚀伤害并获得&Reference[Poisoned apply=false]状态。此外，当你施展该法术时选择一种属性。处于中毒状态时，目标在使用所选属性进行豁免检定时具有劣势。

目标必须在每个自己的回合结束时重复该豁免，直到其累计三次成功或失败。如果目标在此豁免中成功三次，该法术对其结束。如果目标在此豁免中失败三次，该法术将持续7天。

每当中毒目标受到可以结束中毒状态的效果影响时，目标必须进行一次[[/save ability=con dc=@attributes.spell.dc format=long]]，否则其中毒状态不会结束。

Infected (Strength).name: 感染（力量）
Infected (Strength).description:
• 你在陷入 &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] 期间进行被感染属性的豁免检定时具有劣势。

  • 你在你的每回合结束时必须 [[/save ability=con format=long]]{重新}豁免，直至你累计三次成功或失败。

  • 每当你受到能够结束其中毒状态的效应作用时，你必须成功通过一次[[/save ability=con format=long]]{体质豁免}，否则其陷入的中毒状态不会结束。

Infected (Dexterity).name: 感染（敏捷）
Infected (Dexterity).description:

Infected (Intelligence).name: 感染（智力）

Dream.name: 托梦术
Dream.description:
你指定一名你知道且与你同处一个存在位面的生物。你或一名被你触碰的自愿生物将作为信使进入出神状态。该状态下，信使陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态且速度降为 0。

如果目标正睡着，则信使可以在法术持续时间内出现在其梦中并在其沉睡期间与之交流。信使能够塑造梦中的环境，创造景观，物件和其他影像。信使可以随时结束出神状态，以此终止法术。目标在醒来后能清楚地记得其梦境的内容。

如果你施法时目标醒着，则信使可以了解到这点。此时信使可以终止出神并结束法术，或是等待目标入睡再进入其梦境。

你可以让信使以可怕的形象出现。但此时信使只能提供不超过十个单词的信息，随后目标必须成功通过一次感知豁免。豁免失败时，目标便无法从休息中获益，并在其醒来时受到 3d6 点心灵伤害。

Trance State.name: 出神状态
Trance State.description: 信使陷入 &Reference[Incapacitated apply=false] 状态且速度降为 0。

Dominate Person.name: 支配类人
Dominate Person.description:
射程内你能看见的一个类人生物必须进行一次感知豁免,若失败则在该法术的持续时间内陷入&Reference[Charmed apply=false]状态。若你或你的盟友正在与该目标战斗,则其在此次豁免中具有优势。每当目标受到伤害时,它都会重复进行该豁免,成功则在自己身上结束该法术。

当你与受魅惑的目标处于同一位面时,你们之间会建立心灵感应链接。在你的回合中,你可以利用此链接向目标下达命令(无需动作),例如"攻击那个生物","移动到那边",或"取回那个物件"。目标会在其回合中尽力服从命令。若它完成了一个指令且未从你处获得进一步指示,则会依自身意愿行动和移动,并专注于保护自己。

你可以命令目标执行反应动作,但必须使用你自己的反应动作才能如此做。

使用更高法术位. 若使用6环法术位(至多10分钟),7环法术位(至多1小时),或8环及以上法术位(至多8小时)施展该法术,则你的专注持续时间会相应延长。

Dominated.name: 支配
Dominated.description: 陷入 &Reference[charmed apply=false] ，当你受到伤害时，重复 [[/save ability=wis]] 豁免，成功时结束自身身上的法术效应。

Nameless Thing.name: Nameless Thing
Nameless Thing.description:
Nameless Thing

Unknowable Lifeform from Beyond (Meteorite fragments)

Habitat: Any

Nameless things are alien minds bound into physical vessels, most often diminutive animals, objects, or pieces of monsters. These creatures can creep into the world when outer influence seeps into existence but are usually deliberately invited.

Psychic Strike.name: Psychic Strike
Psychic Strike.description: Melee Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage, and if the target is a creature, it is &Reference[Frightened apply=false] until the start of the nameless thing’s next turn.

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: The nameless thing casts @UUID[Compendium.dnd5e.spells.Item.1N8dDMMgZ1h1YJ3B] on itself, requiring no spell components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability. When it casts the spell, the nameless thing can extend the effect of the spell to a creature it is touching. The spell ends early if either creature breaks the spell on itself or if the nameless thing stops touching the other creature. Once the nameless thing extends the spell in this way, it can’t do so again until it finishes a long rest.

Flyby.name: 飞掠
Flyby.description: The nameless thing doesn’t provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy’s reach.

lreOluzngLGVgfTI.name: Invisibility
lreOluzngLGVgfTI.description:
A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.

At Higher Levels. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

materials.value: An eyelash encased in gum arabic

Invisibility.name: Invisibility
Invisibility.description: 你或一个你触碰的生物变为隐形，直至法术终止。任何保持在目标身上的着装物和携带物也可以维持隐形状态。 如果目标发动攻击或施展法术，则该法术终止。

Bandit Captain.name: 匪帮队长
Bandit Captain.description: Token artwork by Forgotten Adventures.

Studded Leather Armor.name: 镶钉皮甲
Studded Leather Armor.description: 该护甲由坚固而柔韧的皮革制成，其表面由紧密的铆钉和尖刺进行加固。

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: 船长发动三次近战攻击：两次弯刀攻击和一次匕首攻击。或船长发动两次匕首远程攻击。

Scimitar.name: 弯刀
Scimitar.description: Melee Weapon Attack:+5 to hit,, 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.

Dagger.name: 匕首
Dagger.description: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.

Parry.name: 格挡
Parry.description: 首领在被一次近战攻击命中时，其AC加上 2。此时该首领必须能看见攻击者，且有在持用一把近战武器。

Training.description: [[lookup @name lowercase]] 具有某项技能熟练（由DM选择），且在进行使用该技能的属性检定时具有优势。

pJtJT4YnRt9LXc6o.name: Warhorse
pJtJT4YnRt9LXc6o.description: 指示物插图由Forgotten Adventures提供。

Hooves.name: 蹄击
Hooves.description: [[/attack extended]]。 [[/damage average extended]]。 若 [[lookup @name lowercase]] 在此次攻击前立即向着该目标直线移动了 20+ 尺且目标生物体型不超过大型，则目标额外受到 5（2d4）钝击伤害，并陷入 &Reference[prone] 状态。

pKn09bHD15MXTopk.name: Salmon of Knowledge
pKn09bHD15MXTopk.description:
Salmon of Knowledge

Elemental Font of Wisdom (Crushed opal)

Habitat: Coastal, Planar (Elemental Plane of Water), Underwater

Legends speak of the salmon of knowledge—shimmering fish said to embody the wisdom of the ages. Their scales gleam with an iridescent light, and they are forever enveloped in a sphere of gently flowing water that defies gravity. This magical orb is said to carry the essence of the sacred Current of Wisdom—where knowledge of all time and space flows through the rivers of the cosmos.

Multiattack.name: 多重攻击
Multiattack.description: The salmon makes two [[/item Water Spray]] attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of [[/item Prophetic Guidance]].

Water Spray.name: 水雾喷溅
Water Spray.description: Ranged Weapon Attack: [[/attack]] to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage average]] damage.

Prophetic Guidance.name: Prophetic Guidance
Prophetic Guidance.description: A creature the salmon can see within 30 feet gains a flash of foresight. Once in the next minute, when the creature fails an ability check, attack roll, or saving throw, it can roll [[/r 1d4]] and add it to the total, potentially turning the failure into a success.

Echo From The Current.name: Echo From The Current
Echo From The Current.description: When a creature within 5 feet of the salmon makes an Intelligence or Wisdom check, the creature can use the salmon’s Wisdom modifier (+4) in place of its own ability modifier for the check.

Orb Of Water.name: Orb Of Water
Orb Of Water.description: The salmon is surrounded by a sphere of flowing water that moves with it. While inside of the sphere, the salmon has resistance to fire damage. A creature that grapples the salmon can choose to pull it out of the orb of water. The orb of water moves up to 20 feet toward the salmon at the start of each of the salmon’s turns. If it enters the salmon’s space, the grapple ends on the salmon.

pPMyLBkOyyBLfWIa.description:
